data.title: Cut the Rope: Magic
data.description: Join Om Nom’s newest adventure and transform him into magical forms to help the lovable little monster recover candy stolen by an evil wizard! A magical mishap has accidentally teleported Om Nom to a mystical world filled with challenging puzzles for players of all ages. Can you use Om Nom’s new skills to solve an evil wizard’s tricks and traps?
data.desc_it: Unisciti a Om Nom nella sua nuova avventura e trasformalo con la magia per aiutarlo a recuperare le caramelle rubate da uno stregone malvagio! Un piccolo incidente magico ha teletrasportato per errore Om Nom in un mondo misterioso, ricco di rompicapi per giocatori di ogni età. Riuscirai a usare le nuove abilità di Om Nom per superare gli insidiosi tranelli di un malvagio stregone?
data.desc_en: Join Om Nom’s newest adventure and transform him into magical forms to help the lovable little monster recover candy stolen by an evil wizard! A magical mishap has accidentally teleported Om Nom to a mystical world filled with challenging puzzles for players of all ages. Can you use Om Nom’s new skills to solve an evil wizard’s tricks and traps?
data.desc_fr: Rejoins la dernière aventure d'Om Nom et transforme ce charmant petit monstre par magie pour l'aider à récupérer ses bonbons volés par un sorcier magique! Un incident magique a accidentellement téléporté Om Nom vers un monde mystique rempli d'énigmes complexes pour des joueurs de tous les âges. Sauras-tu utiliser les nouvelles compétences d'Om Nom pour déjouer les ruses et pièges d'un sorcier maléfique?
data.desc_de: Erlebe Om Noms neuestes Abenteuer und verwandle ihn in magische Gestalten, damit das knuffige kleine Monster seine Süßigkeiten zurückholen kann, die von einem bösen Zauberer gestohlen wurden! Ein magisches Missgeschick hat Om Nom versehentlich in eine mystische Welt voller herausfordernder Puzzles für Spieler jeden Alters teleportiert. Kannst du Om Noms neue Fähigkeiten einsetzen, um die Tricks und Fallen eines bösen Zauberers zu überwinden?
data.desc_es: Acompaña a Om Nom en su nueva aventura y transfórmalo mágicamente para que pueda recuperar los caramelos que le ha robado un malvado hechicero. Un mágico accidente ha hecho que Om Nom se teletransporte a un mundo místico lleno de complejos rompecabezas para jugadores de todas las edades. ¿Sabrás usar las nuevas habilidades de Om Nom para evitar los trucos y trampas del malvado hechicero?

data.title: Junior Chess
data.description: In Junior Chess you can play on a nice chess board and prove your skills! Use the mouse or your fingers to control the figures. Every figure has special moving abilities. Game on!
data.desc_it: Puoi giocare a Junior Chess e provare le tue abilità! Usa il mouse o le dita per controllare le pedine. Ogni pedina ha delle speciali mosse. Che il divertimento inizi!
data.desc_en: In Junior Chess you can play on a nice chess board and prove your skills! Use the mouse or your fingers to control the figures. Every figure has special moving abilities. Game on!

data.title: Cut the Rope 2
data.description: SWEET! Om Nom's shenanigans continue in Cut the Rope 2 HTML5! With new characters, fresh gameplay elements and tricky missions, candy collecting has never been so fun! Cut the Rope 2 HTML5 brings fresh challenges and unanticipated obstacles to the candy crunching, physics-based phenomenon that has delighted millions of players around the world! If you like Cut the Rope, you'll love Cut the Rope 2!
data.desc_it: WOW! Le avventure di Om Nom proseguono in questo secondo gioco in HTML5. Con nuovi personaggi, tante modalità di gioco e missioni complette, collezionare caramelle non è mai stato così divertente! In questo gioco che ha divertito milioni di giocatori in tutto il mondo, troverete tutto ciò che avete amato in Cut the Rope e anche di più!
data.desc_en: SWEET! Om Nom's shenanigans continue in Cut the Rope 2 HTML5! With new characters, fresh gameplay elements and tricky missions, candy collecting has never been so fun! Cut the Rope 2 HTML5 brings fresh challenges and unanticipated obstacles to the candy crunching, physics-based phenomenon that has delighted millions of players around the world! If you like Cut the Rope, you'll love Cut the Rope 2!
data.desc_fr: Cut the Rope 2 reprend les éléments qui ont fait le succès du premier volet, tout en ajoutant de nouveaux défis et des obstacles inattendus pour le plus grand bonheur des millions de fans aux quatre coins du globe ! Vous avez aimé Cut the Rope ? Vous allez adorer Cut the Rope 2!
data.desc_de: LECKER! Om Noms Schabernack geht in Cut the Rope 2 HTML5 weiter! Mit neuen Charakteren und Spielelementen sowie kniffligen Missionen war das Sammeln von Süßigkeiten noch nie so spaßig! Cut the Rope 2 HTML5 bringt neue Herausforderungen und unerwartete Hindernisse für das auf Physik basierende Phänomen, das Millionen Spieler auf der ganzen Welt begeistert hat! Wenn Cut the Rope dir gefällt, wirst du Cut the Rope 2 lieben!
data.desc_es: Cut the Rope 2 incorpora nuevos desafíos y obstáculos inesperados en el exitoso juego basado en la física que ha atrapado a millones de jugadores en todo el mundo. Si disfrutaste Cut the Rope, ¡te encantará Cut the Rope 2!

data.title: God of Light
data.description:
Sit back and become immersed into the world of God of Light, the game that rethinks the physics puzzle genre with its unique environment exploration gameplay, amazing graphics and exclusive soundtrack created by electronic music icon UNKLE.

Join cute game mascot, Shiny, on his way to saving the universe from the impending darkness. Play through a variety of exciting game worlds and dozens of levels with mind-blowing puzzles. Your goal is to explore game levels, seek for game objects that reflect, split, combine, paint, bend and teleport rays of light energy to activate the Sources of Life and bring light back to the universe.

Play the entire Celestial Tree chapter for free and unlock dozens of additional levels in Stone, Azure, Frozen and Space Trees for free using collected Fireflies or with in-app purchase.

This game more than delivers when it comes to great gameplay experience, so what are you waiting for? Get ready for an amazing trip. Become God of Light!

Product Features
• Explore 6 different game worlds and 150 levels.
• Use mirrors, prisms, splitters, collectors, black holes and filters to control rays of light energy.
• Unlock and share your achievements with friends. Do you have what it takes to earn them all?
• Collect glowing creatures that help you solve puzzles.
• Receive regular updates with new game worlds and levels to explore.
data.desc_it:
Accomodati e immergiti nel mondo di God of Light, che reinterpreta completamente il genere dei giochi basati sulla fisica con la sua irripetibile giocabilità basata sull'esplorazione dell'ambiente, con grafiche stupefacenti e una colonna sonora esclusiva creata dall'icona della musica elettronica UNKLE.

Il tuo obiettivo è di esplorare i livelli, cercare oggetti del gioco che riflettono, dividono, combinano, colorano, piegano e teletrasportano i raggi di energia luminosa per attivare le fonti di vita e riportare la luce nell'universo.
data.desc_en:
Sit back and become immersed into the world of God of Light, the game that rethinks the physics puzzle genre with its unique environment exploration gameplay, amazing graphics and exclusive soundtrack created by electronic music icon UNKLE.

Join cute game mascot, Shiny, on his way to saving the universe from the impending darkness. Play through a variety of exciting game worlds and dozens of levels with mind-blowing puzzles. Your goal is to explore game levels, seek for game objects that reflect, split, combine, paint, bend and teleport rays of light energy to activate the Sources of Life and bring light back to the universe.

Play the entire Celestial Tree chapter for free and unlock dozens of additional levels in Stone, Azure, Frozen and Space Trees for free using collected Fireflies or with in-app purchase.

This game more than delivers when it comes to great gameplay experience, so what are you waiting for? Get ready for an amazing trip. Become God of Light!

Product Features
• Explore 6 different game worlds and 150 levels.
• Use mirrors, prisms, splitters, collectors, black holes and filters to control rays of light energy.
• Unlock and share your achievements with friends. Do you have what it takes to earn them all?
• Collect glowing creatures that help you solve puzzles.
• Receive regular updates with new game worlds and levels to explore.
data.desc_fr:
nstallez-vous confortablement et immergez-vous corps et âme au cœur du monde de God of Light, un jeu lumineux qui va en faire voir de toutes les couleurs à votre matière grise ! 
Avec son extraordinaire gameplay qui met l’accent sur l’exploration, ses visuels splendides et sa bande-son génialissime signée UNKLE (le géant de la musique électronique), ce titre fait exploser les fondations du puzzle-game et repousse les lois de la physique vidéoludique pour offrir une expérience purement et simplement hors-norme !
data.desc_de:
Lehn dich zurück und tauch ein in die Welt von God of Light, einem Spiel das das Genre der Physik-Puzzles mit seinem einzigartigen Gameplay, der Art, wie man darin die Umgebung wahrnimmt, großartigen Grafiken sowie einem exklusiven Soundtrack der Elektromusik-Ikone UNKLE völlig neu definiert.

Dein Ziel ist es, Spiellevels zu erkunden, nach Spielobjekten zu suchen, die Lichtstrahlen reflektieren, splitten, kombinieren, färben, biegen und teleportieren, um die Quellen des Lebens zu aktivieren und das Universum erneut mit Licht zu erfüllen.
data.desc_es:
Acomódate y adéntrate en el mundo de God of Light, el juego que reinventa el género de los puzles basados en la física con su dinámica de juego única, basada en la exploración del entorno, unos gráficos impresionantes y una banda sonora exclusiva creada por el icono de la música electrónica UNKLE.

Tu meta consiste en explorar niveles del juego, buscar objetos que reflejen, combinen, pinten, doblen y teletransporten rayos de energía lumínica para activar las fuentes vitales y devolver la luz al universo.

data.title: Cut The Rope
data.description: Cut the rope to feed candy to Om Nom! A mysterious package has arrived, and the little monster inside has only one request: CANDY! Collect gold stars, discover hidden prizes and unlock exciting new levels in this addictively fun, award-winning, physics-based game!
data.desc_it: È arrivato un pacco misterioso, e il mostriciattolo al suo interno ha una sola richiesta: BONBON! Raccogli stelle luccicanti, scopri premi nascosti e sblocca nuovi entusiasmanti livelli in questo divertente e pluripremiato gioco basato sui principi della fisica: Cut the Rope.
data.desc_en: Cut the rope to feed candy to Om Nom! A mysterious package has arrived, and the little monster inside has only one request: CANDY! Collect gold stars, discover hidden prizes and unlock exciting new levels in this addictively fun, award-winning, physics-based game!
data.desc_fr: Vous avez reçu un mystérieux paquet, et le petit monstre à l’intérieur n’a envie que d’une chose… de BONBONS ! Collectez les étoiles dorées, découvrez les prix cachés et débloquez de nouveaux niveaux dans ce jeu addictif acclamé par la critique et au moteur physique réaliste!
data.desc_de: Ein geheimnisvolles Paket ist für dich angekommen. Es enthält ein kleines Monster, das nur eines will…BONBONS! Sammle goldene Sterne, entdecke versteckte Preise und schalte aufregende neue Level frei in diesem fast schon süchtig machenden, preisgekrönten Spiel, das die Gesetze der Physik berücksichtigt!
data.desc_es: Ha llegado un misterioso paquete, y el monstruito que hay dentro solo quiere una cosa… ¡CARAMELOS! ¡Consigue estrellas de oro, descubre premios ocultos y desbloquea nuevos y emocionantes niveles en este divertido, apasionante y premiado juego basado en los principios de la física!

data.title: 3D Darts
data.description: Darts 3D, a famous classic game now on your device in gorgeous 3D, defeat opponents in hundreds of levels. Or just play with your friends on one device. Just throw the dart and get a score. Very easy to start, but hard to master.
data.desc_en: Darts 3D, a famous classic game now on your device in gorgeous 3D, defeat opponents in hundreds of levels. Or just play with your friends on one device. Just throw the dart and get a score. Very easy to start, but hard to master.

data.title: Alpha Guns
data.description: Alpha Guns a 2D side scroller shooter with classic gameplay and unique mechanics. Play as a soldier from the Elite Force!
data.desc_en: Alpha Guns a 2D side scroller shooter with classic gameplay and unique mechanics. Play as a soldier from the Elite Force!

data.title: Angry Gran
data.description: Play the game that began the Angry Gran series and take to the streets and whack those punk neighbors!
data.desc_en: Play the game that began the Angry Gran series and take to the streets and whack those punk neighbors!

data.title: Go Chicken Go
data.description: The chickens escaped from their hideous farm and the last obstacle between them and an everlasting life of freedom is a mere highway. Test your cold blood and truck dodging skills. 25 chickens put their lives in your trustworthy hands. Go Chicken Go!
data.desc_en: The chickens escaped from their hideous farm and the last obstacle between them and an everlasting life of freedom is a mere highway. Test your cold blood and truck dodging skills. 25 chickens put their lives in your trustworthy hands. Go Chicken Go!

data.title: Hair Do Design 2
data.description: It's your first day of college and you want to change yourself to be the most stylish girl at campus with different hair styles. It's your time to shine: no makeup is complete without some amazing hair styles! Wash it all off to try new creative hair stylish shapes & ideas!
data.desc_en: It's your first day of college and you want to change yourself to be the most stylish girl at campus with different hair styles. It's your time to shine: no makeup is complete without some amazing hair styles! Wash it all off to try new creative hair stylish shapes & ideas!

data.title: Foot Chinko World Cup
data.description: Foot Chinko World Cup features a different take on soccer games with a unique blend of pachinko and pinball. As fun as soccer can get!
data.desc_en: Foot Chinko World Cup features a different take on soccer games with a unique blend of pachinko and pinball. As fun as soccer can get!

data.title: Calming Lia
data.description: Save a little girl from her nightmares! Calming Lia is a relaxing match-three game. Like a lullaby, it is best played at night before sleeping. Help Lia and her plush friend, Bao the bear, rescue her dreams from the horrors of the evil Boogie Man!
data.desc_it: Calming Lia è un rilassante gioco match-3 per dispositivi mobili. Come una ninna nanna, è meglio giocarlo di sera prima di dormire. Aiuta Lia e l'orso Bao, il suo amico peluche, a salvare i suoi sogni dagli orrori del malvagio Boogie Man!
data.desc_en: Save a little girl from her nightmares! Calming Lia is a relaxing match-three game. Like a lullaby, it is best played at night before sleeping. Help Lia and her plush friend, Bao the bear, rescue her dreams from the horrors of the evil Boogie Man!
data.desc_fr: Sauvez une petite fille de ses cauchemars! Calming Lia est un jeu mobile relaxant, gratuit, de type match 3 Comme une berceuse, il vaut mieux y jouer le soir avant de dormir. Aidez Lia et son ami Bao l’ours en peluche et sauvez ses rêves des horreurs du terrible croque-mitaine!
data.desc_de: Rette ein kleines Lia vor ihren Albträumen! Calming Lia ist ein kostenloses, entspannendes Match-3-Spiel für mobile Geräte. Wie ein Schlaflied wird es am besten abends vor dem Schlafengehen gespielt. Hilf Lia und ihrem Plüschfreund Bao dem Bären, ihre Träume vor dem Bösen Boogie Man zu retten!
data.desc_es: ¡Salva a una niña de sus pesadillas! Calming Lia es un relajante juego de tres en raya para móvil. Como una nana, lo mejor es jugar por la noche, antes de dormir. ¡Ayuda a Lia y al osito Bao, su peludo amigo, a rescatar sus sueños de los horrores del malvado Hombre del Saco!

data.title: Cut the Rope Experiments
data.description: The little green monster Om Nom is back and hungrier than ever! Team up with the Professor, a mad (but not bad!) scientist determined to study Om Nom’s candy-loving behavior through a series of experiments, 200 levels and more to come!
data.desc_it: Il piccolo mostriciattolo verde Om Nom è tornato più affamato che mai! Unisciti al Professore, uno scienziato pazzo (ma non cattivo) determinato a studiare l'amore per le caramelle di Om Nom, attraverso una serie di esperimenti, 200 livelli e altri in arrivo!
data.desc_en: The little green monster Om Nom is back and hungrier than ever! Team up with the Professor, a mad (but not bad!) scientist determined to study Om Nom’s candy-loving behavior through a series of experiments, 200 levels and more to come!
data.desc_fr: Le petit monstre vert Om Nom est de retour et il est plus affamé que jamais! Faites équipe avec le Professeur, un savant un peu fou (mais pas voyou!) résolu à étudier le goût prononcé de Om Nom pour les bonbons à l'aide d'expérimentations en tout genre. Dévoiler les prix cachés et déverrouiller de nouveaux niveaux!
data.desc_de: Das kleine grüne Monster Om Nom ist zurück und hungriger, als jemals zuvor! Hilf dem verrückten (aber nicht bösen) Professor, Om Noms Gier nach Bonbons mittels einer Reihe von Experimenten zu erforschen. Preise zu entdecken und neue Levels freizuschalten!
data.desc_es: ¡El monstruito verde Om Nom ha vuelto y está más hambriento que nunca! Únete al Profesor, un científico loco (¡que no malvado!) decidido a estudiar la razón por la que Om Nom adora los caramelos a través de una serie de experimentos. ¡Descubrir premios ocultos y desbloquear nuevos niveles!

data.title: Guns n Glory Heroes
data.description: The kingdom has been attacked and all castles are under siege! Dreadful orcs and fearsome dragons roam the land! Join the heroes in their epic defense against this evil menace and become a part of the legend!
data.desc_it: Il regno è stato attaccato e tutti i castelli sono sotto assedio! Orchi cattivi e draghi senza paura regnano indisturbati. Unisciti agli eroi del gioco nella loro epica difesa contro le forze del male e diventa anche tu parte della leggenda!
data.desc_en: The kingdom has been attacked and all castles are under siege! Dreadful orcs and fearsome dragons roam the land! Join the heroes in their epic defense against this evil menace and become a part of the legend!
data.desc_fr: Le royaume a été attaqué et tous les châteaux sont assiégés! De terribles Orques et des dragons redoutables rôdent dans la contrée! Rejoignez les héros dans leur lutte épique contre cette menace maléfique et entrez dans la légende!
data.desc_de: Das Königreich ist im Krieg und jede einzelne Burg wird belagert! Grausame Orks, abtrünnige Elfen und mächtige Drachen haben sich aus der Unterwelt erhoben und ziehen mit zerstörerischer Macht durch die Lande. Setze alles ein, was Deine verbündeten Helden bieten können und werde zum Teil der Legende!
data.desc_es: El reino está en peligro: ¡el enemigo ha asediado todos los castillos y un ejército de horribles orcos y temibles dragones campa a sus anchas por nuestras tierras! ¡Únete a un grupo de héroes, defiende el reino de esta terrible amenaza y conviértete en leyenda!

data.title: Tom & Jerry Mouse Maze
data.description: Cheese is everywhere and Jerry is on a mission to get it all! But Jerry must be careful as Tom is on the prowl. Help Jerry race through fun-packed levels collecting cheese while avoiding Tom in this classic game of cat and mouse.
data.desc_it: Il formaggio è dappertutto e Jerry ha il compito di raccoglierlo tutto! Ma deve stare attento a Tom che è sempre in agguato. Aiuta Jerry a portare a termine la sua missione di raccolta del formaggio attraverso tanti livelli divertenti, cercando di proteggerlo da Tom, in questo classico gioco del gatto e del topo.
data.desc_en: Cheese is everywhere and Jerry is on a mission to get it all! But Jerry must be careful as Tom is on the prowl. Help Jerry race through fun-packed levels collecting cheese while avoiding Tom in this classic game of cat and mouse.
data.desc_fr: Le fromage est partout et Jerry a pour mission de tout collecter ! Mais il faut faire attention puisque Tom est à l'affût. Aidez  Jerry à parcourir les divertissants niveaux en collectant le fromage tout en évitant Tom dans ce jeu classique du chat et de la souris.
data.desc_de: Der Käse ist überall verteilt und Jerry will ihn haben! Aber er muss vorsichtig sein, weil Tom sich umherschleicht. Hilf Jerry bei der rasenden Jagd nach dem Käse durch die abwechslungsreichen Ebenen des Katze und Maus Klassikers und vermeide vor allem, dass er Tom trifft.
data.desc_es: ¡Hay queso en todas partes y Jerry tiene la misión de conseguirlo todo! Pero debe tener cuidado, ya que Tom está al acecho. Ayuda a Jerry a recorrer niveles llenos de diversión recogiendo queso mientras escapa de Tom en este clásico juego del gato y el ratón.

data.title: Badland
data.description: BADLAND is an award-winning atmospheric side-scrolling action adventure platformer set in a gorgeous forest full of various inhabitants, trees and flowers. Although the forest appears to be right out of a beautiful fairy tale, there’s something terribly wrong. The player controls one of the forest dwellers to find out what’s going on, and discovers an astonishing number of imaginative traps and obstacles on the way.
data.desc_it: BADLAND è un gioco atmosferico a piattaforma pluripremiato, ricco di azione e avventura, ambientato in una stupenda foresta pullulante di una varietà di abitanti, alberi e fiori. Sebbene la foresta sembri uscita da una bella favola, nasconde qualcosa di terribile. Gioca attraverso uno degli abitanti della foresta per scoprire di cosa si tratta. Nel corso della tua avventura, troverai un gran numero di trappole e ostacoli ingegnosi.
data.desc_en: BADLAND is an award-winning atmospheric side-scrolling action adventure platformer set in a gorgeous forest full of various inhabitants, trees and flowers. Although the forest appears to be right out of a beautiful fairy tale, there’s something terribly wrong. The player controls one of the forest dwellers to find out what’s going on, and discovers an astonishing number of imaginative traps and obstacles on the way.
data.desc_fr: BADLAND est un jeu primé d'aventure-action à défilement horizontal qui se déroule dans une magnifique forêt luxuriante, remplie de drôles d'habitants, de fleurs et d'arbres. Bien que la forêt ait l'air de sortir tout droit d'un conte de fées, l'atmosphère semble vraiment très étrange... Vous contrôlez l'un des habitants de la forêt pour découvrir ce qui s'y passe. Tout au long de votre périple, vous découvrirez tout un tas de pièges et d'obstacles plus ingénieux les uns que les autres.
data.desc_de: BADLAND ist ein preisgekrönter, atmosphärischer Action-Adventure-Sidescroller und Plattformer, der in einem wunderschönen Wald voller unterschiedlicher Bewohner, Bäume und Blumen spielt. Zwar wirkt der Wald, als sei er einem zauberhaften Märchen entsprungen, doch scheint dort etwas ganz und gar nicht zu stimmen. Der Spieler steuert einen der Waldbewohner, um herauszufinden, was los ist. Auf seiner Reise entdeckt er eine erstaunliche Anzahl an einfallsreichen Fallen und Hindernissen.
data.desc_es: BADLAND es un aclamado y llamativo juego de plataformas lleno de acción y aventura que se desarrolla en un exuberante bosque plagado de árboles, flores y seres de lo más pintorescos. Aunque el escenario del juego parece sacado de un cuento de hadas... algo terrible sucede en este bosque. El jugador, que controla a uno de los seres que en él habitan, tendrá que descubrir qué está pasando. Durante su aventura, tendrá que sortear una sorprendente cantidad de ingeniosas trampas y obstáculos.

data.title: Doodle Creatures
data.description: What happens if you combine an elephant with a flamingo? In Doodle Creatures you can find out as you create hundreds of fantastic and unique Creatures by combining different animals. Take the speed of a cheetah and combine with flying ability of an eagle. Awesomeness awaits!
data.desc_it: Vesti i panni di Dio e crea un universo popolato da creature meravigliose! Dai creatori del premiato rompicapo Doodle God arriva una nuova Avventura per ogni età!
data.desc_en: What happens if you combine an elephant with a flamingo? In Doodle Creatures you can find out as you create hundreds of fantastic and unique Creatures by combining different animals. Take the speed of a cheetah and combine with flying ability of an eagle. Awesomeness awaits!
data.desc_fr: Jouez à être Dieu & créez un incroyable Univers de Créatures ! D'après les créateurs du jeu d'énigmes récompensé Doodle God, voici une nouvelle aventure pour tous les âges!
data.desc_de:
"Spiele Gott und erschaffe ein unglaubliches Universum mit Kreaturen!
Von den Machern des preisgekrönten Rätselspiels Doodle God kommt jetzt ein neues Abenteuer für Spieler aller Altersgruppen!"
data.desc_es: ¡Juega a ser dios y crea un universo de criaturas maravillosas! ¡De la mano de los creadores del galardonado puzle Doodle God llega una nueva aventura para todas las edades!

data.title: TenTrix
data.description: TenTrix is easy to play and a pleasurable game for all ages! Simply drag the blocks and fill up all colored grids. Once you start, you will definitely be hooked: this 3D-style game awaits you!
data.desc_it: TenTrix è un gioco facile e divertente per tutte le età! Trascina i blocchi e riempi tutte le griglie colorate. Una volta iniziato, non potrete decisamente farne a meno: questo gioco in stile 3D vi aspetta!
data.desc_en: TenTrix is easy to play and a pleasurable game for all ages! Simply drag the blocks and fill up all colored grids. Once you start, you will definitely be hooked: this 3D-style game awaits you!
data.desc_fr: Jusqu'où peux-tu aller avant de ne plus avoir d'espace dans ce tout nouveau jeu de casse-tête ? Pour le savoir, lance-toi dans une partie folle de TenTrix!
data.desc_de: Können Sie passen alle Blöcke in der 10 x 10-Raster und machen ganze Zeilen und Spalten zu? Alle Bausteine, aus denen sich eine ganze Zeile oder Spalte verschwinden, so dass mehr Raum für neue Blöcke in das Raster passen. Wenn Sie Ihre Blöcke nicht mehr in das Raster platzieren können, verlieren Sie das Spiel. Viel Spaß beim Spielen dieses Challening Block Spiels abgeleitet aus dem Arcade-Klassikers Tetris!
data.desc_es: TenTrix es un juego fácil y divertido para todas las edades! Arrastre los bloques y llenar todas las cuadrículas de colores. Una vez iniciado, puede definitivamente no prescindir de él: este juego en el estilo 3D te espera!

data.title: King of Thieves
data.description: Dodge traps and steal gold in King of Thieves HTML5 from the makers of award-winning Cut the Rope, loved by millions of players worldwide! Break into enemies’ dungeons and steal their treasures. Prove you’re the smartest and the most skillful. PLEASE NOTE: the game is extremely addictive and inevitably leads to increasing the number of your friends!
data.desc_it: Eludi le trappole e ruba l'oro in King of Thieves HTML5, un nuovo gioco offerto dagli ideatori del premiato Cut the Rope, apprezzato da milioni di giocatori in tutto il mondo! Irrompi nelle segrete dei nemici e ruba i loro tesori. Dimostra di essere il più furbo e abile. FATE ATTENZIONE: il gioco può creare dipendenza e porta inevitabilmente ad un aumento vertiginoso dei propri amici!
data.desc_en: Dodge traps and steal gold in King of Thieves HTML5 from the makers of award-winning Cut the Rope, loved by millions of players worldwide! Break into enemies’ dungeons and steal their treasures. Prove you’re the smartest and the most skillful. PLEASE NOTE: the game is extremely addictive and inevitably leads to increasing the number of your friends!
data.desc_fr: Mettez vos talents de voleur à l'épreuve dans ce mélange unique de jeu de plateformes et de jeu multijoueur JcJ. Profitez de cette expérience époustouflante avec King of Thieves, l'un des meilleurs jeux de 2015. Rivalisez avec plus de 24 millions de joueurs dans le monde et créez votre propre clan de voleurs. Introduisez-vous dans le donjon de vos ennemis et volez leurs trésors. Prouvez que vous êtes plus intelligent et plus adroit. REMARQUE : le jeu est très addictif et vous fera inévitablement rencontrer de nouveaux amis.
data.desc_de: Versuche dein diebisches Geschick in dieser einzigartigen Mischung aus Plattformspiel und PvP-Mehrspielerspiel. Erlebe mit King of Thieves, 2015 einem der besten Spiele bei Google Play, ein umwerfendes Erlebnis. Tritt gegen mehr als 24 Millionen Spieler aus der ganzen Welt an und gründe deine eigene Diebesgilde. Brich in die Verliese deiner Gegner ein und raube ihre Schätze. Beweise, dass du am schlausten und geschicktesten bist. BITTE BEACHTE: Das Spiel ist überaus fesselnd und führt unweigerlich dazu, neue Freundschaften zu schließen.
data.desc_es: Prueba tus dotes como ladrón en este juego, una combinación única de plataformas y JcJ multijugador. Disfruta de una espectacular experiencia con King of Thieves, uno de los mejores juegos en 2015. Compite con más de 24 millones de usuarios en todo el mundo y crea tu propio clan de ladrones. Invade las mazmorras de tus enemigos y roba sus tesoros. Demuestra que eres el más listo y el más habilidoso. NOTA: Este juego es sumamente adictivo y provoca de manera inevitable un aumento en el número de amigos.

data.title: 1941 Frozen Front
data.description: Lead German forces on the rise towards the East or defend mother Russia on the Soviet side. Choose the right tactic of warfare and earn your stripes as an ingenious Commander at the FROZEN FRONT! Experience mind-blowing World War 2 battles in the brilliant new military STRATEGY-sim by HandyGames™!
data.desc_it: Guida le forze tedesche nella campagna orientale, o difendi la Madre Russia sul fronte sovietico. Scegli le tattiche belliche migliori, e guadagnati i gradi nei panni di abile Comandante con FROZEN FRONT! Vivi le battaglie più intense della II Guerra Mondiale nella nuova, brillante simulazione strategica di HandyGames™!
data.desc_en: Lead German forces on the rise towards the East or defend mother Russia on the Soviet side. Choose the right tactic of warfare and earn your stripes as an ingenious Commander at the FROZEN FRONT! Experience mind-blowing World War 2 battles in the brilliant new military STRATEGY-sim by HandyGames™!
data.desc_fr: Menez les forces allemandes lors de la poussée vers l'Est ou défendez la mère patrie du côté soviétique. Choisissez la bonne tactique de guerre et gagnez vos galons en commandant de manière ingénieuse dans FROZEN FRONT ! Découvrez des batailles de la seconde guerre mondiale époustouflantes dans la toute nouvelle simulation militaire et STRATÉGIQUE de HandyGames™!
data.desc_de: Führe deutsche Streitkräfte auf dem Vormarsch nach Osten oder verteidige Mütterchen Russland auf der sowjetischen Seite. Wähle die richtige Kriegsführungstaktik und verdiene dir deine Sporen als genialer Kommandant an der Front in FROZEN FRONT! Erlebe überwältigende Schlachten des 2. Weltkriegs in dem brillanten neuen Militär-Strategie-Simulator von HandyGames™!
data.desc_es: Dirige al ejército alemán en su conquista del este o defiende a la madre Rusia luchando por el lado soviético. ¡Elige la táctica de combate adecuada y álzate como el mejor comandante de FROZEN FRONT! ¡Vive alucinantes batallas ambientadas en la 2 Guerra Mundial gracias el nuevo simulador de ESTRATEGIA militar de HandyGames™!

data.title: Gemcrafter
data.description: Join Jim Kraftwerk on his journey and get ready for some three-of-a-kind matching, precious stones crafting and treasure hunting action. Do you have what it takes to become a true Gemcrafter?
data.desc_it: Prendi parte al viaggio di Jim Kraftwerk e preparati ad abbinare tris di gemme, produrre pietre preziose, risolvere rompicapi e trovare tesori. Sarai in grado di diventare un vero creatore di gemme?
data.desc_en: Join Jim Kraftwerk on his journey and get ready for some three-of-a-kind matching, precious stones crafting and treasure hunting action. Do you have what it takes to become a true Gemcrafter?
data.desc_fr: Prêtez main-forte à Jim Kraftwerk lors de son périple et préparez-vous à plonger dans le feu de l'action! Au programme: un gameplay captivant dans la plus pure tradition des match-3, des pierres précieuses à tailler avec brio, des casse-tête à résoudre et d'innombrables trésors à dénicher! Avez-vous l'étoffe d'un aventurier pure souche?
data.desc_de: Begleite Jim Kraftwerk auf seiner Reise und bereite dich auf Action mit 3-Gewinnt-Spiel, Fertigen von Edelsteinen, Lösen von Rätseln und Schatzsuche vor. Hast du das Zeug zu einem echten Gemcrafter?
data.desc_es: Únete a Jim Kraftwerk en su periplo y prepárate para jugar al 3 en raya, elaborar piedras preciosas, resolver puzles y buscar tesoros. ¿Tienes lo que hay que tener para convertirte en un auténtico héroe?

data.title: Monster Hospital
data.description: Monster Hospital is a free interactive game for kids: the perfect combination of fun and learning! With 3 Mini games to play, your kids will learn about medical care and will enjoy child doctoring!
data.desc_it:
Monster Hospital è un gioco interattivo per ragazzi: la combinazione perfetta di divertimento e apprendimento!
Con 3 mini-giochi da giocare, i vostri ragazzi impareranno a prestare cure mediche e si divertiranno nel ruolo del medico pediatra!
data.desc_en: Monster Hospital is a free interactive game for kids: the perfect combination of fun and learning! With 3 Mini games to play, your kids will learn about medical care and will enjoy child doctoring!
data.desc_fr:
Monstre hôpital est libre interactif pour enfants jeu. Nos jeux pour les enfants sont la combinaison parfaite de divertissement et d'apprentissage! 
Laissez vos enfants, essayez ce jeu pour le plaisir et la connaissance. Le Monster Hospital - Jeu enfants ont 3 mini-jeux pour les enfants à jouer. Vos enfants vont apprendre sur les soins médicaux et profiter de raclage des enfants
data.desc_de:
Monster Hospital ist kostenlos interaktive Kinder-Spiel. Unsere Spiele für Kinder sind die perfekte Kombination aus Spaß und Lernen! 
Lassen Sie Ihre Kinder versuchen Sie dieses Spiel für Spaß und Wissen. Das Monster Hospital - Free Kids Spiel haben 3 Mini-Spiele für Kinder, um zu spielen. Ihre Kinder werden über medizinische Versorgung lernen und genießen Kind Rakel.
data.desc_es:
Monster Hospital es libre juego de los niños interactivos. Nuestros juegos para los niños son la combinación perfecta de diversión y aprendizaje! 
Deje que sus niños tratan de este juego para la diversión y el conocimiento. El Hospital Monster - Juego de niños tienen 3 mini juegos para que los niños jueguen. Sus hijos aprenderán acerca de la atención médica y disfrutar doctoring niño.

data.title: Bomber Friends
data.description: Bomb your friends and be the last to survive to win the match! Collect power-ups to get more powerful bombs! Use the explosive bombs to blast your friends from across the map!
data.desc_it:
Bombarda i tuoi amici e sii l'unico superstite per vincere la partita!
Colleziona punti energia per avere le bombe più potenti! Usa le bombe esplosive per distruggere e far schizzare i tuoi amici fuori dalla mappa!
data.desc_en: Bomb your friends and be the last to survive to win the match! Collect power-ups to get more powerful bombs! Use the explosive bombs to blast your friends from across the map!
data.desc_fr: Fais exploser tes amis et remporte le match en étant le dernier survivant! Ramasse les bonus pour obtenir des bombes toujours plus puissantes! Utilise les bombes explosives pour souffler tes amis à travers toute la carte!
data.desc_de: Bombardieren Sie Ihre Freunde und überleben Sie die Partie als einziger Gewinner! Sammeln Sie Powerups, um schwerere Bomben werfen zu können! Schießen Sie Ihre Freunde mit diesen explosiven Bomben aus dem Weg!
data.desc_es:
¡Bombardea a tus amigos y sé el último en sobrevivir para ganar la partida!
¡Reúne powerups para tener más bombas potentes! ¡Usa las bombas explosivas para arrasar a tus amigos por todo el mapa!

data.title: Cut The Rope: Time Travel
data.description: Join Om Nom as he travels back in time to feed his ancestors with candy. Cut the Rope: Time Travel is a completely new adventure filled with time-traveling, candy-crunching, physics-based action!
data.desc_it:
Viaggia indietro nel tempo assieme a Om Nom per far mangiare bonbon ai suoi antenati. Cut the Rope: Time Travel è un’avventura completamente nuova ricca di azione basata sulla fisica, con viaggi nel tempo e bonbon da sgranocchiare.
Con due adorabili mostriciattoli da nutrire in ogni livello, Cut the Rope: Time Travel raddoppia il divertimento ma con lo stile di gioco che conosci.
data.desc_en: Join Om Nom as he travels back in time to feed his ancestors with candy. Cut the Rope: Time Travel is a completely new adventure filled with time-traveling, candy-crunching, physics-based action!
data.desc_fr: Remonte le temps avec Om Nom pour nourrir ses ancêtres avec des bonbons ! Cut the Rope: Time Travel est une nouvelle aventure remplie d'action et basée sur la physique qui te fera voyager à travers le temps pour aller croquer du bonbon!
data.desc_de: Reise mit Om Nom in die Vergangenheit, um seine Vorfahren mit Süßigkeiten zu füttern. Cut the Rope: Time Travel ist ein völlig neues Abenteuer voller zeitreisender, Süßigkeiten-mampfender, Physik-basierender Action!
data.desc_es: Únete a Om Nom mientras retrocede en el tiempo para hacer llegar los caramelos a sus antepasados. Cut the Rope: Time Travel es una aventura completamente nueva llena de viajes en el tiempo, caramelos y acción basada en la física.

data.title: Tap the Frog Doodle
data.description: Tap the Frog Doodle features hours of gameplay, diverse mini-games filled with light-hearted humor and achievements to keep you coming back for more. Easy to pick-up yet challenging to master, Tap the Frog Doodle will have your fingers begging for more alone time with the cutest frog on your device.
data.desc_it: In Tap the Frog Doodle avrete a disposizione ore e ore di gioco, tanti mini-giochi pieni di divertimento e obiettivi da raggiungere di ogni tipo. Facile da imparare ma difficile da vincere a pieni voti, toccate la rana per allenare le vostre dita con la ranocchia più carina di tutto internet.
data.desc_en: Tap the Frog Doodle features hours of gameplay, diverse mini-games filled with light-hearted humor and achievements to keep you coming back for more. Easy to pick-up yet challenging to master, Tap the Frog Doodle will have your fingers begging for more alone time with the cutest frog on your device.
data.desc_fr: Tap the Frog Doodle propose des heures de jeu, avec ses niveaux à l'humour contagieux et ses succès à remporter qui te donneront envie de jouer encore plus ! Facile à prendre en main, mais difficile à maîtriser, Tap the Frog Doodle est un véritable concentré de fun qui va rendre tes doigts complètement accros à cette adorable petite grenouille.
data.desc_de: Tap the Frog Doodle verfügt über stundenlangen Spielspaß, diverse Minispiele voller unbeschwertem Humor und Erfolge, die dich immer weiterspielen lassen. Tap the Frog Doodle ist einfach zu verstehen, aber schwierig zu meistern und deine Finger werden nach mehr Zeit mit dem niedlichsten Frosch auf deinem Gerät betteln.
data.desc_es: Tap the Frog Doodle ofrece horas de jugabilidad, diversos niveles repletos de humor desenfadado y retos para que tengas que volver a jugar una y otra vez. Fácil de entender, pero difícil de dominar, Tap the Frog Doodle hará que tus dedos te pidan más tiempo con la ranita más mona en tu dispositivo. Así que, ¿qué estás esperando? Comienza la acción. Hazte con Tap the Frog Doodle.

data.title: Street Freekick 3D
data.description: Street Freekick 3D takes freekick game in modern city streets. Curve the ball and defeat opponents in hundreds of levels in gorgeous 3D. Play on any of your devices. Just kick the ball in gates and get a score. Very easy to start, but hard to master.
data.desc_en: Street Freekick 3D takes freekick game in modern city streets. Curve the ball and defeat opponents in hundreds of levels in gorgeous 3D. Play on any of your devices. Just kick the ball in gates and get a score. Very easy to start, but hard to master.

data.title: Beach Bowling 3D
data.description: Beach Bowling 3D is a game where you can test your bowling skills on summer beach in gorgeous 3D. Defeat opponents in hundreds of levels. Or just play with your friends on one device. Just throw the ball and get a score. Very easy to start, but hard to master.
data.desc_en: Beach Bowling 3D is a game where you can test your bowling skills on summer beach in gorgeous 3D. Defeat opponents in hundreds of levels. Or just play with your friends on one device. Just throw the ball and get a score. Very easy to start, but hard to master.

data.title: Mafia Billiard Tricks
data.description: Mafia Billiard Tricks is a billiard arcade game in which you can play the challenging game of billiards. You are not only playing for fun though; your opponents are part of the infamous mafia. You must earn their respect by beating each crew member!
data.desc_en: Mafia Billiard Tricks is a billiard arcade game in which you can play the challenging game of billiards. You are not only playing for fun though; your opponents are part of the infamous mafia. You must earn their respect by beating each crew member!

data.title: Pudding Monsters
data.description: The Pudding Monsters are on a mission to save their friends from the cold-hearted fridge owner! Growing into an ULTIMATE MEGA MONSTER sounds like the most reliable plan. Off the table, out of the house, and into the city – swipe to stick the Pudding Monsters together and save their friends!
data.desc_it: I mostri-budino sono in missione per salvare i loro amici dalle gelide grinfie del proprietario del frigorifero. Crescere fino a diventare un incredibile MEGA MOSTRO sembra il piano più affidabile. Sul tavolo, fuori casa, in città... Fai scivolare il dito per unire i mostri e salva i loro amici!
data.desc_en: The Pudding Monsters are on a mission to save their friends from the cold-hearted fridge owner! Growing into an ULTIMATE MEGA MONSTER sounds like the most reliable plan. Off the table, out of the house, and into the city – swipe to stick the Pudding Monsters together and save their friends!
data.desc_fr: Les monstres sont en mission pour sauver leurs amis d'un propriétaire de frigo sans coœur! Devenir un SUPER MONSTRE ULTIME semble être le meilleur plan…Depuis la table jusqu'aux abords de la maison, pour finir au cœur de la ville – agglutinez ensemble les monstres et sauvez leurs amis!
data.desc_de: Die Pudding Monster riskieren Kopf und Kragen, um ihre Freunde vor dem kaltherzigen Kühlschrankbesitzer zu retten! Ein ULTIMATIVES MEGAMONSTER zu erschaffen, scheint da ein todsicherer Plan zu sein. Die Pudding Monster riskieren Kopf und Kragen, um ihre Freunde vor dem kaltherzigen Kühlschrankbesitzer zu retten! Ein ULTIMATIVES MEGAMONSTER zu erschaffen, scheint da ein todsicherer Plan zu sein.
data.desc_es: ¡Los Pudding Monsters tienen como misión salvar a sus amigos del despiadado dueño de la nevera! ¡Crecer y crecer hasta ser el MEGAMONSTRUO DEFINITIVO parece ser el plan más fiable. Escapa de la mesa, de la casa... ¡y sal a la ciudad! ¡Arrastra a los Pudding Monsters para pegarlos unos a otros y salva a sus amigos!

data.title: Baseball Hero
data.description: Hit your baseballs hard and... avoid bombs and tomatoes! Improve your ability hitting multiple balls from different positions. You'll become a Baseball Hero!
data.desc_en: Hit your baseballs hard and... avoid bombs and tomatoes! Improve your ability hitting multiple balls from different positions. You'll become a Baseball Hero!

data.title: Grand Prix Hero
data.description: Compete across multiple continents as you race in the Grand Prix Series. Dodge traffic, boost at high speeds, collect coins and upgrade your car for the next race. Are you the Grand Prix Hero?
data.desc_it: Completa la gara in diversi continenti nella serie di Formula 1 Grand Prix. Supera il traffico, procedi ad alta velocità, raccogli monete e potenzia la tua auto per la prossima gara. Sei tu l'eroe del Gran Premio?
data.desc_en: Compete across multiple continents as you race in the Grand Prix Series. Dodge traffic, boost at high speeds, collect coins and upgrade your car for the next race. Are you the Grand Prix Hero?

data.title: Tower Mania
data.description: Build your towers in a fantastic futuristic world in the simplest one-click manner! Place floating blocks as precisely as you can and discover all the wonderful locations!
data.desc_it: Costruisci le torri in un fantastico mondo futuristico con la modalità più semplice che c'è: click dopo click! Posiziona i blocchi precisamente l'uno sull'altro e visita magnifiche località nel mondo!
data.desc_en: Build your towers in a fantastic futuristic world in the simplest one-click manner! Place floating blocks as precisely as you can and discover all the wonderful locations!

data.title: Nail Doctor
data.description: Nail Surgery is an innovative concept as of today. Our mission is to make awesome educational games for kids using an interactive, first-hand virtual surgery experience. Everyone knows that medicine and surgery are bit of boring and weird topic , but we believe that our visitors need an enjoyable, goal-oriented interactive experience to fully grasp the complex or unfamiliar concepts of surgery.
data.desc_it: La chirurgia delle unghie oggi è diventato un concetto molto innovativo. La nostra missione è costruire giochi educativi per ragazzi usando un'esperienza interattiva e virtuale in prima persona. Tutti sanno che la medicina e la chirurgia sono argomenti noiosi e un po' strani, ma noi crediamo che i nostri utenti abbiano bisogno di un'esperienza diretta, divertente e per obiettivi, per comprendere appieno lo sconosciuto mondo della chirurgia.
data.desc_en: Nail Surgery is an innovative concept as of today. Our mission is to make awesome educational games for kids using an interactive, first-hand virtual surgery experience. Everyone knows that medicine and surgery are bit of boring and weird topic , but we believe that our visitors need an enjoyable, goal-oriented interactive experience to fully grasp the complex or unfamiliar concepts of surgery.
data.desc_fr: La chirurgie des ongles est un nouveau concept dans l'ère du temps; Notre but est de montrer aux enfants que la chirurgie peut être amusante grâce à cette simulation éducative. Prenez la direction du bloc et faites votre première intervention dès aujourd'hui!
data.desc_de: Nagel-Chirurgie ist ein innovatives Konzept von heute. Unsere Mission ist es genial Bildungschirurgie-Spiele für Kinder mit einem interaktiven, virtuellen erster Hand Chirurgie Erlebnis zu machen. Jeder weiß, dass Medizin und Chirurgie sind etwas langweilig und komisch Thema, aber wir glauben, dass unsere Besucher benötigen eine angenehme, zielorientierte interaktive Erfahrung vollständig zu erfassen die komplexen oder unbekannten Konzepte der Chirurgie.
data.desc_es: Cirugía de uñas es un concepto innovador a partir de hoy . Nuestra misión es hacer juegos impresionantes cirugía educativa para los niños usando una , de primera mano la experiencia cirugía virtual interactiva. Todo el mundo sabe que la medicina y la cirugía son poco de tema aburrido y raro , pero creemos que nuestros visitantes necesitan una experiencia interactiva divertida orientado a los objetivos de comprender plenamente los conceptos complejos o poco conocidos de la cirugía.

data.title: Boss Level - Pumpkin Madness
data.description: Enjoy this Halloween version of the Boss Level Shootout original game. Billy boy fell into a retro game console and is now fighting the boss!
data.desc_en: Enjoy this Halloween version of the Boss Level Shootout original game. Billy boy fell into a retro game console and is now fighting the boss!

data.title: Boss Level Shootout
data.description: Gamer boy Billy loved to play video games but one day his retro console ate him. Now Billy is inside the retro style game and must beat the bosses in this ultimate shootout. Test your skills in shooting, running, picking power-ups and be a winner!
data.desc_en: Gamer boy Billy loved to play video games but one day his retro console ate him. Now Billy is inside the retro style game and must beat the bosses in this ultimate shootout. Test your skills in shooting, running, picking power-ups and be a winner!

data.title: Stock Car Hero
data.description: Compete across North America as you race in the Stock Car Series. Dodge traffic, boost around banked corners, collect coins and upgrade your car for the next race. Are you the Stock Car Hero the world needs?
data.desc_en: Compete across North America as you race in the Stock Car Series. Dodge traffic, boost around banked corners, collect coins and upgrade your car for the next race. Are you the Stock Car Hero the world needs?

data.title: Soccer Hero
data.description: Choose your hero and compete against 3 fierce opponents in the World Soccer event. Will you win a Gold Medal by scoring all 3 chances? Be a Soccer Hero!
data.desc_en: Choose your hero and compete against 3 fierce opponents in the World Soccer event. Will you win a Gold Medal by scoring all 3 chances? Be a Soccer Hero!

data.title: Skating Hero
data.description: Choose your hero and compete across 3 programs in the Figure Skating event. Hit the matching button (or swipe) as they line up with the top slot. Time your moves perfectly to boost your score and win!
data.desc_en: Choose your hero and compete across 3 programs in the Figure Skating event. Hit the matching button (or swipe) as they line up with the top slot. Time your moves perfectly to boost your score and win!

data.title: Slalom Hero
data.description: Choose your hero and compete across 3 courses in the Slalom event. Steer between the slalom gates and collect boosts to improve your times. Will you win a Gold Medal? Be a Slalom Hero!
data.desc_en: Choose your hero and compete across 3 courses in the Slalom event. Steer between the slalom gates and collect boosts to improve your times. Will you win a Gold Medal? Be a Slalom Hero!

data.title: Hockey Hero
data.description: Choose your hero and compete against 3 fierce opponents in the Ice Hockey event. Avoid the attacking players to approach the goal line. Once in front of the goal time your shot to score! Will you win a Gold Medal by scoring in all 3 periods? Be a Hockey Hero!
data.desc_en: Choose your hero and compete against 3 fierce opponents in the Ice Hockey event. Avoid the attacking players to approach the goal line. Once in front of the goal time your shot to score! Will you win a Gold Medal by scoring in all 3 periods? Be a Hockey Hero!

data.title: Bouncy Dunk
data.description: Get ready, shoot, score and WIN: Bouncy Dunk will make your excitement grow! Test your skills by winning all the challenges and unlock special basketballs to grow your power and style! Become a Bouncy Champion NOW!
data.desc_en: Get ready, shoot, score and WIN: Bouncy Dunk will make your excitement grow! Test your skills by winning all the challenges and unlock special basketballs to grow your power and style! Become a Bouncy Champion NOW!

data.title: Chess Challenges
data.description: Test your wits playing against Rupert the Red King and solve all challenges. Chess Challenges wraps up the chess experience as a series of puzzles, making it more casual but still quite challenging!
data.desc_it: Metti alla prova il tuo spirito contro Rupert il Red King e risolvi tutte le sfide. Chess Challenges racchiude l'essenza degli Scacchi con una serie di rompicapo, rendendo il gioco più disinvolto ma pur sempre stimolante!
data.desc_en: Test your wits playing against Rupert the Red King and solve all challenges. Chess Challenges wraps up the chess experience as a series of puzzles, making it more casual but still quite challenging!

data.title: Happy Kittens Puzzle
data.description: A cute take on the grid puzzle game: your goal is to fill the board with happy cats by switching out all of the grumpy ones. Think ahead and switch the cats around until you solve all 60 puzzles!
data.desc_it: Ecco una versione carina del classico gioco puzzle a griglia: il tuo obiettivo è di riempire la tavola con i gatti felici, scambiandoli con quelli imbronciati. Ragionate bene prima di agire e ruotate le tessere fino a risolvere tutti e 60 i puzzle!
data.desc_en: A cute take on the grid puzzle game: your goal is to fill the board with happy cats by switching out all of the grumpy ones. Think ahead and switch the cats around until you solve all 60 puzzles!

data.title: Pop-Pop Candies
data.description: Enjoy a sweet puzzle as you pop-pop all the candies using strategy and fast reflexes! Featuring 100+ challenging puzzles and marathon endurance levels this colorful Match-3 Puzzle Shooter game will entertain for hours.
data.desc_it: Divertiti con questo rompicapo scoppiettando tutte le caramelle, usa una buona strategia e i riflessi più veloci che hai! Con 100+ puzzle e maratone a chi resiste di più, questo gioco diventerà il tuo passatempo preferito.
data.desc_en: Enjoy a sweet puzzle as you pop-pop all the candies using strategy and fast reflexes! Featuring 100+ challenging puzzles and marathon endurance levels this colorful Match-3 Puzzle Shooter game will entertain for hours.

data.title: Farm Blocks 10x10
data.description: Farm Blocks 10x10 is easy to play and a pleasurable game for all ages! Simply drag the blocks and fill up all colored grids. Once you start, you will definitely be hooked: this 3D-style game awaits you!
data.desc_it: Farm Blocks 10x10 è facile e divertente per giocatori di tutte le età! Semplicemente trascinate i blocchi e riempite tutte le griglie colorate. Una volta iniziato, non riuscirete a smettere: questo gioco in stile 3D vi aspetta!
data.desc_en: Farm Blocks 10x10 is easy to play and a pleasurable game for all ages! Simply drag the blocks and fill up all colored grids. Once you start, you will definitely be hooked: this 3D-style game awaits you!

data.title: Basket Champs
data.description: Basket Champs is the brand new game from the developer of Foot Chinko. Select your basketball team and play in World Championship.
data.desc_it: Preparati al campionato mondiale di Basket più bizzarro di sempre! Riuscirai a raggiungere l'ambita finale? Scegli la tua squadra, afferra la palla, prendi la mira e... sfida tutto il mondo con Basket Champs!
data.desc_en: Basket Champs is the brand new game from the developer of Foot Chinko. Select your basketball team and play in World Championship.

data.title: Blocky Warrior
data.description: Play Blocky Warrior, the brand new puzzle action game for every device. Defeat all the enemies and finish the game!
data.desc_it: Gioca a Blocky Warrior, il nuovo gioco puzzle d'azione per ogni dispositivo. Difendi tutti i nemici e completa il gioco!
data.desc_en: Play Blocky Warrior, the brand new puzzle action game for every device. Defeat all the enemies and finish the game!

data.title: Yeti Sensation
data.description: Bigfoot wanted! Help the embarrassed Yeti find a way to his new home, avoid sly snowmen, dangerous traps and other obstacles, buy new boosts in the supermarket and run away as further as possible!
data.desc_it: Bigfoot ricercato! Aiuta l'imbarazzato Yeti a ritrovare la strada verso la sua nuova casa, evita i pupazzi di neve, trappole pericolose e altri ostacoli, compra nuova energia nel supermercato e corri via più lontano possibile!
data.desc_en: Bigfoot wanted! Help the embarrassed Yeti find a way to his new home, avoid sly snowmen, dangerous traps and other obstacles, buy new boosts in the supermarket and run away as further as possible!

data.title: Baseball for Clowns
data.description: Henk was the best baseball player in the world before jokers cheated and defeated him with false means. And now, after Henk has retired, the jokers are back again to cause trouble! Help him get rid of the jokers once and for all!
data.desc_it: Henk era il miglior giocatore di baseball del mondo prima che dei pagliacci lo sconfissero imbrogliando. E ora, dopo che Henk si è ritirato, i pagliacci sono tornati per tormentarlo. Aiutalo a liberarsi di loro una volta per tutte!
data.desc_en: Henk was the best baseball player in the world before jokers cheated and defeated him with false means. And now, after Henk has retired, the jokers are back again to cause trouble! Help him get rid of the jokers once and for all!

data.title: Jelly Bomb
data.description: Jelly Bomb has spread all over your kitchen tables! You can get rid of it by dripping it with a jelly remover, but watch out: there are only a few drops left, you will have to use them wisely to ensure the perfect splashing chain reaction!
data.desc_it: Le Jelly Bomb si sono sparse per tutto il tavolo da cucina! Puoi sbarazzarti di loro con una magica pozione, ma attento: ne rimangono poche gocce! Usale con saggezza per scatenare un vero e proprio effetto domino di esplosioni!
data.desc_en: Jelly Bomb has spread all over your kitchen tables! You can get rid of it by dripping it with a jelly remover, but watch out: there are only a few drops left, you will have to use them wisely to ensure the perfect splashing chain reaction!

data.title: Doctor Teeth
data.description: Become a dentist and take care of your patients' teeth! Use different tools to treat caries, bad breath and extract teeth. Play fun mini games and use the stethoscope hints in case you're stuck on your to-do list. Can you give all your patients their smile back?
data.desc_it: Diventa un dentista e prenditi cura dei denti dei tuoi pazienti! Usa gli strumenti giusti per curare le carie, l'alito cattivo e per eseguire le estrazioni. Gioca ai mini giochi e usa gli aiuti in caso restassi bloccato nella lista delle cose da fare. Riuscirai a restituire un bel sorriso ai tuoi pazienti?
data.desc_en: Become a dentist and take care of your patients' teeth! Use different tools to treat caries, bad breath and extract teeth. Play fun mini games and use the stethoscope hints in case you're stuck on your to-do list. Can you give all your patients their smile back?

data.title: Fox Adventurer
data.description: Play Fox Adventurer and help Mr. Fox in his magical adventure.. Switch between day and night to choose the right way to finish level. Create stone clones to jump higher and collect green gems.
data.desc_it: Gioca a Fox Adventurer e aiuta il Sig.r Fox nella sua magica avventura…Cambia in modalità giorno o notte per trovare il giusto modo per completare il livello. Crea cloni di pietra per saltare più in alto e raccogli le gemme verdi.
data.desc_en: Play Fox Adventurer and help Mr. Fox in his magical adventure.. Switch between day and night to choose the right way to finish level. Create stone clones to jump higher and collect green gems.

data.title: Crazy Halloween Nail Doctor
data.description: Play an epic adventure story set during Halloween: the monsters have been injured by hunters and they urgently need a doctor, you are the only one who can help!
data.desc_it: Divertiti a vivere quest'avventura ambientata durante Halloween: i mostri sono stati feriti dai cacciatori e hanno urgentemente bisogno di un dottore, sei il solo a poterli aiutare!
data.desc_en: Play an epic adventure story set during Halloween: the monsters have been injured by hunters and they urgently need a doctor, you are the only one who can help!

data.title: Iceberg
data.description: Click the shapes that are hanging frozen in the air to unfreeze them. Then gravity will do its work, so you will need to think about the correct order. Have fun with Iceberg, a new physics game.
data.desc_it: Clicca le forme ghiacchiate che fluttuano in aria per scioglierle. Poi la gravità farà il suo corso, pensa bene all'ordine corretto. Divertiti con Iceberg, un gran bel gioco di fisica!
data.desc_en: Click the shapes that are hanging frozen in the air to unfreeze them. Then gravity will do its work, so you will need to think about the correct order. Have fun with Iceberg, a new physics game.

data.title: Little Alchemy
data.description: Explore what you can create by mixing simple elements.Start with four basic items and use them to create dinosaurs, unicorns and spaceships!
data.desc_it: Scopri cosa puoi creare semplicemente mischiando dei semplici elementi.Inizia con quattro elementi basici e usali per trovare dinosauri, unicorni e navette spaziali!
data.desc_en: Explore what you can create by mixing simple elements.Start with four basic items and use them to create dinosaurs, unicorns and spaceships!
data.desc_fr: Libérez votre pouvoir créatif! Commencez avec les quatre éléments de base et utilisez-les pour trouver des dinosaures, des licornes et des vaisseaux spatiaux!
data.desc_de: Beginne mit vier Grundelementen und benutze sie um Dinosaurier, Einhörne und Raumshiffe zu finden!
data.desc_es: ¡Comienza con cuatro elementos básicos y úsalos para encontrar dinosaurios, unicornios y naves espaciales!

data.title: Tap the Frog
data.description: Do you have what it takes to help the Frog jump, paint and spacewalk the way to his sweetheart? Join the Frog as he embarks on an adventure that will take him from the lily pads of his home pond to the farthest reaches of outer space. Easy to play yet challenging to master, this game will keep you entertained forever.
data.desc_it: Hai ciò che serve per aiutare Frog a saltare, colorare e volare fino alla sua anima gemella? Unisciti alla rana in quest'avventura che lo porterà fino nello spazio. Facile da giocare eppure pieno di sfide, non potrai farne a meno.
data.desc_en: Do you have what it takes to help the Frog jump, paint and spacewalk the way to his sweetheart? Join the Frog as he embarks on an adventure that will take him from the lily pads of his home pond to the farthest reaches of outer space. Easy to play yet challenging to master, this game will keep you entertained forever.
data.desc_fr: Seras-tu capable de faire bondir ta grenouille dans tous les sens, de l'aider à sauter en apesanteur et à peindre pour retrouver sa bien-aimée? Ta grenouille préférée est de retour dans Tap the Frog. Cette fois, elle a pour mission de devenir le prince des grenouilles! Rejoins ton amie la grenouille pour une aventure qui la mènera des nénuphars de sa mare natale aux confins de l'espace.
data.desc_de: Hilf dem Frosch zu hüpfen, zu malen und Raumspaziergängen auf dem Weg zu seinem Liebling zu meistern. Folge dem Frosch in ein Abenteuer, das ihn von den Seerosenblättern seines Heimatteiches zu den entferntesten Gegenden des Weltraums führt. Das Spiel ist einfach zu spielen, aber schwierig zu meistern und wird dich immer unterhalten.
data.desc_es: ¿Tienes lo que se necesitas para ayudar a la Rana a saltar, pintar y hacer una caminata espacial hacia su novia? La rana favorita de todo el mundo está de regreso en Tap the Frog, ¡y esta vez su misión es convertirse en un Príncipe Rana! Únete a la rana en una aventura que la llevará desde los nenúfares del estanque de su hogar hasta el extremo más recóndito del espacio exterior. Fácil de jugar pero difícil de dominar, Tap the Frog te mantendrá entretenido por siempre. ¡Veamos qué tan rápido eres realmente!

data.title: Brain Doctor
data.description: Brain Doctor, a really innovative concept game for kids. Become a surgeon and give different brain surgery treatment to different patients with the use of lots of medical equipment. Many tools to play like: Heartbeat Checking, Stethoscope, Thermometer, Blood Pressure, Injection, Banded, X-Ray, Germs Remover, Plaster.
data.desc_it: Un gioco concettuale davvero innovativo per bambini e non. Diventa chirurgo cerebrale e opera i tuoi pazienti  con l'uso di tantissime apparecchiature mediche. Avrai a disposizione tantissime funzionalità e strumenti con il quale compiere un'operazione memorabile: controllo del battito cardiaco, Stetoscopio, Termometro, Pressione sanguigna, Shock, Spruzzo d'acqua, Asciugatrice, Vuoto, Iniezione, Cotone, Scaricatore, Bende, Raggi X, Rimozione di germi, Medicine, Gesso.
data.desc_en: Brain Doctor, a really innovative concept game for kids. Become a surgeon and give different brain surgery treatment to different patients with the use of lots of medical equipment. Many tools to play like: Heartbeat Checking, Stethoscope, Thermometer, Blood Pressure, Injection, Banded, X-Ray, Germs Remover, Plaster.
data.desc_fr: Cerveau Docteur, jeu de concept très innovant pour les enfants. Vos enfants vont adorer ce jeu hargneux. Donner un traitement différent de la chirurgie du cerveau à différents patients avec l'utilisation de beaucoup de matériel médical. Ce est un jeu amusant et instructif + éducatif pour les enfants.
data.desc_de:
Gehirn-Doctor, wirklich innovative Konzept-Spiel für Kinder. Ihre Kinder werden mürrisch liebe dieses Spiel. Geben verschiedene Gehirnchirurgie Behandlung verschiedener Patienten mit der Verwendung von vielen medizinischen Geräten. 
Dies ist ein Spaß und informativ + Lernspiel für Kinder.
data.desc_es: Doctor cerebro, realmente innovador concepto de juego para los niños. A sus hijos les encantará este juego hosco. Dar un trato diferente cirugía cerebral para diferentes pacientes con el uso de una gran cantidad de equipos médicos. Este es un juego divertido y informativo + educativo para los niños.

data.title: Kids Kitchen
data.description: Are you ready to open your first restaurant? Grab your apron and chef's hat and let's open your restaurant. You are the restaurant star, challenge your customers for crazy eating and experience the master eating challenge!
data.desc_it: Siete pronti ad aprire il vostro primo ristorante? Armatevi di grembiule, cappello da Chef e avviate il vostro ristorante! Siete la star del ristorante, sfidate i vostri clienti a mangiare piatti stranissimi e provate la sola sfida-in-cucina!
data.desc_en: Are you ready to open your first restaurant? Grab your apron and chef's hat and let's open your restaurant. You are the restaurant star, challenge your customers for crazy eating and experience the master eating challenge!
data.desc_fr: Êtes-vous prêt à ouvrir votre premier restaurant? Prenez votre tablier et toque et nous allons ouvrir votre restaurant. Comme vous le défi étoiles de restaurant à vos clients pour fou manger et découvrir le défi principal de l'alimentation!
data.desc_de: Sind Sie bereit, Ihre erste Restaurant zu eröffnen? Schnappen Sie sich Ihre Schürze und Kochmütze und öffnen wir Ihr Restaurant. Wie Sie sind Restaurant-Sterne-Herausforderung für Ihre Kunden verrückt Essen und erleben Sie die Master-Essen Herausforderung!
data.desc_es: ¿Estás listo para abrir su primer restaurante? Coge tu delantal y gorro de cocinero y vamos a abrir su restaurante. Como es de su desafío estrellas restaurante a sus clientes para comer loco y experimenta el reto principal de comer!

data.title: Color Pin
data.description: Shoot colored balls into the rotating wheel. Prepare yourself for color combinations, changes in rotation, and other changes in the gameplay that gradually emerge. Timing and perception are key, so be careful as you will need to pay attention to the variety of colors and not hit the other balls.
data.desc_it: Sparate alle palle colorate nella ruota girevole. Preparatevi per combinazioni di colori, cambi di rotazione e altri cambiamenti nel gioco che emergono di volta in volta. La tempistica e la percezione sono di fondamentale importanza, quindi fate attenzione, perché dovrete stari attento alla varietà di colori e a non colpire le altre palle.
data.desc_en: Shoot colored balls into the rotating wheel. Prepare yourself for color combinations, changes in rotation, and other changes in the gameplay that gradually emerge. Timing and perception are key, so be careful as you will need to pay attention to the variety of colors and not hit the other balls.
data.desc_fr: Lancez des balles colorées dans une roue en mouvement. Préparez-vous à des combinaisons de couleurs, des changements de rotation et à d’autres variations de gameplay qui émergent progressivement. Un bon timing et la perception des couleurs sont la clé, donc soyez prudent. Faites bien attention aux couleurs et à ne pas frapper les autres balles!
data.desc_de: Schießen Sie farbige Bälle in das rotierende Rad. Bereiten Sie sich auf stetig komplexere Farbkombinationen, Richtungswechsel und andere Änderungen im Spielverlauf ein. Timing und Wahrnehmung sind der Schlüssel, also sein Sie vorsichtig, denn Sie müssen auf die Vielfalt der Farben achten und dürfen die anderen Bälle nicht treffen.
data.desc_es: Prepárate para hacer frente a combinaciones de colores, cambios en la dirección de la rotación y otras dificultades. Para llegar lejos, deberás que prestar mucha atención a los diferentes colores y evitar golpear las demás bolas.

data.title: Water Me Please!
data.description: This family-friendly puzzle game ‘Water Me Please!’ is beautifully designed to keep everybody happy. It is a perfect mix between puzzles and your childhood memories in a grassy land. Enjoy these easy-to-love characters, a small watering can and a lovely flower in a green farm. Ready to keep your lovely flower happy?
data.desc_en: This family-friendly puzzle game ‘Water Me Please!’ is beautifully designed to keep everybody happy. It is a perfect mix between puzzles and your childhood memories in a grassy land. Enjoy these easy-to-love characters, a small watering can and a lovely flower in a green farm. Ready to keep your lovely flower happy?

data.title: Hair Do Design
data.description: Which hair style should I do today? Does this style suit me? Girls love to style their hair differently every time they go out. This process starts with hair spa, makeover and ends with styling your hair. Learn to style your own hair!
data.desc_it: Che acconciatura dovrei farmi oggi? Che stile mi starebbe bene? Le ragazze adorano farsi i capelli in modi diversi ogni volta che escono e il processo inizia con la Spa, il trucco ed il parrucco. Impara a fare i tuoi capelli come vuoi tu!
data.desc_en: Which hair style should I do today? Does this style suit me? Girls love to style their hair differently every time they go out. This process starts with hair spa, makeover and ends with styling your hair. Learn to style your own hair!
data.desc_fr: Quel coupe de cheveux voulez-vous vous faire aujourd'hui ? Les filles adorent changer de coiffure à chaque sortie. Commencez votre transformation capillaire grâce à votre spa pour cheveux, puis finissez avec une coupe démentielle. Apprenez à vous coiffer grâce à ce jeu original!
data.desc_de: Hey! Welche Frisur soll ich heute tun? Ist dieser Stil passt zu mir? Mädchen lieben es, ihre Haare anders, jedesmal wenn sie gehen zu stylen. Dieser Prozess beginnt mit Haar-Spa, Verjüngungskur und endet mit Styling Ihr Haar.
data.desc_es: Hey! ¿Qué estilo de pelo debo hacer hoy? Es este estilo me conviene? Las niñas les encanta el estilo de su cabello de manera diferente cada vez que salen. Este proceso comienza con spa cabello, cambio de imagen y termina con el estilo de su cabello.

data.title: Dark Lands
data.description: Run through enemies and dangerous traps! Dark Lands is a battle runner action game. Follow your hero on an epic journey of defeating evil forces who corrupted the land.
data.desc_it: Fatti strada attraverso trappole pericolose! Dark Lands è un gioco d'azione e combattimento. Segui il tuo eroe in un epico viaggio per sconfiggere le forze del male che hanno corrotto il mondo.
data.desc_en: Run through enemies and dangerous traps! Dark Lands is a battle runner action game. Follow your hero on an epic journey of defeating evil forces who corrupted the land.
data.desc_fr: Frayez-vous un chemin au travers de hordes de squelettes, de trolls et affrontez les terribles scorpions et minotaures. Améliorez votre héros pour venir à bout du monde aventure et survivre au mode infini. Courez pour votre survie!
data.desc_de: "Kämpfen Sie sich Ihren Weg frei und besiegen Sie Horden von Skeletten, Trollen und schrecklichen Skorpionen und Minotauren. Verbessern Sie Ihren griechischen Kämpfer, statten Sie ihn mit einem spartanischen Helm und zahlreichen Schutzausrüstungen aus. Wählen Sie eine legendäre Waffe und laufen Sie Ihrem Schicksal entgegen."
data.desc_es: Ábrete camino a través de hordas de esqueletos y trolls y enfréntate a los terribles escorpiones y minotauros. Mejora a tu luchador griego, cúbrelo con un casco espartano y equípalo con montones de protecciones. Escoge tu arma legendaria y corre hacia tu destino.

data.title: Doggy Dive
data.description: Discover a fantastic underwater world in Doggy Dive! Get into the water and dive as deep as you can. Collect air bubbles and coins and avoid dangers like poisonous jellyfish, blowfish and sharks. Prove your skills and reach a high score!
data.desc_it: Scopri il fantastico mondo sommerso in Doggy Dive! Entra in acqua e immergiti più in profondità che puoi. Colleziona bolle d'aria, monete ed evita i pericoli come le velenose meduse e gli squali. Metti alla prova le tue abilità e raggiungi il massimo punteggio!
data.desc_en: Discover a fantastic underwater world in Doggy Dive! Get into the water and dive as deep as you can. Collect air bubbles and coins and avoid dangers like poisonous jellyfish, blowfish and sharks. Prove your skills and reach a high score!

data.title: Foot Chinko
data.description: Challenge your rivals in the most famous soccer international tournaments. Are you skillful enough to fulfill your trophy case through the +90 levels of the game? Will you stand victorious after you confront the Goalkeeper Duck of Evil!?
data.desc_it: Foot Chinko è il miglior gioco di calcio in HTML5 sul web. Scegli la tua squadra e sfida gli altri giocatori in una divertente e avvincente partita di calcio.
data.desc_en: Challenge your rivals in the most famous soccer international tournaments. Are you skillful enough to fulfill your trophy case through the +90 levels of the game? Will you stand victorious after you confront the Goalkeeper Duck of Evil!?
data.desc_fr: Défiez vos adversaires dans le tournoi de football le plus célèbre au monde. Serez-vous assez doué pour rafler toutes les récompenses des 90 niveaux du jeu ? Assez brave pour vous confronter au gardien de but surnommé le "gardien du diable" ? Nous verrons!
data.desc_de: Fordere deine Rivalen in dem berühmtesten internationalen Fußballturnier heraus. Bist du geschickt genug, um deinen Trophäenschrank im Laufe der mehr als 90 Level zu füllen? Wirst du siegreich aus dem Spiel gegen den Torhüter Ente des Bösen hervorgehen?!
data.desc_es: Dinámica juego multi-nivel del fútbol para principiantes y profesionales. Con cada nuevo nivel para conseguir el balón a la meta más difícil. Para ganar todos los trofeos y derrotar al equipo contrario tendrá mucha habilidad y destreza. Arme su propio equipo de fútbol, ​​ir alrededor de los obstáculos, para mostrar que realmente sabe cómo jugar al fútbol. Goles marcados se traducen en puntos para los cuales usted puede comprar un montón de mejoras.

data.title: Color Blocks
data.description: Color Blocks is easy to play and a pleasurable game for all ages! Simply drag the blocks and fill up all colored grids. Once you start, you will definitely be hooked: this 3D-style game awaits you!
data.desc_it: Color Blocks è facile da giocare e piacerà a tutti, di ogni età! Semplicemente sposta i blocchi e riempi tutte le griglie. Appena iniziato, ti renderai conto di non poterne fare a meno!
data.desc_en: Color Blocks is easy to play and a pleasurable game for all ages! Simply drag the blocks and fill up all colored grids. Once you start, you will definitely be hooked: this 3D-style game awaits you!

data.title: Orkio
data.description: Orkio is a beautiful arcade game about a cute little wizard fighting the forces of evil. Touch the enemies to kill them and collect their souls to buy upgrades!
data.desc_it: Orkio è un bellissimo gioco arcade il cui protagonista è un piccolo mago che combatte le forze del male. Tocca i nemici per ucciderli e raccogli le loro anime per comprare utili potenziamenti!
data.desc_en: Orkio is a beautiful arcade game about a cute little wizard fighting the forces of evil. Touch the enemies to kill them and collect their souls to buy upgrades!

data.title: Algerian Solitaire
data.description: Welcome to Algerian Solitaire, a different solitaire variation for the sturdiest and more resilient players. Some prophets claim that you must actually experience the isolation of the desert to be mentally focused and complete this game. Well, that’s just their opinion...
data.desc_it: Benvenuto in Algerian Solitaire, una variazione del solitario per i giocatori più tosti e resistenti. Alcuni profeti ritengono che dobbiate vivere direttamente l'esperienza dell'isolamento nel deserto per poter avere la mentalità giusta per completare il gioco. Ma dopotutto, è solo la loro opinione...
data.desc_en: Welcome to Algerian Solitaire, a different solitaire variation for the sturdiest and more resilient players. Some prophets claim that you must actually experience the isolation of the desert to be mentally focused and complete this game. Well, that’s just their opinion...

data.title: Monster Nail Doctor
data.description: Each one of these four creepy creatures has really been neglecting themselves lately. They could definitely use some monstrous manicures. Can you fix up their feet in this game for girls? Help them go from ghoulish to gorgeous!
data.desc_it: Ognuna delle quattro creature ha tralasciato la cura delle proprie unghie ultimamente. Avrebbero davvero bisogno di una manicure mostruosa! Puoi sistemargli i piedi in questo gioco per ragazze? Aiutali a diventare meravigliosi!
data.desc_en: Each one of these four creepy creatures has really been neglecting themselves lately. They could definitely use some monstrous manicures. Can you fix up their feet in this game for girls? Help them go from ghoulish to gorgeous!

data.title: Refuge Solitaire
data.description: Are you having a boring day? Play Refuge Solitaire and move all the cards from the outer piles (tableau) to the eight foundation piles below. Complete the Solitaire!
data.desc_it: Stai avendo una giornata noiosa? Gioca a Refuge Solitaire e muovi tutte le carte dai mazzi esterni (tableau) agli 8 mazzi fondanti sotto. Completa il solitario!
data.desc_en: Are you having a boring day? Play Refuge Solitaire and move all the cards from the outer piles (tableau) to the eight foundation piles below. Complete the Solitaire!
data.desc_fr: Vous vous ennuyez aujourdh'ui ? Qu'à cela ne tienne, jouez au solitaire et déplacez toutes les cartes des piles extérieurs vers les 8 piles du dessous. Un grand classique disponible en HTML5!
data.desc_de: Ist dir langweilig? Spiele Refuge Solitaire und ziehe alle Karten von den äußeren Stapeln (Tableau) auf die acht Grundstapel darunter. Vervollständige das Solitär!
data.desc_es: ¿Estás teniendo un día aburrido? Juega solitario Refugio y mover todas las cartas desde las cubiertas exteriores (tableau) a las ocho barajas fundadores de abajo. Complete el solitario!

data.title: 3 2 1 Spell
