Aber er hat seinen Schlitten aufgemöbelt und ist nun blitzschnell! Hilf Santa dabei, den Ballons aus dem Weg zu gehen und so viele Geschenke wie möglich zu holen. Kannst du alle Level bestehen? Lass uns loslegen!
data.desc_es: Estas Navidades van a ser duras! Muchos globos han invadido el Polo Norte y Santa tiene que darse prisa en atrapar los regalos. Pero el ha cambiado su semblante, ahora es rápido y furioso! Ayuda a Santa a evitar los globos y acaba con el mayor número de regalos en tu poder. Puedes superar todos los niveles? Vamos!

data.title: Cartoon Flight
data.description: Get ready for a breathtaking flight with the fearless Miss Pilot! Fly, collect coins, and receive rewards!
data.desc_it: Preparatevi per un volo mozzafiato con la coraggiosa Miss Pilot! Volate, collezionate monete e prendete tanti premi!
data.desc_en: Get ready for a breathtaking flight with the fearless Miss Pilot! Fly, collect coins, and receive rewards!
data.desc_fr: Préparez-vous pour un vol à couper le souffle avec l'intrépide Miss Pilot! Volez, récoltez des pièces et recevez d'incroyables récompenses!
data.desc_de: Mach dich bereit für einen atemberaubenden Flug mit der furchtlosen Miss Pilot! Fliege, sammle Münzen ein und erhalte Belohnungen!
data.desc_es: ¡Prepárate para un vuelo impresionante, con la valiente señorita piloto! Volar, recoger las monedas, superar obstáculos y recibir recompensas!

data.title: Shinobi Slash
data.description: Shinobi Slash is an amazing but simple game. Use your mouse or touch tap to jump, tap screen left or right, avoid the projectiles and get an higher score. Only for real ninjas!
data.desc_it: Shinobi Slash è un fantastico gioco, semplice ma divertente! Usate il mouse o toccate con il dito per saltare, toccate a destra o a sinistra per evitare i proiettili e ottenete il miglior punteggio. Solo per veri ninja!
data.desc_en: Shinobi Slash is an amazing but simple game. Use your mouse or touch tap to jump, tap screen left or right, avoid the projectiles and get an higher score. Only for real ninjas!
data.desc_fr: Shinobi Slash est un jeu simple mais incroyable. Utilisez votre souris ou votre doigt pour sauter, esquiver les projectiles et exploser votre score. Réservé aux seuls vrais ninjas!
data.desc_de: Shinobi Slash ist ein fantastisches, aber einfaches Spiel. Verwende deine Maus oder tippe den Bildschirm an, um zu springen. Tippe den Bildschirm links oder rechts an, um den Kugeln auszuweichen und mehr Punkte zu erzielen. Nur für echte Ninjas!
data.desc_es: Shinobi Slash es un increíble pero simple juego. Pulsa en la pantalla para saltar, pulsa a izq o dcha para evitar los proyectiles y conseguir la máxima puntuación. Solo para auténticos ninjas!

data.title: Zippy Boxes
data.description: What's inside the Zippy Boxes? Help Piggy the key-keeper free his friends locked inside! Touch and guide the colored boxes to their matching keys. Solving each puzzle makes Piggy happy! If you are stuck on a level, you can always go back a step. Boxes can move other boxes. Arrows on the game field change the direction of a box.
data.desc_it: Cosa si nasconde dentro gli scatoloni? Aiuta Piggy il mastro di chiavi a liberare i suoi amici. Tocca e sposta le scatole colorate verso le rispettive chiavi. Risolvi i rompicapo e fai felice Piggy! Se resti bloccato in un livello, puoi sempre tornare indietro. Puoi usare le scatole per spostare altre scatole. Usa le frecce per fargli cambiare direzione.
data.desc_en: What's inside the Zippy Boxes? Help Piggy the key-keeper free his friends locked inside! Touch and guide the colored boxes to their matching keys. Solving each puzzle makes Piggy happy! If you are stuck on a level, you can always go back a step. Boxes can move other boxes. Arrows on the game field change the direction of a box.
data.desc_fr: Mais qu'y a t-il à l'intérieur de des boites? Aidez Piggy le gardien des clés à libérer ses amis emprisonnés à l'intérieur! sélectionnez et guidez les boites vers leurs clés respectives. Sachez que chaque boite peut en faire bouger une autre, et que si vous êtes coincé vous pouvez toujours revenir en arrière. Résoudre des puzzle rend Piggy très heureux, alors n'hésitez pas à finir le jeu!
data.desc_de: Was ist in den Zippy-Kisten? Hilf Piggy, dem Schlüsselwart, dabei, seine Freunde zu befreien, die im Inneren eingesperrt sind! Berühre und führe die farbigen Kisten zu ihren entsprechenden Schlüsseln. Das Lösen der Rätsel macht Piggy glücklich! Wenn du in einem Level nicht weiterkommst, kannst du immer einen Schritt zurückgehen. Kisten können andere Kisten bewegen. Pfeile auf dem Spielfeld ändern die Richtung einer Kiste.
data.desc_es: ¿Qué hay dentro de las Cajas Cerradas? Ayuda a Piggy el maestro de las llaves a liberar a sus amigos del encierro. Toca y guía a las cajas de colores a encontrar la llave de su color. ¡Resolviendo cada puzzle conseguirás que Piggy sea más feliz! Si estás atrapado en un nivel podrás siempre volver un paso atrás. Unas cajas pueden mover otras cajas. Las flechas del campo de juego cambiarán la dirección de la caja, ¡ten cuidado!

data.title: Sally BBQ Joint
data.description: Cutting down trees in Canada is a very hard work. That's why Canadian lumberjacks like to eat huge steaks every now and than. Our heroine Sally has just opened a brand new Selly BBQ Joint that specialise in lumberjacks favourite dish.
data.desc_it: Tagliare la legna in Canada è un lavoro molto tosto. Ecco perché i tagliaboschi canadesi si mangiano grandi bistecche tra un albero e l'altro. La nostra eroina Sally ha appena aperto un nuovo ristorante specializzato in bistecche, il loro piatto preferito.
data.desc_en: Cutting down trees in Canada is a very hard work. That's why Canadian lumberjacks like to eat huge steaks every now and than. Our heroine Sally has just opened a brand new Selly BBQ Joint that specialise in lumberjacks favourite dish.
data.desc_fr: Abattre des arbres au Canada est un métier très dur. C'est pourquoi les bucherons canadiens aiment manger d'énormes steacks dès qu'ils le peuvent. Ca tombe bien car notre héroïne Sally vient juste d'ouvrir un restaurant qui vend des steacks bien juteux pour bucherons!
data.desc_de: Es ist harte Arbeit, Bäume in Kanada zu fällen. Deshalb essen kanadische Holzfäller gerne ab und zu mal ein riesiges Steak. Unsere Heldin Sally hat gerade einen brandneuen „Selly-BBQ-Laden“ eröffnet, der sich auf das Lieblingsgericht der Holzfäller spezialisiert hat.
data.desc_es: Cortar árboles en Canada es un trabajo muy duro. Esto es la explicación de por qué los leñadores Canadienses les gusta comer grandes filetes siempre. Nuestra heroína Sally acaba de inaugurar "Selly BBQ Joint" que está especializada en los platos favoritos para leñadores.

data.title: Soccer
data.description: Make your way to the other side of the field with the ball at your feet! Avoid the opponents or stop them from reaching your goal. Take your best shot when you get the chance!
data.desc_it: Fatevi strada fino all'altro lato del campo con la palla al piede! Evitate gli avversarsi e fermateli prima che vi facciano goal. Fate il vostro tiro quando vi capita l'opportunità!
data.desc_en: Make your way to the other side of the field with the ball at your feet! Avoid the opponents or stop them from reaching your goal. Take your best shot when you get the chance!
data.desc_fr: Frayez vous un chemin ballon aux pieds jusqu'à la surface de réparation. Esquivez les membres de l'équipe adverse ou empêchez-les d'atteindre votre propre cage. Tirez et marquez quand l'occasion se présente!
data.desc_de: Bahne dir mit dem Ball den Weg zur anderen Seite des Feldes! Weiche den Gegnern aus oder halte sie davon ab, dein Tor zu erreichen. Gib alles und schieße auf das Tor, wenn sich die Gelegenheit bietet!
data.desc_es: Crea tu camino hacia el otro lado del campo con la pelota en los pies! Evita a los oponentes o haz que no lleguen a tu portería. Prueba tu mejor disparo en cuanto puedas!

data.title: Sweet Monsters
data.description: Sweet Monsters is a 2D endless parkour game. You will have to use your skills to avoid obstacles and eat candy. You don't have to run as far as possible, but the more you eat the better, creating higher numbers of combos will get higher reward. With increasing difficulty, there will be more varied and complex barriers to pass through!
data.desc_it: Sweet Monsters è un gioco parkour in 2D. Dovrete usare le vostre abilità per evitare gli ostacoli mangiando caramelle, non dovete correte troppo veloce ma mangiare il più possibile, creando combo e ottenendo premi. Col crescere delle difficoltà, troverete barriere sempre più difficili!
data.desc_en: Sweet Monsters is a 2D endless parkour game. You will have to use your skills to avoid obstacles and eat candy. You don't have to run as far as possible, but the more you eat the better, creating higher numbers of combos will get higher reward. With increasing difficulty, there will be more varied and complex barriers to pass through!
data.desc_fr: Sweet Monsters est un jeu de Parkour en 2d qui vous fera courir et sauter des tonnes d'obstacles pour déguster des friandises. Le but n'est pas forcément d'aller le plus loin possible, car plus vous mangerez, plus vous ferez de combos et boosterez votre score pour obtenir des récompenses. Plus vous jouerez, plus la difficulté augmentera. Etes-vous prêt à relever le défi?
data.desc_de: Sweet Monsters ist ein unendliches 2D-Parkour-Spiel. Du musst dein Können einsetzen, um Hindernissen auszuweichen und Süßigkeiten zu essen. Du musst nicht so schnell wie möglich rennen, aber je mehr du isst, desto besser. Du erhältst höhere Belohnungen, wenn du viele Combos erzielst. Mit zunehmender Schwierigkeit gibt es unterschiedlichere und schwierigere Hindernisse, die du überwinden musst!
data.desc_es: Sweet Monsters es un juego de parkour 2D infinito. Deberás usar tus habilidades para evitar obstáculos y comer caramelos. Pero no tienes que correr lo más rápido posible, ya que cuantos más caramelos comas, podrás crear un mayor número de combos con una recompensa más elevada. Dificultad con incremento y complejos y variadas barreras para superar!

data.title: Minigolf Kingdom
data.description: Do you know what garden gnomes do when nobody's watching? They are playing "Minigolf Kingdom"! Grab the golf club and join the gnomes throughout the 12 minigolf courses.
data.desc_it: Hai mai pensato a cosa combinano i folletti quando nessuno li guarda? Giocano a "Minigolf Kingdom"! Prendi la mazza da golf e unisciti agli gnomi lungo il percorso da 12 buche!
data.desc_en: Do you know what garden gnomes do when nobody's watching? They are playing "Minigolf Kingdom"! Grab the golf club and join the gnomes throughout the 12 minigolf courses.
data.desc_fr: Savez-vous ce que font les nains de jardin quand personne ne les observe? Ils jouent à "Minigolf Kingdom"! Attrapez votre club et rejoignez vos amis nains de jardin à travers 12 terrains de mini-golf!
data.desc_de: Weißt du, was Gartenzwerge tun, wenn niemand hinschaut? Sie spielen „Minigolf Kingdom“! Schnapp dir den Golfschläger und komm mit den Zwergen zu den 12 Minigolfplätzen.
data.desc_es: Sabes qué hace un jardín de gnomos cuando no mira nadie? Ellos están jugando al "Minigolf Kingdom" Toma el palo de golf y únete a los gnomos a través de 12 diferentes pistas.

data.title: Ninja Pig
data.description: Help Ninja Pig save the world from an alien invasion! Collect shurikens to shoot as you run through 10 levels to finally confront the boss. Improve your star rating on each level by completing it in one go, shooting some enemies and still having ammunition left over.
data.desc_it: Aiuta il maialino ninja a salvare il mondo da un'invasione aliena. Colleziona gli shuriken per sparare nei 10 livelli di gioco, fino al boss finale. Migliora il tuo punteggio ad ogni livello, cercando di completarlo in un'unica mossa, spara ai nemici e cerca di avere sempre munizioni di scorta.
data.desc_en: Help Ninja Pig save the world from an alien invasion! Collect shurikens to shoot as you run through 10 levels to finally confront the boss. Improve your star rating on each level by completing it in one go, shooting some enemies and still having ammunition left over.
data.desc_fr: Aidez le cochon ninja à sauver le monde d'une terrible invasion alien! Courez pour récolter des shuriken à travers 10 niveaux et confrontez vous au big boss en personne. Augmentez votre score en complétant des défis, comme finir un niveau en une seule fois, tirer sur des ennemis spécifiques ou encore en conservant vos munitions!
data.desc_de: Hilf dem Ninja-Schwein, die Welt vor einer Alien-Invasion zu retten! Sammle Shuriken zum Schießen, während du durch 10 Level läufst und schließlich dem Boss gegenübertrittst. Verbessere deine Sternenwertung in jedem Level, indem du es auf einmal abschließt, ein paar Gegner abschießt und noch Munition über hast.
data.desc_es: Ayuda a Ninja Pig a salvar el mundo de la invasión alienígena! Colecciona shurikens para dispararlos a través de los 10 niveles y enfrentarte al jefe final. Mejora tu ratio de estrellas en cada nivel completándolo en un solo intento, disparando a unos enemigos y aun teniendo munición en la reserva.

data.title: Zero
data.description: Move the platform to the right or left, in the direction of the ball, totaling the most points. Collect as many coins as you can and buy others backgrounds!
data.desc_it: Muovi la piattaforma da destra a sinistra nella direzione della palla, facendo più punti possibile. Raccogli tutte le monete e con quelle acquista nuovi sfondi!
data.desc_en: Move the platform to the right or left, in the direction of the ball, totaling the most points. Collect as many coins as you can and buy others backgrounds!
data.desc_fr: Faites bouger la plateforme vers la gauche ou vers la droite en direction de la balle pour avoir le meilleur score. Récoltez autant de pièces que possible et achetez d'autres fonds d'écran!
data.desc_de: Bewege die Plattform nach rechts oder links, in Richtung der Kugel, und erziele so die meisten Punkte. Sammle so viele Münzen, wie du kannst, und kaufe andere Hintergründe!
data.desc_es: Mueve la plataforma de derecha a izquierda, en la dirección de la pelota, aumentando la puntuación. Recoge la mayoría de las monedas para poder comprar otros fondos!

data.title: Snack Time
data.description: Little Waldy the wild boar needs to make preprations for coming winter. Move the acorns to the designated areas and pass 12 levels in this stunning sokoban game. It's Snack Time!
data.desc_it: Il piccolo Waldy, l'orso della foresta, ha bisogno di prepararsi per il letargo. Muovi gli oggetti nei punti segnati e supera i 12 livelli in questo gioco emozionante!
data.desc_en: Little Waldy the wild boar needs to make preprations for coming winter. Move the acorns to the designated areas and pass 12 levels in this stunning sokoban game. It's Snack Time!
data.desc_fr: Waldy le sanglier sauvage doit se préparer pour la venue de l'hiver. Faites bouger les glands vers les zones désignées et traversez les 12 niveaux qui composent cet étonnant jeu de Sokoban!
data.desc_de: Klein-Waldi, der wilde Eber muss Vorbereitungen für den kommenden Winter treffen. Bringe die Eicheln in die vorgegebenen Bereiche und schaffe 12 Level in diesem tollen Sokoban-Spiel. Es ist Zeit für einen Imbiss in Snack Time!
data.desc_es: Little Waildy el oso salvaje necesita prepararse para el próximo invierno. Mueve las bellotas a las áreas designadas y pasa los 12 niveles de este alucinante juego de sokoban. Es hora de la comida.

data.title: Hunter Willie
data.description: Hunter Willie, a fearless sportsman, goes out hunting. Willie wears a yellow hunter suit with a shell belt for his sporting gun. Suddenly he steps in a terrible cave, full of blood-thirsty monsters: pass the cave to the shining exit, destroying predators on the way.
data.desc_it: Hunter Willie è un temerario signore sportivo a cui piace andare a caccia di giochi sparatutto. Wllie indossa una casacca gialla da cacciatore e una cintura per il suo fucile sportivo. Improvvisamente è caduto in una brutta caverna, piena di mostri affamati: superate la grotta fino all'uscita e distruggete i predatori lungo la via.
data.desc_en: Hunter Willie, a fearless sportsman, goes out hunting. Willie wears a yellow hunter suit with a shell belt for his sporting gun. Suddenly he steps in a terrible cave, full of blood-thirsty monsters: pass the cave to the shining exit, destroying predators on the way.
data.desc_fr: Willie le chasseur est un pisteur aguerri et sans peur! Mais lors d'une partie de chasse, Willie se retrouve coincé dans une grotte terrifiante pleine de monstres assoiffés de sang. Aidez Willie à s'enfuir en tuant tous les monstres au passage!
data.desc_de: Jäger Willie, ein furchtloser Sportsmann, geht auf die Jagd. Willie trägt einen gelben Jagdanzug mit einem Patronengürtel für seine Sportwaffe. Plötzlich tritt er in eine schreckliche Höhle voller blutdurstiger Monster: Durchquere die Höhle zu dem leuchtenden Ausgang und vernichte Jäger auf dem Weg.
data.desc_es: Hunter Willie, un deportista sin miedo, va de caza. Willie lleva un traje de cazador amarillo con una pistolera en el cinturón para su arma deportiva. De repente entrará en una terrible cueva con sanguinarios monstruos, pasa la cueva hacia la luz y destruye a los depredadores que encuentres por el camino.

data.title: Evil Wyrm
data.description: You are the hero that can defeat the Evil Wyrm. Use rocks to hide yourself from the Wyrm eyes, or it will burn you. Be fast and collect as many gems as you can!
data.desc_it: Tu sei l'eroe che deve sconfiggere il mostro! Usa le rocce per nasconderti dagli occhi del mostro altrimenti ti brucerà! Sii veloce e raccogli tutte le gemme che puoi.
data.desc_en: You are the hero that can defeat the Evil Wyrm. Use rocks to hide yourself from the Wyrm eyes, or it will burn you. Be fast and collect as many gems as you can!
data.desc_fr: Vous êtes le seul héro capable de défaire ce dragon maléfique ! Utilisez les rochers pour vous protéger de ses yeux diaboliques! Soyez rapide et récoltez un maximum de gemmes!
data.desc_de: Du bist der Held, der den bösen Drachen besiegen kann. Verstecke dich hinter Felsen vor den Augen des Drachens oder er wird dich verbrennen. Sei schnell und sammle so viele Juwelen, wie du kannst!
data.desc_es: Eres el héroe que puede acabar con el Wyrm Malvado. Usa las rocas para esconderte de los ojos del Wyrm, o te quemarán. Tienes que ser rápido para coleccionar tantas gemas como puedas!

data.title: Scratch Fruit
data.description: Scratch Fruit is an Instant Win game. Just scratch the silver part to discover if you have won some prizes, just for fun!
data.desc_it: Scratch Fruit è uno di quei giochi in cui puoi vincere subito! Gratta via la pellicola argentata per scoprire se hai vinto qualche premio, divertiamoci un po'!
data.desc_en: Scratch Fruit is an Instant Win game. Just scratch the silver part to discover if you have won some prizes, just for fun!
data.desc_fr: Scratch Fruit est un jeu de gain instantané. Grattez et découvrez si vous avez gagné un prix ! C'est tout, juste de la simplicité, de la chance et du fun!
data.desc_de: Scratch Fruit ist ein Sofortgewinnspiel. Rubbele einfach die silbernen Felder frei, um herauszufinden, ob du ein paar Preise gewonnen hast. Nur zum Spaß!
data.desc_es: Scratch Fruit es un juego de ganar ya. Solo rasca la parte plateada para descubrir si has ganado algún premio, solo por diversión!

data.title: Amazing Grabber
data.description: Get ready for the goodies bonanza! Tap the screen to help Haru, the mischievous pink monster, snatch as much precious stuff as possible. Spend your hard-earned coins in the store to get over 20 unique items and customize Haru's appearance. Whether you prefer a well-groomed moustache, fancy glasses or a pet octopus - the choice is yours!
data.desc_it: Preparatevi per un po' di fortuna! Aiutate Haru, il cattivissimo mostriciattolo rosa a rubacchiare più tesori possibile. Spendete le vostre monetine nel negozio e personalizzate Haru: baffi, occhiali strani o pupazzi, la scelta sta a voi!
data.desc_en: Get ready for the goodies bonanza! Tap the screen to help Haru, the mischievous pink monster, snatch as much precious stuff as possible. Spend your hard-earned coins in the store to get over 20 unique items and customize Haru's appearance. Whether you prefer a well-groomed moustache, fancy glasses or a pet octopus - the choice is yours!
data.desc_fr: Préparez-vous à avoir de la chance! Touchez l'écran pour aider Haru, le petit monstre rose et espiègle, à récupérer autant de trucs précieux que possible. Dépensez vos pièces durement gagnées dans le magasin pour acheter plus de 20 objets uniques et customisez l'apparence de Haru. Que vous préfériez une moustache bien peignée, des lunettes fantasies ou même une pieuvre de compagnie, choisissez ce qui vous plaît!
data.desc_de: Bereitet euch auf jede Menge tolle Sachen vor! Tippe den Bildschirm an, um Haru, dem verschmitzten rosa Monster, zu helfen, so viel wertvolles Zeug wie möglich zu klauen. Gib deine hart verdienten Münzen im Laden aus, um über 20 einzigartige Gegenstände zu erhalten und Harus Aussehen zu verändern. Egal, ob du einen gepflegten Schnauzer, eine ausgefallende Brille oder einen Oktopus als Haustier bevorzugst – du hast die Qual der Wahl!
data.desc_es: ¡Prepárate para los tiempos de regalos! Pulsa en la pantalla para ayudar a Haru, el malicioso monstruo rosado, arrebata tanto como te sea posible. Gasta tus bien ganadas monedas en la tienda en más de 20 objetos únicos y personaliza la apariencia de Haru. Prefieras un buen bigote arreglado o unas gafas de moda, incluso una mascota de pulpo, ¡tu eliges!

data.title: Pixeroids
data.description: Guide your spaceship, hit and destroy asteroids without colliding into them ! SHOOT!
data.desc_it: Pilotate l'astronave, colpisci e distruggete gli asteroidi senza andarci a sbattere. SPARATE!
data.desc_en: Guide your spaceship, hit and destroy asteroids without colliding into them ! SHOOT!
data.desc_fr: Naviguez avec votre vaisseau spatial et détruisez les astéroïdes qui vous barrent le chemin sans les percuter! FEU!
data.desc_de: Lenke dein Raumschiff, triff und zerstöre Asteroiden, ohne mit ihnen zu kollidieren! SCHIESSEN!
data.desc_es: Guía tu nave espacial, golpea y destruye asteroides sin colisionar con ellos! ¡DISPARA!

data.title: Zombie Invasion
data.description: Zombie Invasion is an amazing survival game. Survive the zombies hordes as long as you can avoiding them from crossing the bridge. Each zombie that escapes you damages your energy. Be careful not to hit the runaway survivals. Defeat all the zombies!
data.desc_it: Zombie Invasion è un fantastico gioco di sopravvivenza. Sopravvivete alle ordate di zombie e evitateli attraversando i ponti. Per ogni zombie che scapperà perderete un po' di energia. State attenti a non colpire i sopravvissuti in fuga. Sconfiggete tutti i morti viventi!
data.desc_en: Zombie Invasion is an amazing survival game. Survive the zombies hordes as long as you can avoiding them from crossing the bridge. Each zombie that escapes you damages your energy. Be careful not to hit the runaway survivals. Defeat all the zombies!
data.desc_fr: Plongez dans Zombie Invasion, le jeu de survie par excellence. Survivez à la horde zombie aussi longtemps que vous le pouvez et empêchez-les de traverser le pont. A chaque zombie qui passe entre les mailles de votre défense, vous perdez des points d'énergie. Prenez soin de ne pas blesser les survivants et éliminez tous les zombies!
data.desc_de: Zombie Invasion ist ein fantastisches Survival-Spiel. Überlebe die Zombiehorde so lange, wie du kannst, und halte sie davon ab, die Brücke zu überqueren. Jeder Zombie, der dir entkommt, zieht dir Energie ab. Pass auf, dass du dabei keine fliehenden Überlebenden verletzt. Besiege alle Zombies!
data.desc_es: Zombie Invasion es un asombroso juego de supervivencia. Sobrevive a hordas de zombies tanto como puedas hasta que consigas evitar que crucen el puente. Cada zombie escapado te dañará la energía, ten cuidad de no golpear a los supervivientes que escapan y vence a todos los zombies!

data.title: Greedy Gnomes
data.description: Two greedy brothers, Us and Zus are playing the peculiar gnomish game. They are both extremely wealthy, so they use rubies and diamonds as pawns. Which brother will win?
data.desc_it: Ci sono due fratelli cattivi, Us e Zus, che giocano il particolarissimo gioco degli gnomi. Sono entrambi molto ricchi e usano i loro rubini e diamanti come pedine. Quale dei due vincerà?
data.desc_en: Two greedy brothers, Us and Zus are playing the peculiar gnomish game. They are both extremely wealthy, so they use rubies and diamonds as pawns. Which brother will win?
data.desc_fr: 2 frères gnomes plutôt très avares, Us et Zus, jouent à un jeu de gnomes bien particulier. Mais comme ils sont tous deux extremement riches,  ils utilisent des rubis et des diamands en guise de pions! Quel frère triomphera de l'autre ?
data.desc_de: Zwei gierige Brüder, Us und Zus, spielen ein merkwürdiges Gnomen-Spiel. Sie sind beide äußerst wohlhabend. Deswegen nutzen sie Rubine und Diamanten als Pfand. Welcher Bruder wird gewinnen?
data.desc_es: Dos hermanos codiciosos gnome - Nosotros y Zus están jugando el juego gnomish peculiar. Ambos son extremadamente rico, por lo que usan los rubíes y diamantes como peones. Sentado en los montones de oro en su bóveda subterránea, que arrojan las gemas a bordo de la parte superior. El que maneja a la línea 4 gemas en una fila, las puntuaciones. Que el hermano va a ganar?

data.title: Skater Dude
data.description: Grab your board and slide downhill. Tap left or right side of the screen to avoid obstacles and mad security officers! Your skateboard go faster and faster, so the more you play the harder it gets!
data.desc_it: Prendi la tua tavola e corri giù in città. Muoviti a destra e sinistra per evitare gli ostacoli e fai arrabbiare la polizia! Il tuo skateboard va sempre più veloce e più giochi più diventa tutto più difficile!
data.desc_en: Grab your board and slide downhill. Tap left or right side of the screen to avoid obstacles and mad security officers! Your skateboard go faster and faster, so the more you play the harder it gets!
data.desc_fr: Attrapez votre skateboard et dévalez les pentes! Dirigez-vous à droite ou à gauche pour éviter les obstacles et les officers de sécurité. Attention car plus vous jouez et plus votre skate accélère, j'espère que vous ne craignez pas la vitesse!
data.desc_de: Schnapp dir dein Skateboard und fahre den Berg runter. Tippe auf die rechte Seite des Bildschirms, um Hindernissen und verrückten Sicherheitsbeamten auszuweichen! Dein Skateboard wird schneller und schneller, also wird es immer schwieriger, je mehr du spielst!
data.desc_es: Toma tu tabla y baja la montaña. Pulsa a la izquierda o a la derecha de la pantalla para evitar los obstáculos y a los locos guardas de seguridad! Tu tabla va cada vez más y más rápido, así que cuanto más juegues, más difícil será!

data.title: Pigeon Bomber
data.description: Jack the pigeon bomber is afraid of people. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to poo. Jack is flying over the city and his goal is to poo on everybody and everything!
data.desc_it: Jack il piccione bombardiere ha paura delle persone. E la paura porta alla rabbia. La rabbia porta all'odio. L'odio porta alla cacca. Jack sta volando sulla città e il suo obiettivo è di lanciare cacca su tutto e tutti!
data.desc_en: Jack the pigeon bomber is afraid of people. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to poo. Jack is flying over the city and his goal is to poo on everybody and everything!
data.desc_fr: Jack le pigeon a peur des gens. La peur mène à la colère. La colère mène à la haine. Et la haine mène aus fientes! Jack survole la ville et son but est de déféquer sur tout et tout le monde!
data.desc_de: Jack, der Tauben-Bomber, fürchtet sich vor Menschen. Furcht wird zu Wut. Wut wird zu Hass. Hass wird zu Kacke. Jack fliegt über der Stadt und sein Ziel ist es, auf alles und jeden zu kacken!
data.desc_es: Jack la paloma es miedo de la gente. El miedo lleva a la ira. La ira lleva al odio. El odio lleva al defecar. Jack está volando sobre la ciudad y su objetivo es defecar en todos y todo.

data.title: Crazy Pizza
data.description: Welcome to the Crazy Pizza! Run your own Italian pizzeria! In this funny arcade game you need to sell as many pizzas as you can - before any pizza runs out of the screen.
data.desc_it: Benvenuto a Pizza Pazza! Gestisci la tua pizzeria italiana! In questo divertentissimo gioco dovrai vendere più pizze possibile, prima che le pizze spariscano dal display!
data.desc_en: Welcome to the Crazy Pizza! Run your own Italian pizzeria! In this funny arcade game you need to sell as many pizzas as you can - before any pizza runs out of the screen.
data.desc_fr: Bienvenue chez "Crazy Pizza"! Gérez votre propre pizzeria Italienne dans ce jeu d'arcade fun et addictif. Vendez autant de pizzas que possible, avant qu'elles ne disparaissent de l'écran!
data.desc_de: Willkommen bei Crazy Pizza! Betreibe deine eigene italienische Pizzeria! In diesem lustigen Arcadespiel musst du so viele Pizzen verkaufen, wie du kannst – bevor die Pizzen vom Bildschirm verschwinden.
data.desc_es: Bienvenido a Crazy Pizza! Lleva tu propia pizzería italiana! EN este divertido juego necesitas vender tantas pizzas como puedas - antes de que se acabe la pizza en la pantalla.

data.title: Sir Bottomtight
data.description: Deep in the deepest jungle lies an ancient city of gold. Brave sir Bottomtight wishes to claim all this wonderful treasure! Run through the jungle, jump over bottomless pits and fight with mad, evil cannibals.
data.desc_it: Nelle profondità della foresta più profonda si trova un'antichissima città d'oro. Il coraggioso Signor Bottomtight vorrebbe impossessarsi di tutta quella ricchezza! Corri nella giungla, salta sulle fosse e lotta contro dei cattivissimi cannibali.
data.desc_en: Deep in the deepest jungle lies an ancient city of gold. Brave sir Bottomtight wishes to claim all this wonderful treasure! Run through the jungle, jump over bottomless pits and fight with mad, evil cannibals.
data.desc_fr: Au fin fond de la jungle la plus sauvage gît une cité recouverte d'or. Le courageux explorateur "Pantalonserré" veut s' en approprier les plus beaux trésors! Courez à travers la jungle, sautez par-dessus des puits sans fond et combattez des cannibales fous pour l'aider à y parvenir!
data.desc_de: Tief im tiefsten Dschungel liegt eine uralte Stadt aus Gold. Der tapfere Sir Bottomtight möchte diesen ganzen wundervollen Schatz an sich nehmen. Renne durch den Dschungel, springe über Abgründe und kämpfe gegen verrückte, böse Kannibalen.
data.desc_es: En la profunda profunda selva existe una antigua ciudad de oro. El bravo Sir Bottomlight desea poder reclamar todo ese maravilloso tesoro! Corre a través de la jungla, salta a través de acantilados sin fondo y lucha contra los locos y malvados caníbales.

data.title: Broom
data.description: Broom is an addictive pixel art racing on a wild endless highway. Beat your Best Score using your super fast reflexes. Pixeled and minimal Arcade game: simple to play, impossible to win! Start racing now.
data.desc_it: Broom è un gioco di corsa in pixel art, che si svolge su un'autostrada infinita. Batti il tuo punteggio con dei super riflessi! Giochi minimal, arcade e pixelati: facili da giocare, difficilissimi da vincere! Inizia a correre ora.
data.desc_en: Broom is an addictive pixel art racing on a wild endless highway. Beat your Best Score using your super fast reflexes. Pixeled and minimal Arcade game: simple to play, impossible to win! Start racing now.
data.desc_fr: Broom est un jeu de course en pixel art qui vous fera traverser une autoroute sans fin. Utilisez vos super réflexes à bon escient pour exploser votre high score. Plongez dans un univers minimaliste et hyper arcade, et confrontez-vous à une difficulté de jeu très élevée!
data.desc_de: Broom ist ein Rennspiel im Pixel-Art-Stil auf einer wilden, unendlichen Autobahn, das süchtig macht. Setze deine superschnellen Reflexe ein und knacke deinen Highscore! Ein pixeliges und minimalistisches Arcadespiel: einfach zu spielen, unmöglich zu gewinnen! Starte jetzt dein Rennen.
data.desc_es: Broom es un adictivo juego de carreras con arte pixelado en una carretera sin fin. Vence tu propio record con reflejos ultra rápidos. Pixelado y mínimal: fácil de jugar, pero imposible de ganar! Comienza la carrera ya.

data.title: Three Cards Monte
data.description: Three Cards Monte is an HTML5 card game. Enjoy this stylish version of one of the most classic cards games!
data.desc_it: Ecco il gioco delle tre carte, finalmente in HTML5. Godetevi questa stilosa versione di uno dei giochi di carte più classici!
data.desc_en: Three Cards Monte is an HTML5 card game. Enjoy this stylish version of one of the most classic cards games!
data.desc_fr: Retrouvez le "Bonneteau", le plus célèbre jeu d'escroquerie dans cette version HTML5 fidèle à l'original!
data.desc_de: Three Cards Monte ist ein HTML5-Kartenspiel. Viel Spaß mit dieser modernen Version eines der klassischsten Kartenspiele!
data.desc_es: Three Cards Monte es un juego de 3 cartas en HTML5. Disfruta de esta versión estilizada de uno de los mejores clásicos ¿A qué nivel puedes llegar?

data.title: Christmas Girl Dressup
data.description: Help the cute little girl choose which outfits to wear and makeup to put on to celebrate Christmas. There are plenty of clothes, haircuts , skin colors and much more!
data.desc_it: Aiutate la piccola protagonista a scegliere che abito indossare e che trucco mettere per celebrare il Natale. Ci sono decine di vestiti, tagli di capelli, sfumature della pelle e molto altro!
data.desc_en: Help the cute little girl choose which outfits to wear and makeup to put on to celebrate Christmas. There are plenty of clothes, haircuts , skin colors and much more!
data.desc_fr: Aidez cette jolie jeune fille à choisir quels vêtements porter et quel maquillage mettre pour célébrer Noël comme il se doit. Vous avez le choix parmi une multitude de vêtements, coupes de cheveux, couleurs de peau et bien d'autres élements de personnalisation!
data.desc_de: Hilf diesem niedlichen kleinen Mädchen bei der Entscheidung für ihr Outfit und Make-up für Weihnachten. Es stehen eine Menge Kleidung, Frisuren, Hautfarben und vieles mehr zur Auswahl!
data.desc_es: Ayuda a la bella pequeña princesa a elegir qué outfit llevar y qué maquillaje ponerse para celebrar Navidades. Hay muchas clases de vestidos y cortes de pelo, también colores de piel y más!

data.title: The Right Color
data.description: The Right Colour is a game inspired by the Stroop effect. You need to check if the name of the color written matches with the color displayed. You think it's a breeze, huh?! Play with your friends and compare your scores!
data.desc_it: The Right Color è un gioco ispirato dall'effetto Stroop: se il nome del colore e il colore rappresentato combaciano clicca sul pulsante verde, altrimenti su quello rosso. Pensi sia facile eh?! Gioca con i tuoi amici e che vinca il più forte!
data.desc_en: The Right Colour is a game inspired by the Stroop effect. You need to check if the name of the color written matches with the color displayed. You think it's a breeze, huh?! Play with your friends and compare your scores!
data.desc_fr: The Right Color ou "la bonne couleur" en Français est un jeu inspiré de "l'effet de stroop". Vous devez simplement vérifier que le nom de la couleur écrit soit bien celui de la couleur affichée. Facile ? Pas si sûr... jouez avec vos amis et comparez vos scores!
data.desc_de: The Right Color ist ein Spiel, dass vom Stroop-Effekt inspiriert wurde. Du musst überprüfen, ob der geschriebene Name der Farbe der anzeigten Farbe entspricht. Du denkst, dass sei ein Kinderspiel, nicht wahr? Spiele mit deinen Freunden und vergleicht eure Punktzahlen!
data.desc_es: The Right Color es un juego inspirado en Stroop effect. Necesitarás comprobar si el nombre del color escrito coincide con el color que aparece. Piensas que es fácil, a que sí? Juega con tus amigos y compara tus resultados!

data.title: Harry Down
data.description: Harry Down is an endless HTML5 escape game inspired by Metal Slug. You need to control Harry to get down the escape from the Doom Machine!
data.desc_it: Harry Down è un gioco HTML5 ispirato a Metal Slug in cui il protagonista fugge senza fermarsi. Controllate Harry e aiutatelo a scappare dalla Doom Machine!
data.desc_en: Harry Down is an endless HTML5 escape game inspired by Metal Slug. You need to control Harry to get down the escape from the Doom Machine!
data.desc_fr: Il s'agit d'une Scolling sans fin excape game.You besoin de contrôler Harry descendre excape du Doom Machine!
data.desc_de: Harry Down ist ein unendliches HTML5-Escape-Spiel, das von Metal Slug inspiriert wurde. Du musst Harry steuern, um ihm bei seiner Flucht nach unten vor der Untergangsmaschine zu helfen!
data.desc_es: Se trata de un Scolling interminable excape game. You necesario controlar a Harry a bajar excape de la Máquina condenación!

data.title: FlapCat Christmas
data.description: Now things have become more difficult for FlapCat. In this special Christmas version of the hit Flap Cat, we bring a new level of difficulty: there are two reindeers guiding Flap Cat. The game has a new design and christmas features.
data.desc_it: Ora le cose si sono fatte più toste a Flap Cat. In questa speciale veste di Natale, c'è una nuova difficoltà: due renne guidano Flap Cat. Il gioco ha un nuovo design e nuove funzionalità natalizie.
data.desc_en: Now things have become more difficult for FlapCat. In this special Christmas version of the hit Flap Cat, we bring a new level of difficulty: there are two reindeers guiding Flap Cat. The game has a new design and christmas features.
data.desc_fr: Tout ne va pas pour le mieux pour Flapcat! Dans cette édition spéciale du célèbre jeu, la difficulté a été réhaussée et le désign spécialement retravaillé pour Noël : Il y a dorénavant 2 rennes guidant Flapcat!
data.desc_de: Das alles ist nun nicht mehr so einfach für Flap Cat. In dieser speziellen Weihnachts-Version des Hits Flap Cat haben wir eine erschwerende Änderung miteingebracht: Zwei Rentiere ziehen jetzt Flap Cat. Das Spiel hat ein neues Design und Weihnachts-Funktionen.
data.desc_es: Ahora las cosas se han puesto difíciles para FlapCat. En esta versión especial de Navidades del éxito Flap Cat traemos un nuevo nivel de dificultad: ahora dos renos guiarán Flap Cat. EL juego tiene un nuevo diseño y características navideñas.

data.title: Battleship Minesweeper
data.description: The goal of the game is to detect all the mines in the grid. The game is over if a single mine is clicked.
data.desc_it: Lo scopo del gioco è scovare tutte le mine nel campo. La partita finisce appena una mina viene toccata.
data.desc_en: The goal of the game is to detect all the mines in the grid. The game is over if a single mine is clicked.
data.desc_fr: Enfilez votre combinaison et détectez toutes les mines présentes sur la grille. Attention car la partie sera perdue si une seule mine explose!
data.desc_de: Viel Spaß bei diesem bunten Mahjong-Spiel mit süßen Symbolen!
data.desc_es: El objetivo del juego será detectar todas las minas del tablero. El juego terminará si una mina aparece.

data.title: Cheese Lab
data.description: Help the mouse eat lots of cheese!
data.desc_it: Aiutate il topolino a mangiare tanto formaggio!
data.desc_en: Help the mouse eat lots of cheese!
data.desc_fr: Vous êtes le seul héro capable de défaire ce dragon maléfique ! Utilisez les rochers pour vous protéger de ses yeux diaboliques! Soyez rapide et récoltez un maximum de gemmes!
data.desc_de: Hilf der Maus dabei, ganz viel Käse zu essen!
data.desc_es: Pequeño ratón llegó al laboratorio secreto del queso de ciencia-ficción. Ayúdala a obtener la mayor cantidad de queso posible saltando de plataforma en plataforma. Tenga cuidado con los láseres de ratón trampa y los temibles robo-gatos.

data.title: Cinderella's Rush
data.description: Game based on the classic fairy tale that every boy and girl knows - the story of Cinderella! Little girl needs to clean the dishes before she would be able to go to the ball and meet the Prince Charming there. Move the Cinderella left or right fast and enjoy Cinderella Rush!
data.desc_it: Il gioco si basa sulla famosa favola conosciuta da grandi e piccoli: Cenerentola! La piccola protagonista deve prima lavare i piatti per poter andare al ballo e conoscere il principe azzurro. Muovi velocemente Cenerentola a destra e sinistra e divertiti!
data.desc_en: Game based on the classic fairy tale that every boy and girl knows - the story of Cinderella! Little girl needs to clean the dishes before she would be able to go to the ball and meet the Prince Charming there. Move the Cinderella left or right fast and enjoy Cinderella Rush!
data.desc_fr: Revisitez ce grand classique qu'est "Cendrillon" ! Une jeune fille est forcée de faire la vaisselle avant de pouvoir se rendre au bal et rencontrer le prince charmant. Incarnez Cendrillon et faites-la se déplacer de gauche à droite pour accomplir sa mission!
data.desc_de: Das Spiel basiert auf einem klassischen Märchen, das jeder Junge und jedes Mädchen kennt – die Geschichte von Aschenputtel! Das kleine Mädchen muss den Abwasch machen, bevor sie zum Ball gehen und dort ihren Märchenprinzen treffen kann. Bewege Aschenputtel schnell nach links oder rechts. Viel Spaß bei Cinderella Rush!
data.desc_es: Juego basado en el cuento de hadas clásico que cada niño y niña sabe - la historia de Cenicienta! La niña tiene que limpiar los platos antes de que ella sería capaz de ir al baile y conocer al príncipe azul allí.

data.title: Captain Rogers Defense of Karmax
data.description: Captain Rogers is a hero defending the Galaxy. He knows no fear. He knows no remorse. Actually, he doesn't know much in general. Captain Rogers needs to defend a secret space base against a treacherous Kershan attack. Help him!
data.desc_it: Il Capitano Rogers è diventato un eroe difendendo la galassia. Non ha paura di niente. Non ha rimpianti. In realtà non conosce molte cose in generale. Deve difendere la base segreta dall'attacco di Kershan. Aiutalo!
data.desc_en: Captain Rogers is a hero defending the Galaxy. He knows no fear. He knows no remorse. Actually, he doesn't know much in general. Captain Rogers needs to defend a secret space base against a treacherous Kershan attack. Help him!
data.desc_fr: Capitaine Rogers est un héros défenseur de la galaxie. Il ne connaît pas la peur. Il ne connaît pas non plus le remords En fait, il ne connait pas grand-chose de manière générale. Pour mener à bien la défense de Karmax-3, le capitaine Rogers doit repousser une attaque spatiale des perfides Kershan!
data.desc_de: Captain Rogers ist ein Held, der die Galaxie beschützt. Furcht ist für ihn ein Fremdwort. Reue ist für ihn ein Fremdwort. Genau genommen ist vieles für ihn ein Fremdwort. Captain Rogers muss eine geheime Weltraumbasis gegen einen heimtückischen Angriff der Kershaner verteidigen. Hilf ihm!
data.desc_es: Capitán Rogers es un héroe defender la galaxia. Él no conoce el miedo. Él no conoce el remordimiento. En realidad, él no sabe mucho en general. En defensa de la Karmax-3 episodio, el capitán Rogers tiene que defender una base espacial secreta contra un ataque Kershan traicionero.

data.title: Simon Memory
data.description: A clone of the famous game Simon. Your goal is to memorize the color sequence and repeat it with no mistakes.
data.desc_it: Il clone del famosissimo gioco "Simon". Il vostro obiettivo è memorizzare la sequenza di colori e ripeterla senza sbagliare.
data.desc_en: A clone of the famous game Simon. Your goal is to memorize the color sequence and repeat it with no mistakes.
data.desc_fr: Jouez à un clone du célèbre jeu "Simon". Votre but est de mémoriser des séquences de couleur et de les répéter dans faire une seule erreur!
data.desc_de: Ein Klon des berühmten Spiels Simon. Dein Ziel ist es, dir die Farbfolge zu merken und sie zu wiederholen, ohne Fehler zu machen.
data.desc_es: Un clon del famoso juego Simon. Tu objetivo será el de memorizar secuencias de colores y repetirlas sin errores.

data.title: Flappy Ball
data.description: Flappy Ball is an HTML5 action game. The game is freely inspired to the popular game "Flappy Bird". The goal of the player is to tap the screen to let the ball survive as long as possible avoiding the poles.
data.desc_it: Flappy Ball è un gioco d'azione in HTML5. Totalmente ispirato al famoso "Flappy Bird", il vostro scopo è toccare sullo schermo e far sopravvivere la palla il più possibile evitando i pali.
data.desc_en: Flappy Ball is an HTML5 action game. The game is freely inspired to the popular game "Flappy Bird". The goal of the player is to tap the screen to let the ball survive as long as possible avoiding the poles.
data.desc_fr: Flappy Ball est un jeu d'action en HTML5 librement inspiré du célèbre "Flappy Bird". Votre but est de faire voler votre ballon le plus longtemps possible en appuyant sur l'écran, sans qu'elle ne touche jamais les poteaux!
data.desc_de: Flappy Ball ist ein HTML5-Actionspiel. Das Spiel wurde frei von dem beliebten Spiel „Flappy Bird“ inspiriert. Das Ziel des Spielers ist es, auf den Bildschirm zu tippen, um den Ball so lange wie möglich zu behalten und dabei den Stangen auszuweichen.
data.desc_es: Flappy Ball es un juego de acción en HTML5. El juego está inspirado libremente en el popular "Flappy Bird". El objetivo del juego es el pulsar en la pantalla para hacer que la bola sobreviva tanto como sea posible evitando los postes.

data.title: Pie Attack
data.description: Oh no! Super bad cake villains invaded the city! The police is helpless - only the special Pie Attack force can stop the bad guys! Also, there are some old ladies in the hideout (no idea what kind of bad things the bad guys done to the old ladies). Please don't throw pie at them as well. Otherwise - it's Pie Attack time!
data.desc_it: Oh no! Super cattivi tortaioli hanno invaso la città! La polizia è impotente - solo la forza speciale delle torte può fermare i cattivi! Inoltre, ci sono alcune vecchie signore sotto ostagio. Fai attenzione a non colpirle, ma se non sono loro dacci dentro! Gioca Pie Attack!
data.desc_en: Oh no! Super bad cake villains invaded the city! The police is helpless - only the special Pie Attack force can stop the bad guys! Also, there are some old ladies in the hideout (no idea what kind of bad things the bad guys done to the old ladies). Please don't throw pie at them as well. Otherwise - it's Pie Attack time!
data.desc_fr: Des gateaux très méchants ont envahi la ville et la police ne peut rien faire! Seule l'équipe de choc des  super tartes peut les stopper! Lancez les tartes sur vos ennemis et évitez d'entartrer les vieilles dames qui arpentent le décor!,Des gateaux trÃ¨s mÃ©chants ont envahi la ville et la police ne peut rien faire! Seule l'Ã©quipe de choc des  super tartes peut les stopper! Lancez les tartes sur vos ennemis et Ã©vitez d'entartrer les vieilles dames qui arpentent le dÃ©cor!
data.desc_de: Oh nein! Superböse Kuchen-Schurken haben die Stadt überfallen! Die Polizei ist hilflos – Einzig und allein die spezielle Kuchen-Attacken-Macht kann die Bösewichte aufhalten! Es befinden sich auch ein paar alte Damen in dem Versteck. (Keine Ahnung, welche bösen Dinge die Bösewichte den alten Damen angetan haben.) Bitte bewirf sie nicht auch mit Kuchen. Aber davon abgesehen ist es jetzt Zeit für die Kuchen-Attacke!
data.desc_es: ¡Oh no! Los supervillanos galleteros han invadido la ciudad! La policía es inutil - solo la fuerza especial Pie Attack puede parar a los malos! También hay algunas señores mayores escondidas (ni idea qué cosas malas estarán haciéndoles los malos). Por favor no les lances tartas también. De todos modos, ¡es hora de Pie Attack!

data.title: Blop
data.description: Pop as many bubbles as you can in 20 seconds. What's your high score? Try "Blop" but be careful, it's an addictive game!
data.desc_it: Fai scoppiare più bolle possibili in massimo 20 secondi. Qual è il tuo punteggio più alto? Prova "Blop" ma stai attento, questo gioco crea dipendenza!
data.desc_en: Pop as many bubbles as you can in 20 seconds. What's your high score? Try "Blop" but be careful, it's an addictive game!
data.desc_fr: Eclatez autant de bulles que vous pouvez en 20 secondes! Quel sera votre meilleur score ? Essayez "blop" mais faites attention, ce jeu est addictif !
data.desc_de: Lass in 20 Sekunden so viele Blasen platzen, wie du kannst! Was ist dein Highscore? Probiere „Blop“ aus, aber sei gewarnt: Dieses Spiel macht süchtig!
data.desc_es: Explota tantas burbujas como sea posible en 20 segundos. ¿Cuál es tu puntuación máxima? Prueba "Blop" pero con cuidado, es muy adictivo!

data.title: Red Riding Hood Run
data.description: Avoid wolves and run, run...run!
data.desc_it: Evitate i lupi e correte, correte…correte!
data.desc_en: Avoid wolves and run, run...run!
data.desc_fr: Une petite fille doit rendre visite à sa grand-mère. Ramassez les paniers et surtout courez, courez et courez encore pour éviter les loups sur le chemin!
data.desc_de: Weiche den Wölfen aus und renne, renne … renne!
data.desc_es: La niña tiene que visitar a su abuelita - recoger las cestas y evitar que los lobos en el camino.

data.title: FizColor
data.description: Tap the correct color bar on the screen to reply the color request as fast as possible within a second. Minimalist graphics and challenging gameplay design.
data.desc_it: Cliccate sul pulsante giusto in modo che il colore combaci con la richiesta del gioco, nel minor tempo possibile. Una grafica minimal e una modalità di gioco davvero divertente.
data.desc_en: Tap the correct color bar on the screen to reply the color request as fast as possible within a second. Minimalist graphics and challenging gameplay design.
data.desc_fr: Tapez sur la barre adéquate de façon à reproduire la bonne couleur, le tout en moins d'une seconde! Profitez d'un gameplay progressif et d'un design minimaliste dans ce pur jeu de réflexe!
data.desc_de: Tippe innerhalb einer Sekunde so schnell du kannst auf dem Bildschirm auf den Balken mit der gewünschten Farbe. Minimalistische Grafik und ein anspruchsvoll designtes Gameplay.
data.desc_es: Pulsa en el color correcto de la pantalla para respnder a la petición tan rápido como sea posible en un segundo. Gráficos minimalistas y un diseño de juego que será un reto.

data.title: KubeX
data.description: KubeX is a brain training game where you have to identify the odd coloured square amongst others in a grid. You have a minute to get as many as you can, and it is easy to get stumped on now and again.
data.desc_it: KubeX è un gioco per allenare la mente in cui devi identificare il quadrato colorato nel modo sbagliato tra una serie di quadrati disposti a griglia. Hai a disposizione un minuto per trovarne più che puoi e restarci fregato qua e là.
data.desc_en: KubeX is a brain training game where you have to identify the odd coloured square amongst others in a grid. You have a minute to get as many as you can, and it is easy to get stumped on now and again.
data.desc_fr: KubeX est un jeu d'entrainement cérébral où vous devez identifier un carré de couleur spéciale perdu au milieu d'autres. Trouvez autant de carrés que possible en une minute pour exploser le high score. Attention ce jeu est particulièrement addictif!
data.desc_de: KubeX ist ein Gehirntraining-Spiel, in dem du das Quadrat finden musst, dessen Farbe sich von der der anderen im Raster unterscheidet. Du hast eine Minute, um so viele von ihnen zu finden, wie du kannst, und es kann schon mal vorkommen, dass man nicht mehr weiter weiß.
data.desc_es: KubeX en un brain trainer en el que deberás identificar el cuadrado de color un poco diferente del resto que aparece. Tendrás un minuto de tiempo para conseguir tantos como puedas, y es fácil quedarse pillado una y otra vez.

data.title: JomJom Jump
data.description: Dash from platform to platform in this endless jumping game. How many sweet apples will JomJom eat, before he'll miss a platform and fall? You'll love "JomJom Jump"!
data.desc_it: Salta da una piattaforma all'altra in questo infinito gioco di salti. Quante mele dolcissime mangerà Jom Jom prima che manchi un appiglio e cada giù? Questo gioco ti piacerà assai!
data.desc_en: Dash from platform to platform in this endless jumping game. How many sweet apples will JomJom eat, before he'll miss a platform and fall? You'll love "JomJom Jump"!
data.desc_fr: Dans "Jomjom Jump", vous incarnez Jomjom et devez sauter de plateformes en plateformes tout en mangeant un maximum de pommes! Attention à ne pas tomber, sinon la partie s'arrête!
data.desc_de: Sprinte in diesem unendlichen Springspiel von Plattform zu Plattform. Wie viele süße Äpfel wird JomJom essen, bevor er eine Plattform verfehlt und fällt? Du wirst JomJom Jump lieben!
data.desc_es: Poco JomJom monstruo le gustaría un poco de fruta sabrosa o dos - ayudar a conseguir eso! Dash de plataforma en plataforma en este juego de saltos sin fin. Toque en el lado derecho de la pantalla para hacer JomJom saltar a la derecha y toque en el lado izquierdo para saltar izquierda. Carrera contra el tiempo (se puede agarrar bonos adicionales de tiempo, así) y obtener la mayor cantidad de frutas que puedas.

data.title: Alienanza
data.description: Put your memory and reflexes to a test in Alienanza, the fun mind-bending space game! How long can you keep track of crazy aliens from outer space? Simply tap YES if the new alien is the same as the last one. Wait, is it YES or NO? Uh-oh, time is running out and the pace is picking up really fast! How many of these cute extra terrestrials can you get through before losing your mind? Boast your score to friends and challenge them to do better!
data.desc_it: Metti alla prova la tua memoria e i tuoi riflessi in questo gioco. Quanto riuscirai a tenere traccia degli alieni venuti dallo spazio? Clicca SI che il nuovo alieno è uguale al precedente. Il tempo scorre velocemente! Quanti di questi extra terrestri riuscirai a superare prima di perdere la testa totalmente? Sfida i tuoi amici a fare meglio di te!
data.desc_en: Put your memory and reflexes to a test in Alienanza, the fun mind-bending space game! How long can you keep track of crazy aliens from outer space? Simply tap YES if the new alien is the same as the last one. Wait, is it YES or NO? Uh-oh, time is running out and the pace is picking up really fast! How many of these cute extra terrestrials can you get through before losing your mind? Boast your score to friends and challenge them to do better!
data.desc_fr: Mettez vos méninges et vos réflexes à l'épreuve dans Alienanza, le jeu de réflexion de l'espace! Combien de temps parviendrez-vous à garder la trace de ces aliens complètement dingos? Appuyez simplement sur "OUI" si le nouvel alien est le même que le précédent. Attendez une minute, c'était bien le même...ou pas? Attention, l'horloge tourne, et le rhytme s'accélère très rapidement! Combien d'alien arriverez-vous à gérer avant de perdre la boule?
data.desc_de: Teste in Alienanza, dem irren Weltraumspiel, dein Gedächtnis und deine Reflexe! Wie lange kannst du der Spur verrückter Aliens aus dem Weltall folgen? Tippe einfach JA an, wenn der neue Alien derselbe wie der letzte Alien ist. Moment, ist das ein JA oder ein NEIN? Oh oh, die Zeit läuft ab und das Tempo nimmt zu! Wie viele dieser niedlichen Außerirdischen schaffst du, bevor du den Verstand verlierst? Gib vor Freunden mit deiner Punktzahl an und fordere sie heraus, dich zu übertrumpfen!
data.desc_es: Pon a prueba tu memoria y reflejos en un examen de Alienanza, el divertido y alucinante juego espacial. ¿Cuánto te va a llevar encontrar el rastro de los alienígenas locos de fuera del espacio? Simplemente pulsa SÍ si el nuevo alien es el mismo que el último. Espera, ¿es SÍ o es NO?, vaya el tiempo se acaba y pasa muy muy rápido. ¿Cuántos de estos preciosos extraterrestres eres capaz de encontrar antes de volverte loco? Enseña tus mejores puntuaciones a tus amigos y rétales a hacerlo mejor.

data.title: TimberMan
data.description: Become a timberman, chop wood and avoid the branches. Sounds like an easy task? It's easy to play but hard to master.. Take your axe as every lumberjack does and chop the tree as fast as you can!
data.desc_it: Timberman è un gioco retrò in stile Arcade: spacca i legni ed evita i rami. Pensi sia facile? E' facile giocare si, ma è davvero dura diventare bravi! Usa l'accetta più veloce che puoi!
data.desc_en: Become a timberman, chop wood and avoid the branches. Sounds like an easy task? It's easy to play but hard to master.. Take your axe as every lumberjack does and chop the tree as fast as you can!
data.desc_fr: Timberman est un style arcade jeu casual oldschool. Devenir Timberman, couper du bois et éviter les branches. Sonne comme une tâche facile? Il est facile à jouer mais difficile à maîtriser. 4 environnements variables et 8 Timbermen pour déverrouiller. Maîtriser vos compétences pour les meilleurs dossiers sur les classements.
data.desc_de: Werde zum Waldarbeiter, hacke Holz und weiche Ästen aus. Du findest, das klingt einfach? Es ist einfach zu spielen, aber schwer zu meistern … Nimm deine Axt wie ein echter Holzfäller und fälle den Baum, so schnell du kannst!
data.desc_es: Timberman es un juego casual de estilo arcade de la vieja escuela. Convertirse en un Timberman, cortar leña y evitar las ramas. Suena como una tarea fácil? Es fácil de jugar pero difícil de dominar. 4 ambientes variables y 8 Timbermen para desbloquear. Dominar sus habilidades de los mejores registros en las tablas de clasificación.

data.title: Shapes
data.description: The goal is to match the shapes with the same color. It sounds easy, right? Tap the screen and play the game! Play "Shapes" now!
data.desc_it: L'obiettivo è accoppiare le forme con lo stesso colore. Sembra facile, vero? Cliccate sullo schermo e giocate ora a "Shapes"!
data.desc_en: The goal is to match the shapes with the same color. It sounds easy, right? Tap the screen and play the game! Play "Shapes" now!
data.desc_fr: L'objectif est de faire correspondre les formes de la même couleur. Facile dites-vous ? Touchez l'écran et vous verrez bien!
data.desc_de: Das Ziel ist es, Formen mit der gleichen Farben zusammenzubringen. Das klingt einfach, nicht? Tippe auf den Bildschirm und spiele das Spiel! Spiele jetzt Shapes!
data.desc_es: El objetivo es conseguir juntar las formas del mismo color, y eso parece fácil… Pulsa en la pantalla y juega a "Shapes" ya.

data.title: SnakeBit 3310
data.description:
Play Snake like it is 2000. SnakeBit 3310 is aa remake of the original Snake, complete with dot-matrix display and monotone sounds. Rewind time and enjoy this fantastic retrogame like in the past.
SnakeBit 3310 is playable online by mobile and desktop devices
data.desc_en:
Play Snake like it is 2000. SnakeBit 3310 is aa remake of the original Snake, complete with dot-matrix display and monotone sounds. Rewind time and enjoy this fantastic retrogame like in the past.
SnakeBit 3310 is playable online by mobile and desktop devices

data.title: 12 MiniBattles - Two Players
data.description:
12 MiniBattles is a fun multiplayer game where you can play against a friend on a variety of games. This physics style game has different game types that you can play at random including a soccer match and sniper warfare. All of the different games have a one-button control system making them easy to play for the maximum amount of fun.
This addictive gameplay will keep you and a friend entertained for hours. Play all the games and spend hours getting the better of your friends. Have fun and win every game!

12 MiniBattles was the second runner-up in the 2018 CrazyGames Developer contest. The jury of three independent game experts loved the 2 player setup and varied gameplay with retro graphics. "Party Games are a hit or miss, this one is a hit. The concepts are well executed and I really like the game's quick pacing and single button input."

FEATURES:

A fun 2-player arcade game
Various randomized games to play, including fan-made popular titles, such as Rooftop Snipers and Soccer Physics
Easy one button controls
Addictive and challenging gameplay

CONTROLS:

Player 1 use A
Player 2 use L

data.description: Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they will merge into one!
data.desc_it: Unite i numeri per ottenere la somma delle caselle pari a 2048! Usate le frecce per muovere le caselle. Quando due con lo stesso numero si toccano, si sommeranno!
data.desc_en: Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they will merge into one!
data.desc_fr: Dans cette version HTML5 du célèbre 2048, utilisez les touches fléchées pour déplacer les tuiles. Lorsque deux tuiles avec le même chiffre se touchent, elles fusionnent. Atteignez le nombre 2048 pour gagner!
data.desc_de: Verbinde die Zahlen und erreiche das Feld mit der Zahl 2048! Benutze deine Pfeiltasten, um die Felder zu bewegen. Wenn zwei Felder mit gleichen Zahlen aufeinandertreffen, verschmelzen sie zu einem Feld!
data.desc_es: Este juego 2048 es un divertido y adictivo juego simple número, rompecabezas. Únete a los números y llegar al 2048 fichas!

data.title: Amazing Sheriff
data.description: Pin on your shiny sheriff's badge, load up your six-shooters, and get ready for some amazing action. Take control of this high flying Sheriff on a wheel-spinning, bottle-breaking wild ride! Yee-haw!
data.desc_en: Pin on your shiny sheriff's badge, load up your six-shooters, and get ready for some amazing action. Take control of this high flying Sheriff on a wheel-spinning, bottle-breaking wild ride! Yee-haw!

data.title: Babel Tower
data.description:
You are building the Tower of Babel, that will reach to the sky!
You have a team of professionals: miners, masons, crafters, lumberjacks, builders, who will help you achieve success in this incremental idle game.

New fun machines are unlocked with every tower floor.

The game was made by Airapport and expands our idle games universe. 

Controls
Press-and-hold on the screen to mine stone, transfer stone to processing, speed up bricks creation, chop trees, and perform other activities.

Sell part of your resources at the Market to gain money for upgrades. At certain upgrade level the building works by itself, you will be spectating and having fun.

Restarting your tower building gives you Golden Bricks, which boost your tap power, production and increase market prices.

If you are away you are earning time bonus, which can be used to speed up game processes.

Buy special artifacts to boost your progress even further.

data.title: Banana Poker
data.description: Poker. It can be hard to learn and surely very hard to master. If you put in the effort, it's a lot of fun and good for your brain. Nice that it's been given a sweet cartoon makeover. Enter Banana Poker...
data.desc_en: Poker. It can be hard to learn and surely very hard to master. If you put in the effort, it's a lot of fun and good for your brain. Nice that it's been given a sweet cartoon makeover. Enter Banana Poker...

data.title: Basketball Master
data.description: The challenge for real basketball and streetball players! Jump with the ball and shoot the basket within the time limit. Reach the highest score and collect coins. Unlock all balls and locations. Try 2 game modes. You need precise timing, good aiming and a bit of luck.
data.desc_it: La sfida per i veri giocatori di basket da strada! Salta con la palla e fai canestro entro il limite di tempo. Raggiungi il punteggio più alto e ottieni le monete. Sblocca tutte le palle e i campi di gioco. Prova 2 modalità di gioco. Ti occorrono tempismo, una buona mira e un po' di fortuna.
data.desc_en: The challenge for real basketball and streetball players! Jump with the ball and shoot the basket within the time limit. Reach the highest score and collect coins. Unlock all balls and locations. Try 2 game modes. You need precise timing, good aiming and a bit of luck.
data.desc_fr: Un défi pour les vrais joueurs de basket et de streetball ! Sautez avec le ballon et faites un panier dans le délai imparti. Obtenez le meilleur score et collectez des pièces. Débloquez tous les ballons et lieux. Essayez 2 modes de jeu. Il vous faudra un timing précis, viser juste et un peu de chance.
data.desc_de: Die Herausforderung für echte Basketball- und Streetball-Spieler! Lass den Ball aufspringen und werfe ihn innerhalb des Zeitlimits. Knacke den Highscore und sammle Münzen. Schalte alle Bälle und Plätze frei. Spiele in 2 Spielmodi. Du brauchst perfektes Timing, Zielvermögen und ein bisschen Glück.
data.desc_es: ¡El desafío para verdaderos jugadores de baloncesto y streetball! Salta con el balón y encesta dentro del límite de tiempo. Alcanza la mayor puntuación y recoge monedas. Desbloquea todos los balones y ubicaciones. Prueba los 2 modos de juego. Necesitarás precisión, buena puntería y un poco de suerte.

data.title: Basketball Master 2
data.description: Play through the 40 challenging levels and try to solve physics based puzzles. You’ll need to avoid solid obstacles, players, smash through glass and wood and figure out how to put the ball through the hoop!
data.desc_it: Gioca tutti e 40 i livelli e prova a risolvere i puzzle pieni di trucchetti! Dovrai evitare ostacoli solidi, altri giocatori, superare vetro e legno e trovare la via per mettere la palla nel canestro!
data.desc_en: Play through the 40 challenging levels and try to solve physics based puzzles. You’ll need to avoid solid obstacles, players, smash through glass and wood and figure out how to put the ball through the hoop!

data.title: Basketball Stars
data.description:
Basketball Stars is a 2-player basketball game. In this game, you can play with your favorite team and play with basketball legends. In this game, you can either play with friends in 2-player mode or solo in single-player mode.
Show off your basketball skills and see if you can score a three-pointer or slam home an impressive dunk! You can play as many different legendary teams and try out both your defensive and offensive skills.
data.desc_en:
Basketball Stars is a 2-player basketball game. In this game, you can play with your favorite team and play with basketball legends. In this game, you can either play with friends in 2-player mode or solo in single-player mode.
Show off your basketball skills and see if you can score a three-pointer or slam home an impressive dunk! You can play as many different legendary teams and try out both your defensive and offensive skills.

data.title: Basketball Swooshes
data.description:
Basketball Swooshes is a fun online basketball game. Choose your favorite team, then try to prove to the world you are the best at shooting baskets. After winning (or skipping) group stages, the knock-out phase begins. Win every match to earn your spot in the finals of Basket Swooshes Plus. Are you calm and precise enough to win the tournament?

The game has two additional modes: 'Time Challenge' and '2 Players Mode' (where you can play against your friend on two devices).

How to play:
Move mouse pointer or drag to aim and shoot. The first team to score 11 point wins.

Basketball Swooshes is a fun online basketball game. Choose your favorite team, then try to prove to the world you are the best at shooting baskets. data.title: Bois d'Arc: Bow Shooting
data.description:
Defend your castle against unimaginable dark forces trying to breach its mighty walls. Pick one of three kingdoms' bow shooter heroes out in this super addictive and action-packed bow shooting game. Bois d’Arc has already been played by millions online and now we bring you the full mobile version! 
Choose your hero and take the forces of evil head on!
data.desc_it: Difendi il tuo castello contro inimmaginabili forze oscure che cercano di violare le sue possenti mura. Scegliere uno dei tre regni arco sparatutto eroe in questo gioco super coinvolgente e pieno di azione di tiro dell'arco. Bois D'Arc già è già stato giocato da milioni sui molti siti di gioco diversi. Pertanto VascoGames è orgogliosa di presentare la versione completa mobile del gioco sparatutto arco, scegli il tuo eroe e prendere le forze del male sulla testa!
data.desc_en:
Defend your castle against unimaginable dark forces trying to breach its mighty walls. Pick one of three kingdoms' bow shooter heroes out in this super addictive and action-packed bow shooting game. Bois d’Arc has already been played by millions online and now we bring you the full mobile version! 
Choose your hero and take the forces of evil head on!
data.desc_fr: Défendez votre château contre des forces obscures qui tentent de violer inimaginables ses puissants murs. Choisir l'un des trois royaumes arc de tir de héros dans ce jeu de tir arc super addictif et bourré d'action. Bois D'Arc déjà a déjà été joué par des millions sur les nombreux sites de jeu différents. Par conséquent VascoGames est fier de vous présenter la version complète mobile de ce jeu de tir à l'arc, choisissez votre héros et prendre les forces de mal sur la tête!
data.desc_de: Verteidigen Sie Ihre Burg gegen die unvorstellbare dunklen Kräfte versuchen, seinen mächtigen Mauern durchbrechen. Suchen Sie sich eine der drei Königreiche Bogen Shooter Helden in dieser super süchtig und actionreiche Bogenschießen-Spiel. Bois D'Arc schon bereits von Millionen auf die vielen verschiedenen Spiel Websites gespielt. Daher VascoGames ist stolz darauf, Ihnen die vollständige mobile Version dieser Bogen-Shooter-Spiel zu bringen, wählen Sie Ihren Helden und nehmen die Kräfte des Bösen Kopf!
data.desc_es: Defiende tu castillo contra inimaginables fuerzas oscuras que tratan de violar sus poderosos muros. Escoja uno de los tres reinos arco tirador héroe en este juego súper adictivo y lleno de acción de tiro con arco. Bois D'Arc ya ha sido jugado por millones en los muchos sitios web de juego diferentes. Por lo tanto VascoGames es orgulloso de presentar la versión móvil completa de este juego de disparos en proa, elegir a tu héroe y tomar las fuerzas del mal en la cabeza!

data.title: Brazil Cup 2014
data.description: Start the road to world cup 2014 with Brazil Cup 2014, one of the best soccer games on the web.
data.desc_it: Incamminatevi lungo la via della coppa del mondo 2014, uno dei migliori giochi di calcio sul web!
data.desc_en: Start the road to world cup 2014 with Brazil Cup 2014, one of the best soccer games on the web.
data.desc_fr: Embarquez pour la Coupe du Monde 2014 grâce à "Brazil Cup 2014", un des meilleurs jeux de football disponible sur le web.
data.desc_de: Beginne die Reise zur Weltmeisterschaft 2014 mit Brazil Cup 2014, einem der besten Fußball-Spiele im Web.
data.desc_es: Comienza el camino al mundial de 2014 con "La copa de Brazil 2014" uno de los mejores juegos de fútbol de internet.

data.title: Bread Pit
data.description: In this funny little game you will have to help a piece of bread become a fragrant crispy toast. There will be traps to avoid: forks and knives sticking out.
data.desc_en: In this funny little game you will have to help a piece of bread become a fragrant crispy toast. There will be traps to avoid: forks and knives sticking out.

data.title: Bread Pit 2
data.description: If you liked the first episode, help Pit again in becoming the most crispy toast ever! Watch out for all traps and enjoy a nice asiatic design!
data.desc_en: If you liked the first episode, help Pit again in becoming the most crispy toast ever! Watch out for all traps and enjoy a nice asiatic design!

data.title: Bubble Shooter HD
data.description: This Bubble Shooter game is very intuitive and easy to learn. It's a mix between "Tetris", "Connect Four" and "Puzzle Bubble", that's probably why it's so easy to get hooked on the game. Have fun!
data.desc_it: Bubble Shooter HD è un clone del famosissimo Puzzle Bobble. Fai scoppiare tutte le sfere dello stesso colore prima che raggiungano il limite dello schermo!
data.desc_en: This Bubble Shooter game is very intuitive and easy to learn. It's a mix between "Tetris", "Connect Four" and "Puzzle Bubble", that's probably why it's so easy to get hooked on the game. Have fun!
data.desc_fr: Le principe du jeu du tireur de bulles est simple – Il consiste à regrouper au moins trois bulles de la même couleur. Regroupez au moins trois bulles pour les faire éclater, gagnez des points et nettoyez l’espace du jeu.
data.desc_de: Dieses Bubble-Shooter-Spiel ist sehr intuitiv und leicht zu erlernen. Es ist eine Mischung aus „Tetris“, „Vier Gewinnt“ und „Puzzle Bubble“. Wahrscheinlich kann man deshalb nicht mehr damit aufhören, dieses Spiel zu spielen! Viel Spaß!
data.desc_es: Hay un objetivo muy simple en el juego Disparador de Burbujas – recolectar 3 o más bolas del mismo color. Haz combinaciones de 3 o más burbujas para que desaparezcan, gana puntos y limpia el terreno. Dispara bolas de colores desde el cańón para conectarlas con el grupo de burbujas del mismo color.

data.title: Bunny Quest
data.description: The bunny is on a carrot collecting adventure! Help him get to his goal by sliding road tiles to form a path. A classic puzzle game which is harder than it looks! Tons of levels in three modes to master. Test your skills and join the bunny's adventure!
data.desc_it: Il coniglietto è partito all'avventura in cerca di carote! Aiutalo a farlo arrivare al suo obiettivo spostando le piastrelle stradali per formare un percorso. Un classico puzzle game che è più difficile di quanto sembri! Tantissimi livelli in tre modalità da padroneggiare. Metti alla prova le tue abilità e unisciti all'avventura del coniglietto!
data.desc_en: The bunny is on a carrot collecting adventure! Help him get to his goal by sliding road tiles to form a path. A classic puzzle game which is harder than it looks! Tons of levels in three modes to master. Test your skills and join the bunny's adventure!
data.desc_fr: Ce lapin se lance dans une folle chasse aux carottes ! Aidez-le à atteindre son but en faisant glisser les tuiles pavées pour former un chemin. Un jeu de casse-têtes classique plus difficile qu'il n'y paraît ! Des tonnes de niveaux à travers trois modes à maîtriser. Testez vos compétences et rejoignez le lapin dans son aventure !
data.desc_de: Der Hase ist auf Karottenjagd! Hilft ihm, ans Ziel zu kommen, indem du aus den Kacheln einen Weg für ihn baust. Dieses klassische Knobelspiel ist schwieriger als es aussieht. Es erwarten dich viele verschiedene Levels in drei Modi. Beweise deine Fähigkeiten und begleitete den Hasen auf seinem Abenteuer!
data.desc_es: ¡Este conejo se ha embarcado en una aventura en busca de zanahorias! Ayúdale a alcanzar su objetivo desplazando las fichas para abrir el camino. ¡Este juego clásico de puzles es más difícil de lo que parece! Disfruta de numerosos niveles en tres modos. ¡Pon a prueba tus habilidades y acompaña al conejo en su aventura!

data.title: Candy Buff
data.description: In Candy Buff you need to eat candy to get buff and to refill your energy! Collect bonuses and avoid mice, thorns and birds!
data.desc_en: In Candy Buff you need to eat candy to get buff and to refill your energy! Collect bonuses and avoid mice, thorns and birds!

data.title: Candy Monsters
data.description: Help to a little monsters eat a candy with same color, but be careful, candies with other colors not to their liking. Good luck!
data.desc_en: Help to a little monsters eat a candy with same color, but be careful, candies with other colors not to their liking. Good luck!

data.title: Cat named Soko
data.description:
It is time to restore order! A little Cat named Soko wants to bring all balls to their correct position.
Will you help Soko to place the balls on the green box?
data.desc_en:
It is time to restore order! A little Cat named Soko wants to bring all balls to their correct position.
Will you help Soko to place the balls on the green box?

data.title: Catch The Apple 2
data.description: Everyone knows that hedgehogs don’t normally eat apples all but our super hero! Play Catch the Apple 2 and remember, an apple a day keeps a doctor away!
data.desc_en: Everyone knows that hedgehogs don’t normally eat apples all but our super hero! Play Catch the Apple 2 and remember, an apple a day keeps a doctor away!

data.title: Checkers Legend
data.description: The classic and very simple board game everyone knows from their childhood. It comes in many variants, so the game provides rules settings. You can play against the simple AI or you can use this app to play against a friend on the same device.
data.desc_it: Il gioco da tavolo tradizionale e semplice che tutti conoscono dalla loro infanzia. Il gioco offre molte modalità di gioco e fornisce l'opzione di modificare le regole. Puoi giocare contro l'IA o puoi usare questa app per giocare contro un amico sullo stesso dispositivo.
data.desc_en: The classic and very simple board game everyone knows from their childhood. It comes in many variants, so the game provides rules settings. You can play against the simple AI or you can use this app to play against a friend on the same device.
data.desc_fr: Le jeu de plateau classique et très simple que tout le monde connaît depuis son enfance. Il existe de nombreuses variantes, alors les règles sont fournies dans le jeu. Vous pouvez jouer simplement contre l'IA ou utiliser cette application pour jouer contre un ami sur le même appareil.
data.desc_de: Das klassische und ganz einfache Brettspiel, das jeder aus seiner Kindheit kennt. Es existiert in vielen Varianten, daher erklärt das Spiel die geltenden Regeln. Du kannst gegen die einfache KI spielen oder die App verwenden, um gegen einen Freund auf demselben Gerät zu spielen.
data.desc_es: Disfruta de este popular y clásico juego de mesa de toda la vida. Existen numerosas variantes, por lo que el juego permite configurar las reglas. Puedes jugar contra la sencilla IA o usar esta aplicación para jugar contra un amigo con el mismo dispositivo.

data.title: Chubby Birds
data.description: Chubby the Bird can't fly on his own! He needs your help. Can you help him flying to infinity?
data.desc_en: Chubby the Bird can't fly on his own! He needs your help. Can you help him flying to infinity?

data.title: Classic Snake HTML5
data.description:
Retro-style Classic Snake in HTML5, playable on desktop or mobile devices. One of the old games that you will never forget.
Classic Snake with classic gameplay, just eat, grow and have fun.
Also this one is the best pixel-retro snake pixeled graphics and online support.

Enjoy Classic Snake HTML5!
data.desc_en:
Retro-style Classic Snake in HTML5, playable on desktop or mobile devices. One of the old games that you will never forget.
Classic Snake with classic gameplay, just eat, grow and have fun.
Also this one is the best pixel-retro snake pixeled graphics and online support.

Enjoy Classic Snake HTML5!

data.title: Color Element
data.description: Color Element is the fun arcade game in which you have to pass through moving rings and obstacles of different colors. Based on the classic Color Switch game, you may only pass through the parts that are the same color as the ball that you are controlling.
