data.desc_en: Color Element is the fun arcade game in which you have to pass through moving rings and obstacles of different colors. Based on the classic Color Switch game, you may only pass through the parts that are the same color as the ball that you are controlling.

data.title: Color Snake DX
data.description: In Color Snake DX, your goal is to make as many points as possible by making the snake eat stars that shows up. The more you eat the longer will the snake grow. If the snake collides with the wall the game ends. Play Color Snake DX and keep improving your high score!
data.desc_en: In Color Snake DX, your goal is to make as many points as possible by making the snake eat stars that shows up. The more you eat the longer will the snake grow. If the snake collides with the wall the game ends. Play Color Snake DX and keep improving your high score!

data.title: Crazy Knife
data.description: Chop in the kitchen like a real master. It's so satisfying! - Easy control - Addictive gameplay - Crazy Knife is simple and fun!
data.desc_en: Chop in the kitchen like a real master. It's so satisfying! - Easy control - Addictive gameplay - Crazy Knife is simple and fun!

data.title: DIFF
data.description: Quickly tap the single difference in each set of characters, see how far you can get!
data.desc_en: Quickly tap the single difference in each set of characters, see how far you can get!

data.title: Dash Masters
data.description:
The rules are simple. Tap to jump in alternate directions. Swipe up to perform a Dash.

Get ready for a true adrenaline rush in this frantic game with dozens of action-packed missions! Fight your way through waves of spiky bots, turrets and moving platforms to the top of the alien battle tower.
data.desc_it:
Le regole sono semplici. Tocca per saltare in direzioni alternate. Scorri verso l'alto per effettuare uno scatto.

Vent'anni fa, gli alieni ci hanno attaccato e miliardi di vite sono state distrutte.

Noi pochi sopravvissuti ci siamo rifugiati sottoterra per creare un'arma che ci permettesse di riprenderci il nostro pianeta dalle grinfie di questa razza di alieni artificiali che chiamiamo Bot.

Con il prototipo Esoscheletro Modello C-31, tenterai l'impossibile: dovrai infiltrarti e distruggere le torri di attacco del nemico. Usa i motori esplosivi per distruggere i bot guardiani e sconfiggi le difese nemiche.
data.desc_en:
The rules are simple. Tap to jump in alternate directions. Swipe up to perform a Dash.

Get ready for a true adrenaline rush in this frantic game with dozens of action-packed missions! Fight your way through waves of spiky bots, turrets and moving platforms to the top of the alien battle tower.
data.desc_fr:
Les règles sont simples. Touchez l'écran pour sauter tous azimuts et faites glisser votre doigt vers le haut pour exécuter un Rush.

Il y a 20 ans, les extraterrestres ont attaqué. Des milliards d'innocents ont péri.

Quelques-uns d'entre nous sont parvenus à échapper in extremis à ce massacre systématique ! Nous nous sommes alors cachés et avons tout mis en œuvre pour créer la seule et unique arme qui nous permettrait de libérer la Terre et d'anéantir cette race d'aliens artificiels que nous avons surnommée les Robots.

Équipé de l'exo-armure C-31, vous tenterez l'impossible : infiltrer les tours offensives des extraterrestres et les démolir. Utilisez vos propulseurs pour détruire les Robots gardiens et frayez-vous un chemin à travers les défenses ennemies.
data.desc_de:
Die Regeln sind einfach. Tippe, um in andere Richtungen zu springen. Wische nach oben, um zu flitzen.

Vor zwanzig Jahren haben Außerirdische angegriffen. Milliarden verloren ihr Leben.

Es gab nur wenige Überlebende, die im Untergrund an der Konstruktion der ultimativen Waffe arbeiteten. Damit möchten wir unseren Planeten von dieser künstlichen außerirdischen Lebensform, die wir die ‚Bots‘ nennen, zurückgewinnen.

Mit dem Prototyp des Exoanzugs Modell C-31 kannst du das Unmögliche wagen: in die feindlichen Angriffstürme eindringen und sie zerstören. Nutze Schub-Triebwerke, um die Wächter-Bots zu zerstören und dich durch die feindliche Verteidigung zu kämpfen.
data.desc_es:
Las reglas son sencillas. Toca para saltar en direcciones alternas. Desliza hacia arriba para realizar una voladura.
Hace veinte años que los alienígenas nos atacaron. Se perdieron miles de millones de vidas.

Unos pocos supervivientes nos ocultamos en el subsuelo para crear el arma definitiva que nos permitiera arrebatar nuestro planeta a esa raza de seres extraterrestres artificiales que llamamos 'bots'.

Con el prototipo del exotraje Modelo C-31 vas a intentar lo imposible: infiltrarte y destruir las torres de combate enemigas. Utiliza los motores de explosión para destruir a los bots guardianes y ábrete paso a través de las defensas enemigas.

data.title: Death Run
data.description: This game is an adventure game. You have thousands of lives in your hands. The game is full of various agencies. As the controller of the agency, you can repel all people and avoid passing.
data.desc_en: This game is an adventure game. You have thousands of lives in your hands. The game is full of various agencies. As the controller of the agency, you can repel all people and avoid passing.

data.title: Diggy
data.description: Diggy is back! Dig all the way to the center of the moon. Collect treasure and upgrade your mining equipment to help you along the way.
data.desc_en: Diggy is back! Dig all the way to the center of the moon. Collect treasure and upgrade your mining equipment to help you along the way.

data.title: Doctor Teeth 2
data.description: Treat your patients and make them smile. Heal teeth of Emma Liam and Rob. Shot fluffy cavity monsters, solve matching  puzzles  and have fun!
data.desc_en: Treat your patients and make them smile. Heal teeth of Emma Liam and Rob. Shot fluffy cavity monsters, solve matching  puzzles  and have fun!

data.title: Donutosaur
data.description: Feed hungry adorable monster named Donutosaur. He likes candies but the thing he likes the most is a sweet yummy Donut!
data.desc_en: Feed hungry adorable monster named Donutosaur. He likes candies but the thing he likes the most is a sweet yummy Donut!

data.title: Donutosaur 2
data.description: Help Donutosaur get his donut! Collect candies by changing the shape of Donutosaur and switching the direction of gravity. Donutosaur's friends will be of great help - they can push, pull and destroy objects.
data.desc_en: Help Donutosaur get his donut! Collect candies by changing the shape of Donutosaur and switching the direction of gravity. Donutosaur's friends will be of great help - they can push, pull and destroy objects.

data.title: Dot Snap Battle
data.description: Tap, hold and shoot the dot into the box. Collect stars and unlock new dots. Play with or without your friends on the same device. Play more, Shoot more.
data.desc_en: Tap, hold and shoot the dot into the box. Collect stars and unlock new dots. Play with or without your friends on the same device. Play more, Shoot more.

data.title: Dots Mania
data.description: Relax by connecting colorful dots. Connect as much as you can and don't forget that they can be connected into a square! Different game modes and bonuses to make the game even brighter. It is time to connect!
data.desc_it: Rilassati unendo i puntini colorati! Unisci più puntini possibili e non dimenticare di provare il collegamento al quadrato! Diverse modalità di gioco danno al collegamento un gusto nuovo. Che si tratti della pressione del tempo, le mosse limitate o modalità infinita. Raggiungendo il punteggio più alto, con le coppe vinte puoi aquistare nel negozio strumenti come la rimozione del puntino, l'aggiunta delle mosse o del tempo, fino alla rimozione del colore. È arrivato il momento di unire!
data.desc_en: Relax by connecting colorful dots. Connect as much as you can and don't forget that they can be connected into a square! Different game modes and bonuses to make the game even brighter. It is time to connect!
data.desc_fr: Relaxez-vous en connectant les points colorés. Connectez le plus de points possible et n'oubliez pas qu'ils peuvent être connectés en un carré ! Des modes différents ajoutent de la variété au jeu. Il y a le contre-la-montre, la limite de mouvements, et le mode infini. Obtenez des scores élevés sous la forme de coupes, et échangez les coupes obtenues contre des bonus dans le magasin (retirer un point, ajouter des mouvements, ajouter du temps, ou même retirer une couleur). Il est temps de connecter !
data.desc_de: Entspanne dich, indem du die bunten Punkte verbindest. Verbinde so viele wie möglich und versuche auch Quadrate zu bilden. Unterschiedliche Spielmodi bringen ein neues Erlebnis ins Spiel. Ob unter Zeitdruck oder mit Zuglimit, Spaß ist garantiert. Außerdem erwartet dich auch eine unendliche Version. Dank Highscores in Form gewonnener Pokale erhältst du Bonusse wie Punkt entfernen, Farbe entfernen, Züge oder Zeit hinzufügen. Es ist Verbindungszeit!
data.desc_es: ¡Relájate uniendo los puntos de color! ¡Une cuanto más puntos y no olvides intentar unirlos en un cuadrado! Diferentes modos de juego dan un nuevo sabor a la unión. Ya si es la presión por tiempo, movimientos limitados o un modo infinito. Por lograr una puntuación más alta,  puedes conseguir en la tienda  por las copas ganadas los recursos como eliminación de punto, agregación de movimiento o de tiempo hasta eliminación de color. ¡Es momento unir!

data.title: Drag Racing Club
data.description: Enter the thrilling world of street drag racing in this unique game. Start as an unknown outsider and race your way to the top. Prove everyone that you're the best racer in the city. To achieve that, you will have to buy or win great cars from your opponents. Then tune them up into powerful racing machines. Drive on!
data.desc_it: Entra nell'emozionante mondo delle corse di dragster clandestine in questo gioco unico. Inizia come un sconosciuto e corri fino a raggiungere la vetta. Dimostra a tutti che sei il miglior pilota in città. Per farlo, dovrai acquistare o vincere grandi macchine dai tuoi avversari e trasformarle in potenti auto da corsa. Su, è ora di guidare!
data.desc_en: Enter the thrilling world of street drag racing in this unique game. Start as an unknown outsider and race your way to the top. Prove everyone that you're the best racer in the city. To achieve that, you will have to buy or win great cars from your opponents. Then tune them up into powerful racing machines. Drive on!
data.desc_fr: Entrez dans le monde passionnant des courses de dragsters dans ce jeu unique. Commencez comme outsider inconnu et frayez-vous un chemin jusqu'au sommet. Prouvez à tout le monde que vous êtes le meilleur pilote de la ville. Pour y parvenir, vous devrez acheter ou gagner les superbes voitures de vos adversaires. Ensuite tunez-les pour en faire des bolides puissants. En piste !
data.desc_de: Werde in diesem einzigartigen Spiel Teil der faszinierenden Welt illegaler Straßenrennen. Du beginnst als unbekannter Outsider und kämpfst dich mit jedem Rennen zur Spitze vor. Beweise allen, dass du der beste Rennfahrer der Stadt bist. Kaufe dafür gute Autos oder gewinne sie von deinen Gegnern und tune sie zu PS-starken Maschinen. Gib Gas!
data.desc_es: Sumérgete en el emocionante mundo de las carreras clandestinas en la calle. Comenzarás como un desconocido, así que tendrás que abrirte camino hasta llegar a lo más alto. Demuéstrales a todos que eres el mejor de la ciudad. Para ello, compra vehículos decentes o consigue los de tus rivales, y tunéalos hasta convertirlos en verdaderas máquinas de carreras. ¡A todo gas!

data.title: Drip Drop
data.description: The storm is coming! Avoid raindrops and call the sun back. But most importantly - don't fall off the paddle.
data.desc_en: The storm is coming! Avoid raindrops and call the sun back. But most importantly - don't fall off the paddle.

data.title: Drop Dunks
data.description: Slide your finger to guide the falling balls into the hoop. How many balls can you get?
data.desc_en: Slide your finger to guide the falling balls into the hoop. How many balls can you get?

data.title: Dune Surfer
data.description: Experience the thrill of launching yourself into the air, to the cosmos and beyond! But for that to be possible, you'll have to stretch your precision muscle and land perfect slides to get there. Easy to pick up, hard to master. Are you ready to take on the challenge and get as far as possible?
data.desc_it: Prova l'emozione di lanciarti in aria, nel cosmo e oltre! Ma per farlo, dovrai sfruttare al massimo le tue abilità di precisione per atterrare perfettamente. Facile da imparare, difficile da padroneggiare. Sei pronto ad affrontare la sfida e arrivare il più lontano possibile?
data.desc_en: Experience the thrill of launching yourself into the air, to the cosmos and beyond! But for that to be possible, you'll have to stretch your precision muscle and land perfect slides to get there. Easy to pick up, hard to master. Are you ready to take on the challenge and get as far as possible?
data.desc_fr: Frissonnez alors que vous êtes propulsé dans les airs, dans le cosmos et au-delà ! Mais pour y parvenir, vous devrez améliorer votre précision et réaliser des atterrissages parfaits. Facile à prendre en main, difficile à maîtriser. Êtes-vous prêt à relever le défi et à aller le plus loin possible ?
data.desc_de: Erlebe den Nervenkitzel, wenn du dich in die Luft schleuderst, in den Kosmos und darüber hinaus! Aber damit das möglich ist, musst du deinen Präzisionsmuskel anspannen und perfekt rutschend landen. Leicht zu erlernen, schwer zu meistern. Bist du bereit, dich der Herausforderung zu stellen, möglichst weit zu fliegen?
data.desc_es: ¡Disfruta de la emoción de lanzarte por los aires, al cosmos y más allá! Pero para ello, tendrás que mejorar tu precisión y realizar aterrizajes perfectos para llegar hasta allí. Es un juego sencillo de aprender, pero difícil de dominar. Estás listo para enfrentarte al desafío e intentar llegar lo más lejos posible?

data.title: Dunk Up Basketball
data.description: Dunk Up Basketball is a crazy arcade that anybody will enjoy... Shoot the hoops, unlock new balls, become a basketball star!
data.desc_en: Dunk Up Basketball is a crazy arcade that anybody will enjoy... Shoot the hoops, unlock new balls, become a basketball star!

data.title: Epic Gaul
data.description: Help a brave gaul to escape from prison, and back to his family. Collect stars for improve your skills and beat roman warriors.
data.desc_en: Help a brave gaul to escape from prison, and back to his family. Collect stars for improve your skills and beat roman warriors.

data.title: Fidget Spinner Creator
data.description: Do you like fidgets spinners and have you always wanted to create your own? Design your own spinner and start spinning. Each 5 spins you earn 1 coin.
data.desc_en: Do you like fidgets spinners and have you always wanted to create your own? Design your own spinner and start spinning. Each 5 spins you earn 1 coin.

data.title: Fidget Spinner Mania
data.description: What is a fidget spinner? It's a cool toy that's just twisting in your hands. Its function is simple, but the pleasure it gives is unlimited! A fidget spinner helps you relax and relieve stress with just a few simple spins. Stop nail-biting or pen-twirling. It is a toy for adults and children to spend time with. Collect them all!
data.desc_it: Cos'è un fidget spinner? È un fantastico giocattolo che ruota come una trottola nelle tue mani. È molto piccolo, ma offre un piacere infinito! Un fidget spinner ti aiuta a rilassarti e ad alleviare lo stress con qualche semplice giro. Smettila di mangiarti le unghie e i tappi delle penne. È un giocattolo per adulti e bambini. Colleziona tutti i vari fidget spinner.
data.desc_en: What is a fidget spinner? It's a cool toy that's just twisting in your hands. Its function is simple, but the pleasure it gives is unlimited! A fidget spinner helps you relax and relieve stress with just a few simple spins. Stop nail-biting or pen-twirling. It is a toy for adults and children to spend time with. Collect them all!
data.desc_fr: Un fidget spinner, c'est quoi ? C'est un jouet sympa qui tourne dans votre main. C'est un jeu très simple, mais le divertissement qu'il procure est sans limite. Le fidget spinner vous aide à vous détendre et à évacuer le stress en quelques tours seulement. Arrêtez de vous ronger les ongles ou de faire tourner votre stylo. C'est un jouet qui permet aux adultes et aux enfants de faire passer le temps. Récupérez tous les différents fidget spinners.
data.desc_de: Was genau ist eigentlich ein Fidget Spinner? Ganz einfach: ein cooler Handkreisel, der sich auf der Handfläche dreht. Ein kleines Spielzeug mit gewaltigem Spaßfaktor. Der Fidget Spinner hilft beim Abschalten und beim Stressabbau. Probier es selbst aus, und lass den Kreisel surren, statt auf den Nägeln zu kauen oder den Kuli auf dem Schreibtisch rotieren zu lassen. Ein Fidget Spinner ist ein tolles Spielzeug für Jung und Alt. Sammle alle Fidget Spinners in unserer Kollektion.
data.desc_es: ¿Qué es un fidget spinner? Es un alucinante juguete que gira en la mano. Es muy pequeño, pero ofrece horas de diversión ilimitadas. El fidget spinner te ayuda a relajarte y aliviar el estrés con tan solo unos cuantos giros. Deja de morderte las uñas o darle vueltas al bolígrafo. Con este juguete tanto adultos como niños disfrutarán de lo lindo. ¡Consigue todos los fidget spinners!

data.title: Fishing.io
data.description: In this fun and easy to play game you are about to become the first fisherman who ever reached the ocean floor! Collect fish and treasures to buy fishing net upgrades to reach deeper depths. Find more characters trapped in the sea and try to fill in your trophy room. Experience all of this with beautiful art style.
data.desc_it: In questo divertente gioco vestirai i panni del primo pescatore che abbia mai raggiunto il fondo dell'oceano. Raccogli pesci e tesori per comprare potenziamenti per reti da pesca e arrivare ancora più in profondità. Trova altri personaggi intrappolati in mare e riempi la sala dei trofei. Tutto questo in un gioco con uno stile artistico stupendo!
data.desc_en: In this fun and easy to play game you are about to become the first fisherman who ever reached the ocean floor! Collect fish and treasures to buy fishing net upgrades to reach deeper depths. Find more characters trapped in the sea and try to fill in your trophy room. Experience all of this with beautiful art style.
data.desc_fr: Dans ce jeu amusant et facile aux beaux graphismes, vous allez devenir le premier pêcheur à avoir atteint le fond de l'océan. Collectez des poissons et des trésors pour acheter des améliorations de filet de pêche qui vous permettront d'aller plus profondément. Trouvez plus de personnages pris au piège en mer et remplissez votre salle des trophées.
data.desc_de: In diesem unterhaltsamen und leicht zu spielenden Spiel wirst du der erste Fischer aller Zeiten sein, der je den Meeresboden erreicht. Sammle Fische und Schätze, um Fischernetz-Verbesserungen zu kaufen und größere Tiefen zu erreichen. Finde weitere Figuren, die im Meer gefangen sind und fülle deinen Trophäenraum. Erlebe all dies mit wunderschöner Grafik.
data.desc_es: En este divertido y sencillo juego, te vas a convertir en el primer pescador en llegar al fondo del mar. Pesca peces y recoge tesoros para mejorar tus redes y llegar todavía más lejos. Encuentra a los personajes atrapados en el mar e intenta llenar tu sala de trofeos. Disfruta de los maravillosos gráficos.

data.title: Flags Maniac
data.description: How well do you know the flags of the countries in the world? Can you recognize Switzerland, South Korea, Panama, Netherlands, Portugal or India?
data.desc_en: How well do you know the flags of the countries in the world? Can you recognize Switzerland, South Korea, Panama, Netherlands, Portugal or India?

data.title: Flappy Bird 3D
data.description:
Flappy's in 3D! Guide Flappy Bird 3D through as many pipes as you can. See the famous bird with a whole extra dimension. 

How to Play: 
Click/Tap to flap your bird upwards. Time your taps to make it through the pipes!
data.desc_en:
Flappy's in 3D! Guide Flappy Bird 3D through as many pipes as you can. See the famous bird with a whole extra dimension. 

How to Play: 
Click/Tap to flap your bird upwards. Time your taps to make it through the pipes!

data.title: Flappy Eros
data.description: Flap Eros' little wings and try to save St. Valentines Day! Collect hearts and different equipments to protect yourself during the journey!
data.desc_it: Muovi le alette di Eros e cerca di condividere più amore che puoi per San Valentino! Raccogli i cuori e tutti gli strumenti utili per proteggerti lungo il viaggio!
data.desc_en: Flap Eros' little wings and try to save St. Valentines Day! Collect hearts and different equipments to protect yourself during the journey!

data.title: Flappy FootChinko
data.description: Flappy FootChinko is a highly addictive hyper casual soccer game. It has 2 game modes, in the story mode you can win 7 international tournaments. The endless mode will challenge your sync skills. Tap to impulse the ball, beat your rivals, dodge all obstacles and score epic goals.
data.desc_en: Flappy FootChinko is a highly addictive hyper casual soccer game. It has 2 game modes, in the story mode you can win 7 international tournaments. The endless mode will challenge your sync skills. Tap to impulse the ball, beat your rivals, dodge all obstacles and score epic goals.

data.title: Flappy WOW
data.description: Flappy WOW is a funny version of the classic Flappy game. The player is in control of a meme and must dodge all the columns in order to gain the best score. Also, depending on the score the player gets, he will receive different trophies. Start playing now and gain the best scores in the global ranking!
data.desc_it: Flappy WOW è una divertente versione alternativa del classico gioco Flappy. Comandate un meme schivando tutte le colonne per raggiungere il miglior punteggio possibile. Inoltre, a seconda del punteggio che raggiungete, riceverete diversi trofei. Iniziate a giocare subito e fate il punteggio più alto nella classifica mondiale!
data.desc_en: Flappy WOW is a funny version of the classic Flappy game. The player is in control of a meme and must dodge all the columns in order to gain the best score. Also, depending on the score the player gets, he will receive different trophies. Start playing now and gain the best scores in the global ranking!
data.desc_fr: Flappy Wow est un nouveau jeu inspiré de "Flappy Bird". Prenez le contrôle d'un meme et évitez les colonnes pour marquer un maximum de points. Si vous êtes doué, vous recevrez des récompenses et pourrez même vous comparer aux meilleurs joueurs de la planète grâce au tableau mondial  des scores.
data.desc_de: Flappy WOW ist eine lustige Version des klassischen Spiels Flappy. Der Spieler steuert ein Meme und muss allen Säulen ausweichen, um die höchste Punktzahl zu erhalten. Der Spieler erhält abhängig von der erreichten Punktzahl unterschiedliche Trophäen. Spiele es jetzt und erreiche die höchste Punktzahl in der Weltrangliste!
data.desc_es: Flappy WOW es una divertida versión del ya clásico Flappy Birds. Tomarás el control de un meme y tendrás que evitar chocar con las columnas para hacerte con la mayor puntuación. También, dependerá de tu puntuación los trofeos que recibas. Juega ahora y consigue los mejores puntos del ranking global!

data.title: Flip Goal
data.description:
Aim the ball to hit the goal! Time your kick perfectly without touching any other soccer players. Pick up your favourite team!

As you progress, you’ll collect coins to upgrade your soccer stadium and get new soccer balls!

Win the soccer tournament, collect keys and open chests for more coins!

Become the world champion! With easy controls, Flip Goal gives you a whole new level of soccer experience.
data.desc_en:
Aim the ball to hit the goal! Time your kick perfectly without touching any other soccer players. Pick up your favourite team!

As you progress, you’ll collect coins to upgrade your soccer stadium and get new soccer balls!

Win the soccer tournament, collect keys and open chests for more coins!

Become the world champion! With easy controls, Flip Goal gives you a whole new level of soccer experience.

data.title: Fly & Pass
data.description: Fly and Pass it. You will win.
data.desc_en: Fly and Pass it. You will win.

data.title: Football Masters
data.description: Football Masters Euro 2020 is a fun soccer game.  In this game, you can play as your favorite team and compete against other teams in challenging football matches; solo or together with your friends. Show your best ball kicking moves!
data.desc_en: Football Masters Euro 2020 is a fun soccer game.  In this game, you can play as your favorite team and compete against other teams in challenging football matches; solo or together with your friends. Show your best ball kicking moves!

data.title: Football Tricks
data.description: Take control of your team on the field! Perform awesome Football Tricks and reinforce your team of champions to score goals from different positions!
data.desc_it: Prendete il controllo di una squadra di calcio sul campo! Divertitevi tra trucchi e strategia e rinforzate il vostro team di campioni per segnare goal da diverse angolazioni!
data.desc_en: Take control of your team on the field! Perform awesome Football Tricks and reinforce your team of champions to score goals from different positions!
data.desc_fr: Prenez le contrôle d'une équipe de football et devenez le maitre du terrain. Faites des figures incroyables et renforcez votre équipe de champions pour marquer des buts depuis n'importe quelle position!
data.desc_de: Übernimm Kontrolle über dein Team auf dem Feld! Führe krasse Fußball-Tricks aus und verstärke dein Team von Champions, um Tore aus verschiedenen Positionen zu schießen!
data.desc_es: Hazte con el control de tu equipo en el campo. Realiza increíbles trucos y refuerza tu equipo de campeones para marcar goles desde todas las posiciones.

data.title: Geometrical Dash
data.description: Take control of a square and get the end, that's it! But it's not as easy as it would seem. The levels you go through are pixel-perfect mazes made to test your reflexes. The only thing you need to do is jump, jump and jump again with the music! So jump into it and taste the beat of this tricky game!
data.desc_it: Prendi il controllo di un quadrato e arriva alla fine... Tutto qui! Ma non è così facile come sembra. I livelli sono dei perfetti labirinti pixellati fatti per mettere alla prova i tuoi riflessi. L'unica cosa che devi fare è saltare, saltare e ancora saltare con la musica! Quindi salta dentro e goditi il ritmo di questo gioco coinvolgente!
data.desc_en: Take control of a square and get the end, that's it! But it's not as easy as it would seem. The levels you go through are pixel-perfect mazes made to test your reflexes. The only thing you need to do is jump, jump and jump again with the music! So jump into it and taste the beat of this tricky game!
data.desc_fr: Contrôlez un carré et arrivez à la fin, c'est tout ! Mais ce n'est pas aussi facile. Les niveaux que vous traverserez sont des labyrinthes de pixels conçus pour tester vos réflexes. La seule chose que vous devez faire, c'est sauter, sauter, et sauter encore au son de la musique ! Alors plongez dans ce jeu et goûtez au rythme de ce jeu délicat !
data.desc_de: Übernimm die Kontrolle über ein Quadrat und erreiche das Ende. Das ist alles! Aber es ist nicht so einfach, wie es scheint. Die Level, die du durchquerst, sind pixelgenaue Labyrinthe, die deine Reflexe testen. Du musst nur im Takt der Musik springen, springen und noch mal springen! Also spring rein und koste den Beat dieses kniffligen Spiels!
data.desc_es: ¡Controla un cuadrado y llega hasta el final, eso es todo! Claro que no es tan fácil como parece… Los niveles que deberás superar son laberintos pixelados perfectos concebidos para poner a prueba tus reflejos. Lo único que puedes hacer es saltar una y otra vez al son de la música. ¡Salta y disfruta del ritmo de este exigente juego!

data.title: Golf Hunting 3D
data.description: Waves of ducks are flying over the golf course and we need you to take care of them… See if you can sink a few while you’re at it! Upgrade your gun while progressing through the stages. Unlock more powerful weapons as you increase your level.
data.desc_en: Waves of ducks are flying over the golf course and we need you to take care of them… See if you can sink a few while you’re at it! Upgrade your gun while progressing through the stages. Unlock more powerful weapons as you increase your level.

data.title: Gummy Blocks Evolution
data.description:
Drag and drop the blocks onto the board to create rows of gummies and make them disappear. 
Once you’re all out of room, it’ll be game over!
If you want to add adrenaline, try two new modes: “Advanced”, in which you will get fantastic bonuses in case you delete two or more lines of blocks at the same time. Bomb mode is a challenge: try to blow up a dynamite block in 9 moves.
data.desc_en:
Drag and drop the blocks onto the board to create rows of gummies and make them disappear. 
Once you’re all out of room, it’ll be game over!
If you want to add adrenaline, try two new modes: “Advanced”, in which you will get fantastic bonuses in case you delete two or more lines of blocks at the same time. Bomb mode is a challenge: try to blow up a dynamite block in 9 moves.

data.title: Halloween Horror Massacre
data.description: Halloween is near and also cold and spooky nights come along! Monsters besides haunting also have personal lives and get cold at nights too so they have to add wood to the furnace. So besides chopping heads down it's also needed to chop trees! But watch out, because their branches are also pointed at you! Chop off as many logs from the tree as you can while avoiding the approaching branches! Switch your position to avoid danger. Do you have what it takes to get the golden medal?
data.desc_it: Halloween è alle porte e le notti buie e tempestose si avvicinano! I mostri, oltre a terrorizzare la gente, hanno una vita privata e anche loro sentono freddo di notte e devono aggiungere legna alla caldaia. Quindi, oltre a tagliare le teste, devono tagliare anche gli alberi! Ma fai attenzione, perché i rami sono diretti verso di te! Taglia quanti più tronchi possibili dall'albero e schiva i rami! Spostati per evitare il pericolo. Hai la stoffa per vincere la medaglia d'oro?
data.desc_en: Halloween is near and also cold and spooky nights come along! Monsters besides haunting also have personal lives and get cold at nights too so they have to add wood to the furnace. So besides chopping heads down it's also needed to chop trees! But watch out, because their branches are also pointed at you! Chop off as many logs from the tree as you can while avoiding the approaching branches! Switch your position to avoid danger. Do you have what it takes to get the golden medal?
data.desc_fr: Halloween approche à grands pas, tout comme les nuits d'hiver froides et effrayantes ! Les horribles monstres ont aussi froid la nuit, alors ils doivent ajouter du bois à la chaudière. En plus de couper des têtes, ils doivent couper du bois ! Mais attention, leurs branches sont aussi dirigées vers vous ! Coupez autant de bûches que possible de l'arbre tout en évitant les branches qui approchent ! Changez de position pour éviter le danger. Avez-vous ce qu'il faut pour gagner la médaille d'or ?
data.desc_de: Halloween und gruselig kalte Nächte stehen vor der Tür! Aber Monster spuken nicht nur, sie haben auch ein Privatleben und frieren manchmal. Deshalb sammeln sie Feuerholz für ihren Kamin. Hier geht also nicht nur um abgehackte Köpfe, sondern auch um abgehackte Äste. Aber pass auf! Die Äste sind auf dich gerichtet! Hacke möglichst viele Stücke vom Baum und weiche dabei den Ästen aus! Wechsle den Standort, um dich nicht in Gefahr zu bringen. Hast du das Zeug, um die goldene Medaille zu holen?
data.desc_es: Se acerca Halloween ¡y con él las frías y horripilantes noches! Los monstruos, además de cazar, también hacen vida en sus casas y pasan frío, por lo que tienen que echar madera a la estufa. ¡No solo basta con cortar cabezas, sino que también tienen que talar árboles! ¡Pero cuidado con las ramas! Tala tantos troncos de los árboles como puedas y evita las ramas que se aproximan. Cambia de posición para evitar el peligro. ¿Tienes lo que hace falta para conseguir la medalla de oro?

data.title: Helix Blitz
data.description: Helix Blitz, the ultimate arcade game where you need to move the ball of paint down the helixes! Try to avoid the helixes and enter the cool Blitz mode!
data.desc_en: Helix Blitz, the ultimate arcade game where you need to move the ball of paint down the helixes! Try to avoid the helixes and enter the cool Blitz mode!

data.title: Jewel Bubbles 3
data.description: Jewel Bubbles 3 back again in dazzling colours! The classic turn-based match 3 with lots of challenging levels to beat! Various goals in different game modes and useful bubble combinations to use tactically. Warning! Includes a bonus pack of levels for the best!
data.desc_en: Jewel Bubbles 3 back again in dazzling colours! The classic turn-based match 3 with lots of challenging levels to beat! Various goals in different game modes and useful bubble combinations to use tactically. Warning! Includes a bonus pack of levels for the best!

data.title: Jewel Duel
data.description: Not even the oldest ones remember when their beautiful country, Kartucia, was taken over by two fiery wizards using black magic. It's been a really long time since Kartucia was immersed in darkness and was suffering everyday under the servants of the fiery wizards' power. Legend has it that a hero would have come restoring peace in the country. But time is running out! The fiery wizards are about to open the abyss of horror, releasing thousands of demons and everything would be lost forever. Everyone believes you are the hero: do not disappoint them!
data.desc_it: Neanche i più vecchi non si ricordano più da quando il loro paese splendido Cartuzia è predominato dalla magia nera di due magi di fuoco. Fa davvero molto tempo che Cartuzia è tuffata nell'oscurità e sofferenza che i servi di magi gli portano tutti i giorni. La leggenda dice che un eroe verrà a ristabilire la pace nel paese. Ma il tempo passa! I magi di fuoco vogliono aprire il pozzo d'orrore che farà venire migliaia di demoni. Tutto sarebbe allora perso. Tutti credono che quest'eroe sia precisamente tu.
data.desc_en: Not even the oldest ones remember when their beautiful country, Kartucia, was taken over by two fiery wizards using black magic. It's been a really long time since Kartucia was immersed in darkness and was suffering everyday under the servants of the fiery wizards' power. Legend has it that a hero would have come restoring peace in the country. But time is running out! The fiery wizards are about to open the abyss of horror, releasing thousands of demons and everything would be lost forever. Everyone believes you are the hero: do not disappoint them!
data.desc_fr: Même les plus vieux ne se rappellent plus depuis quand leur magnifique pays Cartucie est-il dominé par la magie noire de deux mages de feu. Ça fait vraiment longtemps que la Cartucie est plongé dans l´obscurité et souffrance que des serviteurs de mages lui portent tous les jours. La légende dit qu´un héros viendra pour restaurer la paix dans le pays. Mais le temps passe ! Les mages de feu veulent ouvrir le gouffre d´horreur qui fera venir des milliers de démons. Tout serait alors perdu. Tout le monde croit que ce héros c´est justement toi.
data.desc_de: Sogar Greise können sich nicht mehr richtig daran erinnern, wann ihr wunderschönes Land Kartucia von zwei Feuerzauberern mittels schwarzer Magie erobert wurde. Es ist wirklich lange her, als Kartucia in Dunkelheit und alltägliches Leiden gestürzt wurde, das ihm von Dienern der Feuerzauberer gebracht wird. Laut Legende kommt aber ein Held, der wieder Ruhe für das Land bringt. Die Zeit wird jedoch knapp! Die Feuerzauberer haben vor, die Schlucht des Schreckens zu öffnen, um Tausende von Dämonen zu holen. Dann wäre alles wirklich verloren. Alle glauben, dass gerade du der Held bist. Enttäusche sie nicht!
data.desc_es: Ni siquiera los más viejos recuerdan cuando su hermoso país, Kartucia, fue tomada por dos brujos del fuego a través de la magia negra. Kartucia ha sido sumergida en la oscuridad por un largo tiempo y cada día se padecía el sufrimiento - infligido por los sirvientes de los brujos de fuego. La leyenda dice que un héroe vendrá a restaurar la paz en el país. Sin embargo, el tiempo apremia! Los brujos del fuego están a punto de abrir el abismo del horror que traerá miles de demonios. Todo estaría realmente perdido entonces. Todo el mundo cree que tú eres el héroe. No los decepciones!

data.title: Jewel Explode
data.description: The classic match 3 game with a fun new twist. Test your tactical skills in turn based mode with many funny variations. Challenge yourself to complete all the levels and get the highest score!!
data.desc_en: The classic match 3 game with a fun new twist. Test your tactical skills in turn based mode with many funny variations. Challenge yourself to complete all the levels and get the highest score!!

data.title: Jewel Legend
data.description: Let the great Jewel Legend begin! The travelers from all around the world have come to the mines to dig those diamonds out. Join them in the effort to find as much diamonds as possible while engaging in various challenges that will keep you entertained for long stretches of time! So, what are you waiting for?
data.desc_it: Che la grande Jewel Legend abbia inizio! I viaggiatori di tutto il mondo sono venuti nelle miniere per estrarre i diamanti. Unisciti a loro per trovare il maggior numero di diamanti possibile mentre affronti varie sfide che ti intratterranno per tanto tempo! Allora, cosa aspetti? È ora di Jewel Legend!
data.desc_en: Let the great Jewel Legend begin! The travelers from all around the world have come to the mines to dig those diamonds out. Join them in the effort to find as much diamonds as possible while engaging in various challenges that will keep you entertained for long stretches of time! So, what are you waiting for?
data.desc_fr: C'est la ruée aux joyaux dans Jewel Legend ! Des voyageurs du monde entier ont pénétré dans les mines pour extraire ces diamants. Joignez-vous à eux pour trouver le plus de diamants possible tout en relevant divers défis qui vous divertiront pendant de longs moments ! Alors, qu'attendez-vous ? C'est l'heure de Jewel Legend !
data.desc_de: Möge das große Edelsteinfieber beginnen! Reisende aus der ganzen Welt besuchen die Minen, um Diamanten auszugraben. Schließ dich ihnen an und finde möglichst viele Diamanten, während du dich verschiedenen Herausforderungen stellst, die dich für lange Zeit unterhalten werden! Also worauf wartest du noch?
data.desc_es: ¡Que comience la fiebre de los diamantes en Jewel Legend! Viajeros de todo el mundo han venido a las minas para extraer esos preciados diamantes. Únete a ellos y consigue la mayor cantidad posible de diamantes mientras te enfrentas a desafíos que te mantendrán entretenido durante horas. ¿A qué esperas?

data.title: Journey Fox
data.description: Help little fox to run through all challenging puzzle levels. Drag objects on the field to create a path and reach all gems of this funny adventure!
data.desc_en: Help little fox to run through all challenging puzzle levels. Drag objects on the field to create a path and reach all gems of this funny adventure!

data.title: Jump with Justin
data.description: This is a jumping game of gigantic proportions! Fire the mad inventor, Justin the beaver, off on a crazy jumping journey. Along the way grab coins and collect his wacky inventions, such as magentism, rockets and helium to make him jump even higher but watch out for obstacles and Justin's evil inventions, as they will crash him back down to the ground with a bump!
data.desc_it: Justin non è un castoro ordinario. è un inventore che desidera guardare il mondo all'estrema altezza. Devi aiutarlo a balzare più alto possibile servandoti dei pezzi e delle invenzioni diverse affinché diventi una superstar di castori. Avrai bisogno del senso d´osservazione, delle dita agili e delle invenzioni come ad esempio il rotore, il magnete o l´energiser. Ne sei capace?!
data.desc_en: This is a jumping game of gigantic proportions! Fire the mad inventor, Justin the beaver, off on a crazy jumping journey. Along the way grab coins and collect his wacky inventions, such as magentism, rockets and helium to make him jump even higher but watch out for obstacles and Justin's evil inventions, as they will crash him back down to the ground with a bump!
data.desc_fr: Attrapez un maximum de pièces de monnaie afin de propulser le castor le plus haut possible et atteindre les sommets de la galaxie! Collectez les bonus délirants tels que le magnétiseur de pièces, la fusée ou le ballon d'hélium afin de faciliter votre ascension. Soyez vigilant et rapide afin d'éviter les obstacles qui précipiteront le pauvre castor dans sa chute. Pourrez-vous atteindre les limites de l'espace et aller encore plus loin?
data.desc_de: Justin ist kein gewöhnlicher Biber. Er ist Erfinder, dessen Sehnsucht ist es, sich die Welt von der größtmöglichen Höhe anzusehen. Deine Aufgabe ist es, ihm mittels Münzen und verschiedener Erfindungen zu helfen, so hoch wie möglich zu springen, und ihm somit dabei behilflich zu sein, Biber-Superstar zu werden. Du wirst gute Wahrnehmung, geschickte Finger und Erfindungen wie Rotor, Magnet oder Energieerzeuger benötigen. Schaffst du das?!
data.desc_es: Justin no es castor cualquiera. Es un inventor que desea ver el mundo desde lo más alto posible. Tu tarea es ayudarle a saltar por medio de monedas y otros inventos lo más alto posible y ayudarle llegar a ser el castor superstar. Vas a necesitar buena captación, dedos mañosos e inventos como por ejemplo rotor, imán o energizer. ¿¡Lo consigues?!

data.title: Jumpy Ape Joe
data.description: Help jumpy ape Joe collect all the bananas and go to the exit in this cute platform game. Be as fast as possible to get as much as three stars per level.
data.desc_en: Help jumpy ape Joe collect all the bananas and go to the exit in this cute platform game. Be as fast as possible to get as much as three stars per level.

data.title: Jungle Runner
data.description: Use your mouse to jump and slide through the jungle. Click to jump, swipe right to slide, and swipe down to drop. You can roll past enemies, or jump on top of them. Spend your gems in between rounds to buy powerful upgrades
data.desc_en: Use your mouse to jump and slide through the jungle. Click to jump, swipe right to slide, and swipe down to drop. You can roll past enemies, or jump on top of them. Spend your gems in between rounds to buy powerful upgrades

data.title: Jurassic Run
data.description: Adventure trip has gone bad! There is a bloodthirsty dinosaur behind your back! Use the stick to cross to the other side! Make sure the stick length is accurate, otherwise you will fall or get eaten - and don't forget to collect the dinosaur's eggs!
data.desc_it: Il viaggio d'avventura è andato male! C'è un dinosauro assetato di sangue alle tue calcagna! Non puoi perdere tempo a scendere da una roccia e a salirne un'altra. Devi usare il bastone per raggiungere l'altro lato. Assicurati che la lunghezza del bastone sia precisa, altrimenti cadrai o verrai mangiato! E non dimenticare di raccogliere le uova del dinosauro per ottenere una seconda possibilità.
data.desc_en: Adventure trip has gone bad! There is a bloodthirsty dinosaur behind your back! Use the stick to cross to the other side! Make sure the stick length is accurate, otherwise you will fall or get eaten - and don't forget to collect the dinosaur's eggs!
data.desc_fr: Un voyage d'aventures qui a mal tourné ! Un dinosaure sanguinaire est à vos trousses ! Pas le temps de descendre un rocher et escalader l'autre. Vous devez utiliser le bâton pour passer de l'autre côté. Veillez à ce que le bâton soit de la bonne longueur, sinon vous tomberez ou vous serez mangé ! Et n'oubliez pas de ramasser les œufs de dinosaure pour avoir une deuxième chance.
data.desc_de: Dicke Luft beim Abenteuertrip: Du wirst von einem blutrünstigen Dinosaurier verfolgt! Du hast keine Zeit, um den einen Felsen hinunter- und den anderen Felsen hinaufzuklettern. Du musst mit dem Stock auf die andere Seite gelangen. Achte darauf, dass er genau passt, sonst stürzt du ab oder wirst gefressen! Vergiss nicht, die Dinosaurier-Eier einzusammeln, um eine zweite Chance zu erhalten.
data.desc_es: ¡El viaje de aventuras que has emprendido se ha torcido! ¡Tienes un dinosaurio sanguinario pisándote los talones! No te va a dar tiempo a descender por las rocas y volver a subir, así que vas a tener que utilizar la vara para pasar al otro lado. ¡Pero asegúrate de colocarla con la longitud adecuada, o podrías caerte o acabar en el estómago del dinosaurio! Y no te olvides de recoger los huevos de dinosaurio para obtener una segunda oportunidad.

data.title: King Rugni Tower Defense
data.description: A classic Tower Defense game with lots of enemies and territories to conquer. Join King Rügni on his epic adventure against hordes of elementals.
data.desc_en: A classic Tower Defense game with lots of enemies and territories to conquer. Join King Rügni on his epic adventure against hordes of elementals.

data.title: Knife Hit
data.description: Throw the knives into the logs to break them. Slash the apples and unlock new knives. How far can you go?
data.desc_en: Throw the knives into the logs to break them. Slash the apples and unlock new knives. How far can you go?

data.title: Knife io
data.description: Knife.io is a multiplayer game. In the game, you can win by killing everyone. In the game, find a way to avoid the enemy’s attack. While killing the enemy, you will get different random skills to strengthen your attack power. Note that the game map will shrink automatically over time, hurry up and enter the experience, I wish you a happy game!
data.desc_en: Knife.io is a multiplayer game. In the game, you can win by killing everyone. In the game, find a way to avoid the enemy’s attack. While killing the enemy, you will get different random skills to strengthen your attack power. Note that the game map will shrink automatically over time, hurry up and enter the experience, I wish you a happy game!

data.title: Let me in
data.description: It’s time to test your real skills. A puzzle game. At a bus stop in a bustling big city, as an assistant policeman, you have to get everyone on board safely, and you can’t be overstaffed, and overstaffed cars will be crowded Explosion, so you have to direct the platform personnel to get on and off the bus in an orderly way. Be careful not to hit the passengers on the opposite car, otherwise you will lose, come on.
data.desc_en: It’s time to test your real skills. A puzzle game. At a bus stop in a bustling big city, as an assistant policeman, you have to get everyone on board safely, and you can’t be overstaffed, and overstaffed cars will be crowded Explosion, so you have to direct the platform personnel to get on and off the bus in an orderly way. Be careful not to hit the passengers on the opposite car, otherwise you will lose, come on.

data.title: Line of Defense
data.description: Line of Defense is a fun battle of defense against attacking enemy tanks. Using you defensive rockets painted with colors, match it with the color of attacking tanks and shoot in order to destroy it. If the color mismatches, you will lose. If tanks reaches the front line you will lose. Use your defense rockets effectively and watch out for enemy tanks coming from different sides.
data.desc_en: Line of Defense is a fun battle of defense against attacking enemy tanks. Using you defensive rockets painted with colors, match it with the color of attacking tanks and shoot in order to destroy it. If the color mismatches, you will lose. If tanks reaches the front line you will lose. Use your defense rockets effectively and watch out for enemy tanks coming from different sides.

data.title: Line of Defense 2
data.description: The best digital battle: shoot approaching enemies tanks and destroy them all! Do not let the enemies cross the red border line!
data.desc_en: The best digital battle: shoot approaching enemies tanks and destroy them all! Do not let the enemies cross the red border line!

data.title: Ludo Legend
data.description: Play a game of Ludo! Everyones favourite board game! Play alone or with your friends on one device! Just pass it on! Colorful design and easy mechanics will keep you playing for hours!
data.desc_it: Gioca una partita a Ludo! Il gioco da tavolo preferito di tutti! Gioca da solo o con i tuoi amici su un solo dispositivo! Design colorato e meccaniche di gioco semplici ti terranno incollato allo schermo per ore e ore!
data.desc_en: Play a game of Ludo! Everyones favourite board game! Play alone or with your friends on one device! Just pass it on! Colorful design and easy mechanics will keep you playing for hours!
data.desc_fr: Faites une petite partie de Ludo ! Le jeu de plateau préféré de tous ! Jouez seul ou avec vos amis sur un seul appareil ! Il suffit de se le faire passer ! Le design coloré et la mécanique de jeu simple vous divertiront pendant des heures !
data.desc_de: Spiele eine Partie Ludo. Du kannst das beliebte Brettspiel alleine oder mit Freunden auf einem Gerät spielen. Reiche das Gerät einfach weiter. Das bunte Design und die einfache Steuerung bietet Spielspaß für Stunden!
data.desc_es: ¡Disfruta de una partida de ludo, el juego de mesa favorito de todo el mundo! Juega en solitario o con tus amigos con un solo dispositivo. ¡Basta con pasarlo de mano en mano! El colorido diseño y la sencilla mecánica harán que te diviertas durante horas.

data.title: Magikmon
data.description: Magikmon is an awesome RPG game in which you must capture different types of monsters. The magical world you live in is packed full with weird and wonderful monsters. You can use them to battle! Enjoy it!
data.desc_en: Magikmon is an awesome RPG game in which you must capture different types of monsters. The magical world you live in is packed full with weird and wonderful monsters. You can use them to battle! Enjoy it!

data.title: Mahjong Flowers
data.description: Relax and improve your memory and ability at the same time with the worldwide favourite adaptation of the traditional chinese game Mahjong. Match the correct tiles until you clean the whole game field of the very last tile. Try it as fast as possible to gain a golden star that reflects your perception and skill.
data.desc_it: Rilassati e migliora contemporaneamente la tua memoria e la tua abilità con il miglior adattamento del mondo del tradizionale gioco cinese Mahjong. Abbina le tessere corrette finché non avrai svuotato tutto il campo di gioco. Cerca di essere più veloce possibile per ottenere una stella d'oro che riflette il tuo intuito e le tue capacità.
data.desc_en: Relax and improve your memory and ability at the same time with the worldwide favourite adaptation of the traditional chinese game Mahjong. Match the correct tiles until you clean the whole game field of the very last tile. Try it as fast as possible to gain a golden star that reflects your perception and skill.
data.desc_fr: Détendez-vous tout en améliorant votre mémoire et vos aptitudes avec l'adaptation la plus populaire au monde du jeu de mahjong chinois traditionnel. Combinez les bonnes tuiles jusqu'à ce qu'il n'y ait plus une tuile sur le plateau de jeu. Essayez de terminer le plus vite possible pour gagner une étoile dorée qui reflète votre perception et votre habileté.
data.desc_de: Trainiere dein Geschick und dein Gedächtnis mit dieser beliebten Version des chinesischen Spieleklassikers Mahjong. Führe die richtigen Kacheln zusammen und räume so das Feld vollständig leer. Spiele so schnell wie möglich und erhalte einen goldenen Stern für deine Auffassungsgabe und deine Fertigkeit.
data.desc_es: Relájate y mejora tus habilidades y memoria al mismo tiempo con esta adaptación del tradicional juego chino Mahjong, el juego favorito de todo el mundo. Empareja las fichas con el mismo símbolo y despeja todo el tablero. Intenta hacerlo lo más rápido posible para conseguir una estrella dorada, con la que presumir de tus habilidades y percepción.

data.title: Mahjong Master 2
data.description: The classic solitaire game of matching Chinese tiles in your pocket. Clear the fields full of tiles piled in thoughtful pyramids. Match pairs quickly to earn bonus points. Can you earn all the golden stars?
data.desc_it: Il classico gioco solitario di abbinamento delle tessere cinesi sempre in tasca. Considera attentamente ogni mossa e libera il tavolo pieno di tessere impilate in piramidi. Cerca le tessere uguali libere da abbonare per rimuoverle. È possibile abbinare solo le tessere che sono libere almeno da un lato. Se giochi velocemente guadagni punti bonus. Riesci a ottenere tutte le stelle d'oro in tutte le modalità di gioco?
data.desc_en: The classic solitaire game of matching Chinese tiles in your pocket. Clear the fields full of tiles piled in thoughtful pyramids. Match pairs quickly to earn bonus points. Can you earn all the golden stars?
data.desc_fr: Le solitaire classique qui consiste à connecter des tuiles chinoises est à portée de main. Pensez bien chacun de vos coups et videz le plateau de ses tuiles empilées en pyramides complexes. Cherchez des tuiles libres similaires pour les connecter et les enlever. Il n'est possible de connecter que les tuiles qui ont au moins un côté libre. Jouez rapidement et marquez des points bonus. Gagnerez-vous toutes les étoiles dorées de tous les modes de jeu ?
data.desc_de: Dank Inlogic hast du den Solitär-Klassiker jetzt immer in der Hosentasche. Lasse die zu Pyramiden aufgebauten chinesischen Kacheln auf dem Spielbrett verschwinden. Verbinde gleiche Kacheln und sammle Bonus-Punkte. Kannst du alle Goldsterne holen?
data.desc_es: Inlogic te trae el clásico juego de solitarios de emparejar fichas chinas en versión de bolsillo. Piensa detenidamente cada movimiento y despeja los tableros llenos de fichas apiladas en forma piramidal. Busca las fichas libres que sean iguales y emparéjalas para eliminarlas. Solo se pueden emparejar las fichas que tengan al menos un lado libre. Juega deprisa para ganar puntos adicionales. ¿Conseguirás todas las estrellas doradas en todos los modos de juego?

data.title: Mango Mania
data.description: Far away in the jungle, there was a small creature, that can not live without the mango! Help him to collect all the fruits!
data.desc_en: Far away in the jungle, there was a small creature, that can not live without the mango! Help him to collect all the fruits!

data.title: Master Checkers
data.description:
Master Checkers is the best Board Game. Play this stylish version ot the classic board game Checkers.
The game is based on the Italian Checkers gameplay!
data.desc_en:
Master Checkers is the best Board Game. Play this stylish version ot the classic board game Checkers.
The game is based on the Italian Checkers gameplay!

data.title: Merge Fish
data.description:
Merge Fish an addictive HTML5 endless game.You have to merge fishes to get more points.

When you reach to 7th level fish it explodes! and clear the pool so you can play more…
data.desc_en:
Merge Fish an addictive HTML5 endless game.You have to merge fishes to get more points.

When you reach to 7th level fish it explodes! and clear the pool so you can play more…

data.title: Merge Kill
data.description: A multiplayer game against PK. In the game, eating gold coins can grow up, killing everyone with a knife can pass the level.
data.desc_en: A multiplayer game against PK. In the game, eating gold coins can grow up, killing everyone with a knife can pass the level.

data.title: Micro Tank Battle
data.description: Control your tank and kill enemy tanks to get to the next level! How far can you get?
data.desc_en: Control your tank and kill enemy tanks to get to the next level! How far can you get?

data.title: Minesweeper Mania
data.description: Use strategy and smart thinking to reveal all the mines as fast as possible! This classic puzzle game with thrilling gameplay can improve your logical thinking ability and reaction speed. Give yourself a challenge by trying higher difficulty levels! In this version of  the game you can  also customize levels, change themes or even use hints.
data.desc_it: Usa la strategia e fai mosse intelligenti per svelare tutte le mine il più velocemente possibile! Questo classico rompicapo può migliorare la tua capacità di ragionamento logico e la tua velocità di reazione. Sfida livelli di difficoltà più elevati! In questa versione puoi anche personalizzare i livelli, cambiare temi o persino usare suggerimenti.
data.desc_en: Use strategy and smart thinking to reveal all the mines as fast as possible! This classic puzzle game with thrilling gameplay can improve your logical thinking ability and reaction speed. Give yourself a challenge by trying higher difficulty levels! In this version of  the game you can  also customize levels, change themes or even use hints.
data.desc_fr: Révélez toutes les mines le plus rapidement possible ! Ce jeu de puzzle classique au gameplay passionnant peut améliorer votre logique et votre vitesse de réaction. Relevez le défi en essayant des niveaux encore plus difficiles ! Vous pouvez également personnaliser les niveaux, changer de thème ou même avoir recours à des indices.
data.desc_de: Verwende Strategie und Köpfchen, um möglichst schnell alle Minen aufzudecken! Dieses klassische Knobelspiel mit packendem Spielprinzip kann dein logisches Denkvermögen und deine Reaktionsgeschwindigkeit verbessern. Probiere schwerere Level! In dieser Version des Spiels kannst du die Level so anpassen, ihr Design ändern und sogar Tipps verwenden.
data.desc_es: Usa la estrategia y la astucia para encontrar todas las minas lo antes posible. Disfruta de un juego clásico de puzles emocionantes con los que mejorará tu pensamiento lógico y velocidad de reacción. Prueba con los niveles más difíciles si te apetece un desafío. En este juego, puedes personalizar los niveles, cambiar de tema y usar las pistas.

data.title: Mixed World Weekend
data.description: Welcome to Mixed World, the cheerful platform puzzle game! Use your funny friends’ special skills to nudge all monsters off the platforms!
data.desc_en: Welcome to Mixed World, the cheerful platform puzzle game! Use your funny friends’ special skills to nudge all monsters off the platforms!

data.title: Monster Blocks
data.description: Monster Blocks is a mix between all these puzzle games. You control falling blocks almost in the same way as in Tetris, but your task is not to fill rows. Instead you have to connect 3 or more blocks of the same color to complete a match.
data.desc_it: Un mix tra tutti i giochi rompicapo a cui abbiate mai giocato. Avete il controllo di alcuni blocchi colorati che cadono dall'alto, proprio come in Tetris, ma il vostro compito non sarà quello di riempire le righe. Dovrete invece connettere 3 o più blocchi dello stesso colore per completare la partita.
data.desc_en: Monster Blocks is a mix between all these puzzle games. You control falling blocks almost in the same way as in Tetris, but your task is not to fill rows. Instead you have to connect 3 or more blocks of the same color to complete a match.

data.title: Monster Go
data.description: Poke monsters are happy only in pairs! Connect them with a flow of energy to activate them. Enjoy this simple, yet addictive puzzle game. Don't forget to fill the whole field with energy lines to make Poke monsters happy and give you 3 stars. Energy streams can't cross or overlap each other.
data.desc_it: I mostri Poke sono felici solo in coppia! Uniscili con un flusso di energia per attivarli. Divertiti con questo puzzle game semplice ma avvincente. Non dimenticarti di riempire tutto il campo con linee di energia per rendere felici i mostri Poke e per farti dare 3 stelle. I flussi di energia non possono incrociarsi o sovrapporsi tra loro.
data.desc_en: Poke monsters are happy only in pairs! Connect them with a flow of energy to activate them. Enjoy this simple, yet addictive puzzle game. Don't forget to fill the whole field with energy lines to make Poke monsters happy and give you 3 stars. Energy streams can't cross or overlap each other.
data.desc_fr: Les Pokémonstres ne sont heureux qu'à deux ! Reliez-les à de l'énergie pour les activer. Amusez-vous avec ce jeu de casse-têtes simple mais addictif. N'oubliez pas de remplir le plateau de jeu de courant pour rendre les Pokémonstres heureux et gagner 3 étoiles. Les flux d'énergie ne peuvent ni se croiser ni se chevaucher.
data.desc_de: Poke-Monster sind nur zu zweit glücklich! Verbinde sie durch einen Energiestrahl, um sie zu aktivieren. Viel Spaß mit diesem einfachen Rätselspiel mit Suchtfaktor! Denk daran, dass du das ganze Feld mit Energie-Linien füllen musst, um die Poke-Monster glücklich zu machen. Dann erhältst du 3 Sterne. Die Energiestrahlen dürfen sich nicht kreuzen oder überlagern.
data.desc_es: ¡Los monstruos Poke solo están contentos si están en parejas! Conéctalos con un flujo de energía para activarlos. Disfruta de un juego de puzles sencillo pero adictivo. Asegúrate de llenar todo el campo con flujos de energía para que los monstruos Poke se pongan contentos y te entreguen 3 estrellas. Los flujos de energía no pueden cruzarse ni sobreponerse.

data.title: Moto Fury
data.description: Thrilling racing game. Enjoy driving a motorcycle on an endless highway in traffic. The more dangerously you drive, the more cash and points you earn. With cash you can buy better and faster machines.  Become a rebel and cause havoc on the road! Just try not to crash when you're driving at insane speeds.
data.desc_it: Un'emozionante gioco di corse. Divertiti a guidare una motocicletta nel traffico su un'autostrada infinita.  Più spericolata è la tua guida, più guadagni soldi e punti. Con i soldi puoi comprare macchine migliori e più veloci. Diventa un ribelle e scatena il caos sulla strada! Cerca solo di non schiantarti quando guidi a velocità folli.
data.desc_en: Thrilling racing game. Enjoy driving a motorcycle on an endless highway in traffic. The more dangerously you drive, the more cash and points you earn. With cash you can buy better and faster machines.  Become a rebel and cause havoc on the road! Just try not to crash when you're driving at insane speeds.
data.desc_fr: Un jeu de course palpitant. Découvrez le plaisir des virées en moto sur une autoroute infinie et très empruntée. Plus vous roulez dangereusement, plus vous accumulez d'argent et de points. Avec votre argent, vous pouvez acheter de meilleures motos plus puissantes. Devenez un rebelle et semez la pagaille sur la route ! Essayez juste de ne pas vous écraser en roulant à une vitesse folle.
data.desc_de: Spannendes Rennspiel. Fahre mit deinem Motorrad über endlose Highways. Je waghalsiger du fährst, umso mehr Geld und Punkte kannst du dir verdienen. Mit Geld kannst du bessere und schnellere Maschinen kaufen. Werde zum Rebellen und sorge auf der Straße für Chaos! Achte darauf, bei deiner rasanten Fahrt keinen Unfall zu bauen.
data.desc_es: Disfruta pilotando una moto en una autopista infinita llena de coches. Ábrete camino entre el tráfico. Cuanto más peligrosa sea tu conducción, más dinero y puntos conseguirás. Consigue dinero para comprar motos mejores y más rápidas. ¡Sé un rebelde y siembra el caos en la carretera! Eso sí, intenta no chocarte cuando conduzcas a velocidades vertiginosas.

data.title: Moto X3M: Spooky Land
data.description: Drive your motorbike through Halloween-themed tracks filled with obstacles and stunt opportunities. Get your bike through the trials quickly to earn more points!
data.desc_en: Drive your motorbike through Halloween-themed tracks filled with obstacles and stunt opportunities. Get your bike through the trials quickly to earn more points!

data.title: Mr Flap
data.description: Say hello to Mr Flap, the little square bird that'll make your head spin! How far can you get?
data.desc_it: Diciamo Ciao a Mr Flap, il piccolo uccellino fatto di pixel che ti farà girare la testa! Quanto lontano riesci ad arrivare?
data.desc_en: Say hello to Mr Flap, the little square bird that'll make your head spin! How far can you get?
data.desc_fr: Découvrez Mr Flap, le petit oiseau carré qui va vous faire tourner la tête! Combien de tours serez-vous capable de faire ?
data.desc_de: Begrüße Mr Flap, einen kleinen, quadratischen Vogel, der dir den Kopf verdrehen wird! Wie weit schaffst du es?
data.desc_es: ¡Descubre Mr Flap, el pequeño pájaro azul que te va a volver loco! ¿Cuántas vueltas eres capaz de dar?

data.title: Neon Blitz
data.description: Touch the screen or use the mouse to jump. Avoid all enemies and get the highest score. How many jumps can you get?
data.desc_en: Touch the screen or use the mouse to jump. Avoid all enemies and get the highest score. How many jumps can you get?

data.title: Ocean Crash
data.description: The goal of the game is to prevent the filling of the grid as long as possible. The user must direct some three-piece blocks in the grid in order to match 3 or more animals of the same type. The game ends when blocks fill completely all grid rows.
data.desc_it: Lo scopo del gioco è evitare che il quadro si riempia, per più tempo possibile. Dirigete i blocchi di 3 pezzi nella griglia in modo che 3 animaletti dello stesso tipo si accoppino. Il gioco finisce quando i blocchi riempiono completamente tutte le righe.
data.desc_en: The goal of the game is to prevent the filling of the grid as long as possible. The user must direct some three-piece blocks in the grid in order to match 3 or more animals of the same type. The game ends when blocks fill completely all grid rows.
data.desc_fr: Votre but est d'empêcher que la grille se remplisse. Utilisez les blocs de façon à obtenir au moins 3 animaux du même type. La partie est gagnée quand les blocs remplissent intégralement les rangées de grilles!
data.desc_de: Das Ziel des Spiels ist es, so lange wie möglich zu verhindern, dass sich das Raster füllt. Der Benutzer muss dreiteilige Blöcke in das Raster lenken, um 3 oder mehr Tiere der gleichen Art zusammenzufügen. Das Spiel ist vorbei, wenn die Blöcke alle Reihen des Rasters füllen.
data.desc_es: El objetivo del juego es prevenir el relleno de la cuadrícula el máximo de tiempo posible. El usuario deberá dirigir algunos bloques de 3 piezas en la cuadrícula para hacer que coincidad 3 o más animales del mismo tipo. El juego acabará cuando los bloques rellenen completamente cualquiera de las filas.

data.title: Orange Ranch
data.description: Pick oranges and build up your own orange ranch in this bubble shooter. Sell your produce and upgrade your ranch with new trees, machines and better sales equipment to get your business going!
data.desc_en: Pick oranges and build up your own orange ranch in this bubble shooter. Sell your produce and upgrade your ranch with new trees, machines and better sales equipment to get your business going!

data.title: Penalty Superstar
data.description: You are the goalkeeper starting his career from scratch: use power-ups to get better and try to catch the ball. Win all cups and become the champion of all leagues!
data.desc_en: You are the goalkeeper starting his career from scratch: use power-ups to get better and try to catch the ball. Win all cups and become the champion of all leagues!

data.title: Pick a Lock
data.description: Challenge your reflexes and concentration in this exciting lock-popping game! Pop all the locks and be the best!
data.desc_en: Challenge your reflexes and concentration in this exciting lock-popping game! Pop all the locks and be the best!

data.title: Piggy In The Puddle 3
data.description: This piggy loves to take a mud bath in a cool smelly puddle just like we love a fragrant relaxing bath, if you already had one today do not pass by and make this piggy happy too.
data.desc_en: This piggy loves to take a mud bath in a cool smelly puddle just like we love a fragrant relaxing bath, if you already had one today do not pass by and make this piggy happy too.

data.title: Pizza Ninja 3
data.description: Chopping frenzy in Maro's pizzeria again! Orders are still whizzing in and ingredients need chopping! The kitchen needs a ninja hero! Collect bonuses and test your skills with different  game modes!
data.desc_en: Chopping frenzy in Maro's pizzeria again! Orders are still whizzing in and ingredients need chopping! The kitchen needs a ninja hero! Collect bonuses and test your skills with different  game modes!

data.title: Pomme Pomme
data.description: Bounce the fruit on the trampoline and get them safely to the juicer. To boost your score, build up crazy multipliers, evade bombs and discover new juicy vistas!
data.desc_en: Bounce the fruit on the trampoline and get them safely to the juicer. To boost your score, build up crazy multipliers, evade bombs and discover new juicy vistas!

data.title: Pop-Pop Kitties
data.description: Play a cute puzzle as you pop-pop all the kitties using strategy and reflexes! With 100+ challenging puzzles and adorable kitties this kawaii Match-3 Puzzle Shooter game will charm players for hours. Can you collect all the stars?
data.desc_en: Play a cute puzzle as you pop-pop all the kitties using strategy and reflexes! With 100+ challenging puzzles and adorable kitties this kawaii Match-3 Puzzle Shooter game will charm players for hours. Can you collect all the stars?

data.title: Princess Hair Spa Salon
data.description: Princess Hair Salon, Makeovers & Hair Spa Salon for brides, teenage girls, stars and celebrities. Hundreds of hair style, makeup, clothes, and accessories to choose from! Let's play the Hair Salon . To be a barber and design various hairstyles for your customer. Share your Princess with friends and family! Unlock more ways to dress up your Prom Princess, there’s no limit!
data.desc_en: Princess Hair Salon, Makeovers & Hair Spa Salon for brides, teenage girls, stars and celebrities. Hundreds of hair style, makeup, clothes, and accessories to choose from! Let's play the Hair Salon . To be a barber and design various hairstyles for your customer. Share your Princess with friends and family! Unlock more ways to dress up your Prom Princess, there’s no limit!

data.title: Princess Nail Art
data.description: Princess Nail Art is more-games-in-one of manicure and pedicure, just for girls! It's full of tips for all girls and there are lots of colors to paint nails and have fun!
data.desc_en: Princess Nail Art is more-games-in-one of manicure and pedicure, just for girls! It's full of tips for all girls and there are lots of colors to paint nails and have fun!

data.title: Rabbit Samurai 2
data.description: Throw the rope and swing around to find all little bees and bring them back home.
data.desc_en: Throw the rope and swing around to find all little bees and bring them back home.

data.title: Road Fury
data.description: Unleash your fury on the highway a shoot down everything that moves! Tip: if you can't shoot it, take it... those are power-ups! Upgrade your car to withstand a longer ride, beat bosses and get as far as you can so you can compare your highscores with others! Become the furious king of the road!
data.desc_it: Scatena la tua furia in autostrada e abbatti tutto ciò che si muove! Consiglio: se non puoi abbattere una cosa, prendila... sono i potenziamenti! Migliora la tua auto per resistere a un giro più lungo, sconfiggi i boss e arriva il più lontano possibile per poter confrontare i tuoi punteggi più alti con gli altri! Diventa il re furioso della strada!
data.desc_en: Unleash your fury on the highway a shoot down everything that moves! Tip: if you can't shoot it, take it... those are power-ups! Upgrade your car to withstand a longer ride, beat bosses and get as far as you can so you can compare your highscores with others! Become the furious king of the road!
data.desc_fr: Libérez votre fureur sur l'autoroute et abattez tout ce qui bouge ! Si vous ne pouvez pas tirer sur quelque chose, prenez-le... ce sont des bonus ! Améliorez votre voiture pour réaliser un trajet plus long, abattez les boss et allez aussi loin que vous pouvez pour pouvoir comparer vos meilleurs scores avec les autres ! Devenez le roi de la route !
data.desc_de: Lass deine Wut auf der Autobahn raus und schieße alles ab, was sich bewegt! Tipp: Wenn es sich nicht abschießen lässt, sammle es auf ... das sind Power-ups! Verbessere dein Auto, sodass es längere Fahrten übersteht, besiege Bosse und fahre möglichst weit, damit du deinen Highscore mit anderen vergleichen kannst! Werde zum zornigen König der Straße!
data.desc_es: Desata tu furia en la autopista y dispara a todo lo que se mueve. Y, si no puedes disparar a algo… ¡llévatelo, ya que será un potenciador! Mejora tu vehículo para que sea capaz de aguantar más, vence a los jefes y llega todo lo lejos que puedas. ¡Supera las puntuaciones de los demás y conviértete en el furioso rey de la carretera!

data.title: Roar of City
data.description: Roar of City is a 2D isometric Beat 'em up game with high quality graphic and suitable gameplay for mobile and desktop. Fight with criminals gang and arrest their commander to rescue the city. But now the city is angry and the horrible roar of the city can be heard.
data.desc_en: Roar of City is a 2D isometric Beat 'em up game with high quality graphic and suitable gameplay for mobile and desktop. Fight with criminals gang and arrest their commander to rescue the city. But now the city is angry and the horrible roar of the city can be heard.

data.title: Run Canyon
data.description: Drive the quad through the fantastic grand canyon. Play the 30 levels, survive and unlock new vehicles.
data.desc_en: Drive the quad through the fantastic grand canyon. Play the 30 levels, survive and unlock new vehicles.

data.title: Runaway Toad
data.description:
It ain’t easy bein’ green! Tap, hold, and swipe to help Toad hop to safety in this gorgeous new action game.
Once upon a time there was a princess, in a tall castle, who kissed as many toads she could in order to find her Prince Charming. But Toad just wants to be a toad, not live in a castle (regardless of how tall it is). So Toad did the only thing that could be done: ESCAPE!

Rain or shine, day or night, this toad is ON THE RUN. Watch out for blimps, owls, and other hazards while you eat bugs, get new powers, explore the swamp, and search for secrets!


- Procedurally generated swamps full of hand crafted elements
- Elegant single finger controls
- Earn powers from eating bugs
- Dynamic pacing from relaxed swamp hopping to thrilling blimp chases
- 100+ missions to test your skills and earn new toads
- Hidden secrets to discover
- Lavishly illustrated visuals with time of day and weather effects
- Atmospheric audio sets a soothing swamp mood
data.desc_en:
It ain’t easy bein’ green! Tap, hold, and swipe to help Toad hop to safety in this gorgeous new action game.
Once upon a time there was a princess, in a tall castle, who kissed as many toads she could in order to find her Prince Charming. But Toad just wants to be a toad, not live in a castle (regardless of how tall it is). So Toad did the only thing that could be done: ESCAPE!

Rain or shine, day or night, this toad is ON THE RUN. Watch out for blimps, owls, and other hazards while you eat bugs, get new powers, explore the swamp, and search for secrets!


- Procedurally generated swamps full of hand crafted elements
- Elegant single finger controls
- Earn powers from eating bugs
- Dynamic pacing from relaxed swamp hopping to thrilling blimp chases
- 100+ missions to test your skills and earn new toads
- Hidden secrets to discover
- Lavishly illustrated visuals with time of day and weather effects
- Atmospheric audio sets a soothing swamp mood
data.desc_fr:
Un conte superbement illustré sur une princesse dérangée et un crapaud en fuite

L'histoire

Il était une fois une princesse qui vivait dans un grand château. Elle avait embrassé plein de crapauds pour trouver son prince charmant. Mais le crapaud n'aspire qu'à être un crapaud, pas à vivre dans un château (aussi grand soit-il). Alors, le crapaud fit la seule chose qu'il pouvait faire : s'échapper ! Qu'il pleuve ou qu'il fasse beau, de jour comme de nuit, le crapaud ne cesse de s'enfuir. Fais attention aux dirigeables, aux hiboux et autres dangers et mange des insectes, gagne de nouveaux pouvoirs, explore les marais et trouve les secrets !

Fonctionnalités

Marais à génération procédurale avec plein d'éléments faits-main
Contrôle élégant à un doigt
Gagne des pouvoirs en mangeant des insectes
Rythme dynamique avec sauts tranquilles dans les marais et poursuites captivantes avec les dirigeables
+ de 100 missions pour mettre tes talents à l'épreuve et gagner de nouveaux crapauds
Secrets cachés à découvrir
Illustrations et visuels somptueux avec heure du jour et effets météo
Ambiance audio fidèle au calme typique des marais
data.desc_de:
Ein lustiges Fantasiespiel samt verrückter Prinzessin und fliehender Kröte

Story

Es war einmal eine Prinzessin, die in einem großen Schloss lebte und so viele Kröten wie nur möglich küsste, um ihren Traumprinzen zu finden. Aber Kröte will Kröte bleiben und nicht in einem Schloss wohnen (egal, wie groß es ist). Kröte tat also das Einzige, was Kröte in diesem Fall tun kann: ABHAUEN! Regen oder Sonne, Tag oder Nacht, diese Kröte ist AUF DER FLUCHT. Halte Ausschau nach Kleinluftschiffen, Eulen und andere Gefahren, während du Insekten verzehrst, dir neue Kräfte aneignest, den Sumpf erforschst und Geheimnissen auf die Spur kommst!

Merkmale

Dem Spielverlauf entsprechend generierte Sümpfe voll handgefertigter Elemente
Elegante Einfingersteuerung
Leckere Insekten, die dir neue Kräfte verleihen
Dynamischer Spielverlauf vom entspannten Sumpfhüpfen bis hin zu packenden Luftschiffverfolgungsjagden!
100+ Missionen, in denen du dein Können testen und neue Kröten gewinnen kannst
Verborgene Geheimnisse, die es zu enthüllen gilt
Aufwendig illustrierte Grafik mit tageszeit- und wetterbedingten Effekten
Atmosphärischer Sound, der für beruhigende Sumpfstimmung sorgt
data.desc_es:
Precioso entorno de fantasía sobre una princesa trastornada y un sapo fugitivo

Argumento

Érase una vez una princesa que vivía en un enorme castillo y que se dedicaba a besar a todo sapo viviente con la intención de encontrar a su Príncipe Azul. Pero nuestro Sapo solo quiere ser eso, un sapo; no quiere vivir en un castillo (por grande que sea). Por eso, Sapo hizo lo único que podía hacer: ¡SALIR POR PATAS! Llueva o haga sol, día y noche, este sapo está en una HUIDA constante. ¡Ten cuidado con las moles, los búhos y otros peligros mientras comes insectos, consigues nuevos poderes, exploras la ciénaga y buscas secretos!

Características

Ciénagas generadas en proceso constante y llenas de elementos diseñados a mano
Elegantes controles con un solo dedo
Come bichos para ganar poderes
Movimiento dinámico: saltos relajados por la ciénaga o estresantes persecuciones
Más de 100 misiones para poner a prueba tus habilidades y conseguir nuevos sapos
Secretos ocultos por descubrir
