Espléndidos gráficos con efectos climáticos y diarios
El sonido atmosférico te sumerge en un relajante entorno pantanoso

data.title: Russian Car Drift 3D
data.description: Russian Car Drift 3D is an HTML5 3D driving game that challenges you to get rid of the snow in each level using nothing but your crazy Russian vehicle. To do so, just skid & drift non-stop. The more you drift, the better! Drift in an old or new Russian car!
data.desc_en: Russian Car Drift 3D is an HTML5 3D driving game that challenges you to get rid of the snow in each level using nothing but your crazy Russian vehicle. To do so, just skid & drift non-stop. The more you drift, the better! Drift in an old or new Russian car!

data.title: Santa Run
data.description: Make Santa run as far as possible and give out presents as he goes.
data.desc_en: Make Santa run as far as possible and give out presents as he goes.

data.title: Santa's Quest
data.description: Santa had an accident! He lost his way and all the gifts. Help him get to his goal by sliding road tiles to form a path. A classic puzzle game which is harder than it looks! Tons of levels in three modes to master. Test your skills and join Santa's adventure!  When you're stuck, use a hint. Are you up for the challenge?
data.desc_it: Babbo Natale ha avuto un incidente! Ha perso la strada e tutti i regali. Aiutalo ad arrivare alla meta trascinando le tessere della strada per tracciare un percorso. Un classico rompicapo che è molto più difficile di quanto non sembri! Un sacco di livelli in tre modalità. Metti alla prova le tue abilità e partecipa all'avventura di Babbo Natale! Se ti blocchi, usa un suggerimento. Te la senti di provare?
data.desc_en: Santa had an accident! He lost his way and all the gifts. Help him get to his goal by sliding road tiles to form a path. A classic puzzle game which is harder than it looks! Tons of levels in three modes to master. Test your skills and join Santa's adventure!  When you're stuck, use a hint. Are you up for the challenge?
data.desc_fr: Le Père Noël a eu un accident ! Il a perdu son chemin, ainsi que tous les cadeaux. Aidez-le à atteindre son but en faisant glisser les tuiles pavées pour former un chemin. Un jeu de casse-tête classique plus difficile qu'il n'y paraît ! Des tonnes de niveaux dans trois modes à maîtriser. Testez vos compétences et rejoignez le Père Noël dans son aventure ! Quand vous êtes coincé, utilisez un indice. Êtes-vous prêt à relever le défi ?
data.desc_de: Santa hatte einen Unfall! Er hat sich verlaufen und alle Geschenke verloren. Hilf ihm dabei, sein Ziel zu erreichen,  indem du Wegplatten zu einem Weg verschiebst. Ein klassisches Puzzlespiel, das schwieriger ist als es aussieht! Es gibt einen Haufen Level in drei Modi zu meistern. Teste deine Fähigkeiten und gehe mit auf Santas Abenteuer! Wenn du feststeckst, nutze einen Hinweis. Bist du bereit, dich dieser Herausforderung zu stellen?
data.desc_es: ¡Papá Noel ha tenido un accidente! Ha perdido el camino y a todos los regalos. Ayúdale a llegar a la meta moviendo las fichas por el tablero para formar un camino. ¡Este juego de puzles clásico es más difícil de lo que parece! Disfruta de numerosos niveles en tres modos e intenta dominarlos. ¡Acompaña a Papá Noel en su aventura y pon a prueba tus habilidades! Cuanto te atasques, usa la pista. ¿Podrás afrontar el reto?

data.title: Save the Crumb
data.description: Save the crumb from the ants who keep coming again and again. Their numbers increase with each level! Watch out and save the crumb!
data.desc_en: Save the crumb from the ants who keep coming again and again. Their numbers increase with each level! Watch out and save the crumb!

data.title: Slide Path
data.description: Slide the bigger colored diamonds on the rails, connecting them to their same-colored target! Beware: all main diamonds move at the same time!
data.desc_it: Fai scorrere i Diamanti colorati sui binari, tutti si muovono allo stesso tempo, il tuo obiettivo sarà che tutti siano sul loro bersaglio i diamanti colorati del loro rispettivo colore
data.desc_en: Slide the bigger colored diamonds on the rails, connecting them to their same-colored target! Beware: all main diamonds move at the same time!
data.desc_fr: Faites glisser les diamants colorés sur les rails, tous se déplacent en même temps, votre objectif sera que tout le monde soit sur leur cible les diamants colorés de leur couleur respective
data.desc_de: Schieben Sie die farbigen Diamanten auf die Schienen, alle bewegen sich gleichzeitig. Ihr Ziel ist es, dass jeder die farbigen Diamanten der jeweiligen Farbe auf seinem Ziel hat
data.desc_es: Deslice los Diamantes de colores por los rieles,  todos se muevan al mismo tiempo, su objetivo será que todos estén en su objetivo los diamantes de colores de su color respectivo.

data.title: Slope Racing 3D
data.description:
Welcome to Slope Racing 3D!  It is a 3D running game with perfect controls, breath-taking speeds, and an addictive gameplay. 
How far can you go without reaching the floor? Try Slope Racing 3D, the more you play the game, the easier it is and the more enjoyable it is. Our goal in the game is to make the ball roll without falling on the surface of the inclined buildings.. Get ready for serious speed boost as you fall downhill the never-ending surface. Play Slope Racing 3D!
data.desc_en:
Welcome to Slope Racing 3D!  It is a 3D running game with perfect controls, breath-taking speeds, and an addictive gameplay. 
How far can you go without reaching the floor? Try Slope Racing 3D, the more you play the game, the easier it is and the more enjoyable it is. Our goal in the game is to make the ball roll without falling on the surface of the inclined buildings.. Get ready for serious speed boost as you fall downhill the never-ending surface. Play Slope Racing 3D!

data.title: Snake 3310 HTML5
data.description: Snake HTML5 is a tribute to the original Snake for Nokia 3310. Do you remember all the hours spent on your Nokia 3310 playing it? Now you can play again the classic Snake game in HTML5!
data.desc_it: Snake HTML5 è il tributo all'originale e famosissimo gioco Snake sul Nokia 3310. Vi ricordate quante ore avete sprecato sul vostro cellulare per giocarci? Ora potete provare di nuovo quell'emozione!
data.desc_en: Snake HTML5 is a tribute to the original Snake for Nokia 3310. Do you remember all the hours spent on your Nokia 3310 playing it? Now you can play again the classic Snake game in HTML5!
data.desc_fr: Snake HTML5 est un hommage au jeu Snake originellement sorti sur Nokia 3310. Vous vous rappelez toutes ces heures passées sur ce jeu génial ? Retrouvez les mêmes sensations  en jouant à la version HTML5 d'un des titres les plus populaires de tous les temps!
data.desc_de: Snake HTML5 ist ein Tribut an das Originalspiel Snake auf dem Nokia 3310. Erinnerst du dich an all die Stunden, die du es auf deinem Nokia 3310 gespielt hast? Jetzt kannst du das klassische Snake-Spiel in HTML5 wieder spielen!
data.desc_es: Snake HTML5 es un tributo al original Snake del Nokia 3310. ¿Recuerdas todas las horas que pasaste jugando en tu móvil? Ahora puedes hacerlo de nuevo en el clásico recuperado para HTML5.

data.title: Snake Escape
data.description: A snake is locked in a room, with food and coins. It must eat the food to survive, but it's also getting bigger: this could be a big issue as the snake won't be able to move around. Help the snake get its food and escape from the room!
data.desc_it: Un serpente è rimasto bloccato in una stanza piena di cibo e monetine. Mangia tutto il cibo per restare in vita ma stai attento: mangiando crescerai e sarà sempre più difficile muoverti. Aiuta il serpente a nutrirsi e a liberarsi dalla stanza!
data.desc_en: A snake is locked in a room, with food and coins. It must eat the food to survive, but it's also getting bigger: this could be a big issue as the snake won't be able to move around. Help the snake get its food and escape from the room!
data.desc_fr: Un serpent est coincé dans une salle avec de la nourriture et des pièces. Il doit manger s'il veut survivre mais ce faisant, il risque de grossir et de ne plus pouvoir bouger! Aidez le serpent à manger et à s'enfuir de ce terrible piège!
data.desc_de: Eine Schlange ist mit Futter und Münzen in einem Raum eingesperrt. Sie muss das Futter essen, um zu überleben, aber dadurch wächst sie auch: Das könnte zu einem großen Problem werden, denn die Schlange wird sich nicht mehr bewegen können. Hilf der Schlange dabei, ihr Futter zu bekommen und aus dem Raum zu entkommen!
data.desc_es: Una serpiente está encerrada en una habitación, con comida y monedas. Debe comer la comida para sobrevivir, pero al mismo tiempo crece y crece: esto será un problema si la serpiente no se moviera todo el tiempo. Ayuda a la serpiente a conseguir su comida y escapar de la habitación.

data.title: Snakes and Ladders
data.description: Snakes and Ladders is a 2 player ancient Indian roll and move game. 100 squares full of traps and tricks... Ladders will help you reach the top, but watch out for the snakes! The first player to reach the very last square wins.
data.desc_en: Snakes and Ladders is a 2 player ancient Indian roll and move game. 100 squares full of traps and tricks... Ladders will help you reach the top, but watch out for the snakes! The first player to reach the very last square wins.

data.title: Solitaire Master
data.description: Three most popular Solitaire card games in one! Anytime you're bored and could use some concentration relax, just play your favorite card puzzle.
data.desc_en: Three most popular Solitaire card games in one! Anytime you're bored and could use some concentration relax, just play your favorite card puzzle.

data.title: Space Cord
data.description: Explore the space and collect all trophies through its energy platforms avoiding dangerous traps on your way! Try to hold on as long as possible in a space race!
data.desc_en: Explore the space and collect all trophies through its energy platforms avoiding dangerous traps on your way! Try to hold on as long as possible in a space race!

data.title: Space Miner
data.description: A puzzle game where the goal of the game is to collect all nuggets and diamonds in the level and avoid dynamites!
data.desc_it: Un gioco rompicapo in cui lo scopo è collezionare pietre e diamanti in ogni livello, evitando le dinamiti!
data.desc_en: A puzzle game where the goal of the game is to collect all nuggets and diamonds in the level and avoid dynamites!
data.desc_fr: Récupérez tous les nuggets et les diamands pour marquer un maximum de points. Mais faites attention à la dynamite!
data.desc_de: Ein Puzzlespiel, in dem es darum geht, alle Nuggets und Diamanten in einem Level zu sammeln und Sprengstoff zu meiden!
data.desc_es: Un juego de Puzzles donde la meta es coleccionar todas pepitas y diamantes en cada nivel y evitar la dinamita!

data.title: Star Battles
data.description: Simple and fun space game. Fly in circles and avoid crashing into the enemy ships. Complete the missions and fly through the galaxy. Survive as long as you can. Speed up or slow down, just don't crash and have fun. Can you unlock and fly with all the spaceships available? Get ready, pilot!
data.desc_it: Un gioco spaziale semplice e divertente. Vola in cerchio ed evita di schiantarti contro le astronavi nemiche. Completa le missioni e vola nella galassia. Sopravvivi più a lungo che puoi. Accelera o decelera, non schiantarti e divertiti. Riuscirai a sbloccare e a volare con tutte le astronavi disponibili? Preparati, pilota!
data.desc_en: Simple and fun space game. Fly in circles and avoid crashing into the enemy ships. Complete the missions and fly through the galaxy. Survive as long as you can. Speed up or slow down, just don't crash and have fun. Can you unlock and fly with all the spaceships available? Get ready, pilot!
data.desc_fr: Un jeu dans l'espace simple et amusant. Volez en cercle et évitez de vous écraser contre les vaisseaux ennemis. Remplissez les missions et volez à travers la galaxie. Survivez le plus longtemps possible. Accélérez ou ralentissez, mais ne vous écrasez pas et amusez-vous. Pouvez-vous déverrouiller et voler avec tous les vaisseaux disponibles ? Préparez-vous, pilote !
data.desc_de: Einfaches, unterhaltsames Weltall-Spiel. Fliege Kreise und versuche, nicht in die feindlichen Raumschiffe zu fliegen. Schließe die Missionen ab und fliege durch die Galaxie. Bleibe so lange wie möglich am Leben. Fliege langsam oder schnell, Hauptsache du baust keinen Unfall und hast Spaß. Kannst du alle verfügbaren Raumschiffe freischalten und damit fliegen? Schnall dich an, Pilot!
data.desc_es: Un juego del espacio sencillo y divertido. Vuela en círculos y evita chocarte con las naves enemigas. Completa las misiones y vuela por la galaxia. Sobrevive todo el tiempo que puedas. Acelera o frena, pero sobre todo no te choques. ¡Y diviértete! ¿Podrás desbloquear y pilotar todas las naves disponibles? ¡Prepárate, piloto!

data.title: Street Ball Jam
data.description: A one-touch basketball arcade game with an endless gameplay. Unlock all balls, earn crystals to open extra courts and enjoy Street Ball Jam!
data.desc_en: A one-touch basketball arcade game with an endless gameplay. Unlock all balls, earn crystals to open extra courts and enjoy Street Ball Jam!

data.title: Street Driver
data.description: Drive dangerously fast on a highway in traffic, overtake every vehicle, earn cash and buy better cars! Try not to crash at the highest speed. Time to start your engine!
data.desc_en: Drive dangerously fast on a highway in traffic, overtake every vehicle, earn cash and buy better cars! Try not to crash at the highest speed. Time to start your engine!

data.title: Sudoku HTML5
data.description: Play Sudoku HTML5, one of the most popular puzzle games of all time. Sudoku is the most fun brain game you will ever play in your life. Available for mobile and desktop devices..
data.desc_it: Gioca a Sudoku, il più popolare e intelligente gioco di puzzle di tutti i tempi. Allena la mente e sviluppa le abilità di matematica laterale con questo classico, inventato dal matematico svizzero Eulero da Basilea. Anche per il sudoku vale il detto "la pratica rende perfetti".
data.desc_en: Play Sudoku HTML5, one of the most popular puzzle games of all time. Sudoku is the most fun brain game you will ever play in your life. Available for mobile and desktop devices..
data.desc_fr: Pour chaque grille, le bouton Indice peut vous indiquer les techniques nécessaires pour progresser. Les instructions sont faciles à comprendre et spécifiques à chaque grille, avec des animations très utiles et des illustrations en couleur. Les indices ne vous donnent pas juste la réponse, ils vous aident à la comprendre. Cette fonctionnalité vous aidera à apprendre toutes les techniques nécessaires pour résoudre les grilles de Sudoku, que vous soyez novice ou expert.
data.desc_de: Spiele „Sudoku HTML5“, eines der beliebtesten Rätselspiele aller Zeiten. Sudoku ist eines der lustigsten Denkspiele, die du jemals spielen wirst. Erhältlich für Mobil- und Desktopgeräte.
data.desc_es: Cuando te enfrentes a un puzle, usa el botón «Pista» para aprender una técnica que te ayude a seguir adelante. Las instrucciones son fáciles de entender, cambian con cada puzle y cuentan con unas animaciones muy coloridas. Las pistas no te dan las respuestas sin más, sino que te indican cómo llegar hasta ellas. Esta función te enseñará todas las técnicas que necesitas para resolver los puzles, ya seas un recién llegado al mundo de los sudokus o todo un experto en la materia.

data.title: Superbike Hero
data.description: Compete across Europe and the Middle East as you race in the Superbike Series. Boost between opponents, hang-on around tight corners, collect coins and upgrade your superbike for the next race. Are you the Superbike Hero?
data.desc_en: Compete across Europe and the Middle East as you race in the Superbike Series. Boost between opponents, hang-on around tight corners, collect coins and upgrade your superbike for the next race. Are you the Superbike Hero?

data.title: Superstar Kitty Fashion Award
data.description: Express your fashion and unique style to transform your little kitty in real beauty like a superstar in this amazing Superstar Kitty Fashion Award game with new hairstyles and fabulous makeover. Start with a spa treatment for a lovely facial and make her skin smooth, shinny, and glowing to look good at the award show.
data.desc_en: Express your fashion and unique style to transform your little kitty in real beauty like a superstar in this amazing Superstar Kitty Fashion Award game with new hairstyles and fabulous makeover. Start with a spa treatment for a lovely facial and make her skin smooth, shinny, and glowing to look good at the award show.
